ESP.ORIGINAL: Latest Findings
ESP.TRADUIT: 最新研究成果

ESP.ORIGINAL:
I've extensively tested, and I can confirm that my equipment is working at optimal performance. What I've found is most disturbing. Certain locations in the Mojave seem to have a higher-than-average level of ambient energy, and it seems to correlate with the more odd and unexplainable phenomena seen in the region. Below are the locations I have discovered:
1. Goodsprings. This is strange. For such a small, insignificant town, the energy readings are off the charts! There seem to be two epicenters in this region: The local doctor's home, and the town bar. I've never encountered such a high energy level in a town before. What this energy is, I cannot say.
2. Searchlight Airport. When my equipment indicated towards Searchlight, I thought perhaps it was because of the nuclear device that detonated. But, no, it led me past the town where the radiation was coming from, and all the way to the airport. There was nothing there, but I cannot ignore the massive readings from this location.
3. Cerulean Robotics, Freeside. The electronics in this building were all non-functioning or running on reserve power. Nothing to indicate where these strange energy spikes are coming from. I don't understand...
4. The emergency service railyard. This is the hardest to explain. While these energy readings are an anomaly by themselves, this one isn't centered around any populated areas. What are these energy readings? What is it about these locations that attract all these frequencies? What is going on?
ESP.TRADUIT:
我进行了广泛的测试，我可以确认我的设备在最佳状态下工作。我的发现最令人不安。莫哈韦沙漠的某些地方似乎拥有高于平均水平的环境能量，这似乎与该地区出现的更奇怪和无法解释的现象有关。以下是我发现的一些地点:
1.清泉镇。这很奇怪，对于这样一个无足轻重的小镇来说，能源读数真是高得惊人！这个地区似乎有两个中心:当地医生的家和镇上的酒吧。我从来没在一个小镇里见过这么高的能量水平。这种能量是什么，我不好说。
2.探照灯机场。当我的设备指向探照灯营地时，我想可能是因为核装置在那里爆炸了。但是，没有，它带我经过了辐射产生的小镇，一路去了机场。那里什么都没有，但我不能忽视这个地方的大量读数。
3.蔚蓝机器人工厂，自由城。这幢大楼里的电子设备要么失灵，要么靠备用电源供电。没有证据表明这些奇怪的能量峰值来自哪里。我不明白...
4.铁路应急服务站，这是最难解释的。虽然这些能量读数本身就是异常现象，但这一次并不是围绕着任何人口稠密的地区。这些能量读数是什么？这些地方是怎么吸引这些频率的？这是怎么回事？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Enclave Tech
ESP.TRADUIT: 英克雷科技

ESP.ORIGINAL:
I know there are old Enclave bunkers hidden in the Mojave! I've exhausted every avenue of research available to me, and there is simply no other way! I've been careful, though. The NCR would no doubt misunderstand my intentions.
My setting up here was a good idea for two reasons. For one, the NCR has no business up in the mountains, full of mutants. And secondly, there were rumors of an Enclave scientist here! I've met him, and he admitted it! However, he was reticent, and unwilling to speak in detail. All I could glean is that he was simply a researcher, and he has no knowledge of bunkers in the area. A shame.
Doesn't matter. I've convinced the leader of the mutants to let me stay here, out of the way. I renovated this old house. Heh. "Renovated." I just pulled the boards off the door and set up some cameras and explosive defenses. The second-gen mutants here were happy to help me build a basement, and move my equipment down. Very helpful. I feel safe here. Just to be on the safe side, I brought Rusty along.
ESP.TRADUIT:
我知道莫哈韦沙漠里藏着一些古老的英克雷地堡！我已经尝试了所有的研究方法来找到它，没有别的办法了！不过我一直很小心，NCR肯定会误解我的意图。
我在这里设点是个好主意，有两个原因，首先，NCR在山里没有势力，到处都是变种人。其次，有传言说这里有个英克雷的科学家！我见过他，他也承认了！然而，他沉默寡言，不愿透露细节。我只知道他只是个研究人员，而且他对这个地区的地堡一无所知，可惜。
没关系，我已经说服了变种人的首领让我留在这里，不受干扰。我翻修了这座旧房子，哈，“翻修”，我只是把门上的板子拆了装了摄像头和爆炸性防御设施。这里的第二代变种人很乐意帮我建个地下室，把我的设备搬下来，很有帮助。我觉得这里很安全。为了安全起见，我带拉斯蒂一起来了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Horrible Cavern!
ESP.TRADUIT: 可怕的洞穴！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Sweet Jesus, I can't believe I'm still alive! I was investigating some of the caverns in this region, given that there is a precedent for Enclave facilities being built into natural caverns. Many of the caves in this area are actually pre-war mineshafts, with doors built over them to stop... I don't know, children, maybe, from falling in.
This is good, because I've found the worst cave in the universe. I lost a protectron getting out of there, but I made it! I can't in good conscience allow anyone else to fall into that pit of evil, so I returned later that night and fitted a sturdy lock on the door. You'd need quite a few kilotons of ordnance to breach it, and if someone is willing to expend that level of energy, hopefully they'll collapse the cave and kill the abominations lurking below. Failing that, there is only one key, and it's right there on my desk, where no one but me will ever get it.
I'm hungry. I think it's time for a sweetroll.
ESP.TRADUIT:
天啊，真不敢相信我还活着！我当时正在调查这一地区的一些洞穴，因为有飞地设施被建在天然洞穴中的先例。这个地区的许多洞穴实际上是战前的矿井，上面盖着门来阻止...我不知道，也许是孩子们，以免掉进去。
这很好，因为我找到了全宇宙最糟糕的洞穴。我离开的时候失去了一个保护者，但我成功了！凭良心说，我不能让任何人掉进那个邪恶的深渊，所以那天晚上我又回来了，给门装上了一把结实的锁。你需要上万吨的炸药才能攻破它，如果有人愿意消耗这么大的能量，希望他们能摧毁洞穴并杀死潜伏在下面的可憎之物。如果不行，就只有一把钥匙，就在我桌上，只有我能拿到。
我饿了，我想该吃甜味卷了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Last Words of Grungus Jefford
ESP.TRADUIT: 格朗格斯·杰福德的遗言

ESP.ORIGINAL: FUCKING DAMMIT I STEALTHED ALL THE WAY TO THE LOWEST RECESSES OF THIS CAVE AND THERE'S NOTHING FUCKING HERE! THERE'S ALWAYS SUPPOSED TO BE AMAZING LOOT AT THE BOTTOM OF CAVES! MY FUCKING STEATHBOY IS OUT OF JUICE I HATE MY FUCKING LIFE GODDAMMIT!!!
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死的，我偷偷溜到了这个洞穴的最深处这里什么都没有！洞穴底部令人惊奇的战利品呢！我那该死的隐身小子失效了！我他妈的恨我的生活！！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuckin' NCR!
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死的NCR！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Those NCR assholes snuck up and slapped a lock on our south entrance gate! And, if that wasn't enough, hear tell that they're warning people to avoid this area, which means... focus your attention on the North-side entrance. Not as many people come that way, but it's better than none, which is what that fucking lock means.
Isabela is in charge while I scout other passageways. If you don't do what she says, we'll nail your corpse to the wall just like we did to Randy.
None of you try to deal with that lock, either! It was Rangers who put it there, and if we piss them off enough, they might charge us from that outpost they got there. Fuck that.
Keep your shit together! We ain't going to be the crew that disappoints Hader!
Samir
Oh, and when I get back, that fucking clown better be gone! We're raiders, dammit! We kill people and take their stuff! We have no fucking reason to keep a face-painted cannibal in our supply closet! I mean it, get rid of him!
ESP.TRADUIT:
那些NCR的混蛋们偷偷摸摸地在我们的南边入口处上了锁！这还不够，听说他们警告人们不要进入这个区域，这意味着...把你的注意力放在北边的入口。虽然没那么多人来，但总比没人来好，这就是那个该死的锁的意思。
伊莎贝拉负责这里，我负责其他通道。如果你不照她说的做，我们就把你的尸体钉在墙上，就像我们对兰迪做的那样。
你们谁也别碰那把锁！是游骑兵放在那里的，如果我们惹恼了他们，他们可能会从他们的前哨向我们进攻，操他妈的。
管好自己！我们不会成为让哈德失望的团队！
- 萨米尔
等我回来的时候，那个小丑最好已经消失了！我们是掠夺者，他妈的！我们杀人然后拿走他们的东西！我们没理由把一个涂了脸的食人族放在储藏室里！我是认真的，把他弄走！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's Take Over!
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我们来接管！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey guys, I had an idea! Samir isn't hanging around here, and he keeps running off to try and do whatever he does north, right? Why do we need that ugly asshole? Guys, let's put me in charge of this crew. I'll make Bela my queen-bitch if she agrees, but if she wants to be loyal to that fucker callin' himself boss, we can kill her. Or tie her up and convince her that we're the rightful leaders and shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，伙计们，我有个主意！萨米尔不想待在这里，他一直跑去北边想做他想做的事，对吧？我们为什么需要那个丑陋的混蛋？伙计们，让我来管理这群人吧。如果贝拉同意，我会让她做我的婊子皇后，但如果她想忠于那个自称老大的混蛋，我们可以杀了她。或者把她绑起来，让她相信我们才是真正的领袖。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stop jacking it, dammit!
ESP.TRADUIT: 别顶了！该死的！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Guys! I'm being nice by letting you keep that NCR poster in the bathroom stall, but stop jerking to it! We can all hear you in there panting and slapping and shit! Next person I catch doing it, I'm dragging out by the cock and circumsizing you with a goddamn butter knife!
Samir
ESP.TRADUIT:
兄弟！我让你把那张NCR的海报放在厕所隔间里是对你好，但别再对着他乱顶了！我们都能听到你在里面又喘又拍的！下一个被我抓住的人，我就拽着你的老二用该死的黄油刀给你割包皮！
- 萨米尔

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really guys?
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的吗伙计们？

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Why was there a corpse festering in the sleeping quarters? Look, display them in the tunnels if you want, you freaks. Or, I guess you can dump them in the storage closet and let that fucking clown eat them. Maybe? I'm still not sure why we're letting him hang out here. He doesn't even speak! I still think we should kill him, but if we're gonna keep him around, give him the fucking corpses! Just don't keep them in our sleeping quarters! Am I the only one of you people who can still fucking smell how shit that is? Jesus christ, get your shit together!
Samir
ESP.TRADUIT:
为什么卧室里会有一具腐烂的尸体？听着，如果你们这些怪胎愿意，可以把它放到隧道里展示，或者把它扔进储藏室让那个该死的小丑吃掉。我还是不明白为什么要让他来这里，他连话都不会说！我还是觉得我们应该杀了他，但如果我们想留住他，就把尸体给他！只是别把那玩意放在我们的卧室里！难道我是你们中唯一一个还能嗅到那有多糟糕的人吗？我的天，给我收拾收拾！
- 萨米尔

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pre-War Suicide Note
ESP.TRADUIT: 战前的遗书

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Dear Tasha
I'm sorry, I told you that once I was out of prison, I would be a changed man. I guess I lied, and I didn't even know it until just now. I'm still a coward. I saw the lights and heard the noise, but... I couldn't even make myself go outside. I convinced myself you and the baby are dead. Maybe you're not. I hope you're not. I hope you're both alive, and if you are, I'm going to finally do something right for a change. You're free. Find someone who can be the man I couldn't be. I'm sorry.
Love, Pablo
ESP.TRADUIT:
亲爱的塔莎
对不起，我告诉过你一旦我出狱，我就会重新做人，直到现在我才知道我撒谎了。我是个懦夫，我看到了灯光，听到了噪音，但是...我甚至没有勇气让自己出去。我说服自己你和孩子都死了，也许没有，我希望你没有...我希望你们都还活着，如果你们还活着，我要做点正确的改变。你是自由的，去和一个我无法成为的人在一起吧。我很抱歉。
爱你的, - 巴勃罗

ESP.ORIGINAL: Caleb's Journal - Entry 1
ESP.TRADUIT: 凯莱布的日记 - 条目1

ESP.ORIGINAL:
It's so much quieter up here than it was back west, and the sky lights up without the neon of Vegas killing the stars.
We're going to make camp here for the night. Brad complained, like clockwork. He wanted to sleep inside the old gas station, but he dropped that idea when he heard things rustling around in there. Ferals, most likely.
After everyone else was asleep, I lay out on the road and watched the stars, just like I used to with Jenny. She used to tell me that if everyone could just set their guns down for one evening and watch the sky, we could all find a common ground. That is something the Followers would say, I suppose.
I doubt slavers spend much time looking for constellations.
ESP.TRADUIT:
这里比西边安静多了，天空中的星星也没有被拉斯维加斯的霓虹灯杀死。
我们今晚要在这里扎营。布拉德像时钟一样抱怨着。他想睡在旧加油站里，但当他听到那里有沙沙声时，他放弃了这个想法。很有可能是狂尸鬼。
在其他人都睡着后，我躺在马路上看星星，就像我以前和珍妮在一起的时候一样。她曾经告诉我，如果每个人都能把枪放下看一看天空，大家就能达成一致。我想这是天启追随者们会说的话。
我怀疑奴隶贩子会花很多时间来寻找星座。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Caleb's Journal - Entry 2
ESP.TRADUIT: 凯莱布的日记 - 条目2

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Lucky break, got a lead, now. We came across some folks today who opened fire on us. We dealt with them easy enough, and their one survivor said that he was working for Bradshaw. I cut his throat and left him to feed the coyotes.
I don't know what to do once we've cleared the slavers from the region. Keep on heading north, maybe? Or maybe east, play guerilla with the Legion. Maybe these ideas keep slipping into my head as an insidious attempt to make me reconsider suicide.
I wish we had more men. We could liberate this whole passage. It's bad enough when scum like this infest areas like Freeside, which is already a cesspool. But places like this, near-untouched by the bombs, thriving in spite of us... Should have stayed untouched. I'll do my part to rectify it.
It's late, so I'll turn in soon. Still, there's enough light for me to write this entry. After all these decades, you'd think the stars would have stopped capturing my attention.
ESP.TRADUIT:
幸运的是，现在有线索了。今天遇到一些人向我们开枪，我们很轻松地解决了他们，其中一个幸存者说他是布拉德肖的手下。我割断了他的喉咙，把他丢去喂郊狼了。
我们把奴隶贩子赶出这片区域之后该怎么办？我也不知道，也许继续往北走？或者去东部，和军团打游击。这些想法不断出现在我的脑海中，不知道是不是为了让我重新考虑自杀。
我希望我们有更多的人，我们可以解放整条通道。像这样的人渣在自由城这样的地方泛滥已经够糟糕的了，那里已经是粪坑了。但是像这样的地方，几乎没有受到核弹的影响，尽管有我们的存在，仍然繁荣发展...我希望它能应该保持原状，我将尽我所能来纠正它。
很晚了，我马上就去睡觉。不过，有足够的光线让我写这篇文章。这么多年过去了，你应该会以为星星已经不再吸引我的注意力了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Current Contracts
ESP.TRADUIT: 目前的合同

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Contract 1: Burke Protection
Got a nice juicy contract from some guy outta NCR. Bounty hunters are after him, and that's what we're present for. Any lawmen that arrive are to be shot on sight.
Contract 2: Raider Neutralization The local raiders have made their intentions known as soon as we set up shop in the valley. However, the town in the region is offering a bounty on the gang leaders. It's not very much money, but we're going to be killing raiders anyway. Might as well get paid for it.
ESP.TRADUIT:
合同1：伯克保护者
跟NCR那边的人签了份很好的合约。赏金猎人在追杀他，这就是我们现在的目的。任何到达的执法者都将被当场击毙。
合同2：解决掠夺者
我们在山谷里一开店当地的掠夺者就已经表明了他们的意图。正好该地区的小镇悬赏捉拿黑帮头目，虽然钱不多，但我们反正是要去杀掠夺者的，不如再拿点酬劳。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Warning Notice
ESP.TRADUIT: 警告通知

ESP.ORIGINAL:
I've disposed of that vat of chemicals that you kept dipping your hands in. The fact that I need to explain this is ridiculous. I don't care how "funny" it might feel, DO NOT go around sticking your hands in unknown chemicals! For those of you who are saying that we should use the skin-bleaching effects for some kind of iconographic purposes, you're idiots.
As the chemical has been disposed of, I won't be disciplining anyone. The fact that your hands are now permanantly white should be punishment enough.
I swear to god, if civilians start calling us "whitehand mercs" or something like that, I'm putting someone on the wall.
General Brandice
ESP.TRADUIT:
我已经处理掉了你一直把手浸入的那桶化学品。我需要一个解释，这件事太荒谬了。 我不在乎它的感觉有多“有趣”，不要到处把手伸进未知的化学物质中！对于那些说我们应该将皮肤漂白效果用于某种图像目的的人来说，你们是白痴。
由于化学物质已被处理掉，我不会惩罚任何人。 你的手现在永远是白色的这这件事应该是足够的惩罚了。
我向上帝发誓，如果平民开始称我们为“白手佣兵”或类似的东西，我会把某人钉在墙上。
- 布兰迪斯将军

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mercenary Orders
ESP.TRADUIT: 雇佣兵指令

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Commander Phillipson, you are to take a small party to the North Wind pumping station (???) and secure it from all outside forces. This can be a valuable staging area if secured properly. Intel suggests some of the local raiders patrol the area, but they should pose minimal threat.
Secondary objective is to determine the exact nature of the equipment installed in the area.
General Brandice
ESP.TRADUIT:
菲利普森指挥官，你要带一小队人去北风泵站(???)确保它不受外界干扰。如果保护得当，这可能是一个宝贵的集结区。情报显示有一些当地的掠夺者在这片区域巡逻，但他们的威胁应该很小。
次要目标是确定在该地区安装的设备的确切性质。
- 布兰迪斯将军

ESP.ORIGINAL: Caleb's Journal - Entry 3
ESP.TRADUIT: 凯莱布的日记 - 条目3

ESP.ORIGINAL:
We took casualties today. We were moving through a passageway when some guys jumped us. They were smarter and better equipped than these raiders we've been cutting through. Mercenaries, most likely. On whose payroll, I can't say.
They blew their cover by shooting Ellersby through the skull. We fell back, but Brad caught one in the knee. He couldn't crawl back fast enough, and they perforated him. We spent some time shooting back and forth, and we won. Not clean, though. McGovern didn't make it, either. Didn't go quick and easy. Punctured lung. No chance of getting him helped. I gave him a crack at my personal liquor stash, and Vargas gave him a shot of Med-X.
He shook my hand and asked me to make it quick. Then he said his goodbyes to everyone before he passed out. Gave it a few minutes for the whiskey and morphine to really put him out of it, and then I cut his throat.
Donelly's eyes got all watery. She's a good kid. Doesn't deserve this life. What was it the NCR wants her to hang for? Stole a few rifles or something? She reminds me of Ellie. Or, how I imagine Ellie to be now that she's grown. It isn't fair that she never got to meet her mother, or that I'm the father she had to be stuck with.
Yes, the booze seems to have gotten me sentimental. I keep seeing Jenny's face, and I have to remind myself that she didn't die today. No, today we lost Ellersby, Brad, and McGovern. One less Desert Ranger in the world, one of the last of his kind. The world's a poorer place for their loss, and it's not even going to remember their names. Something else for me to carry.
ESP.TRADUIT:
我们今天有伤亡。我们正穿过一个通道，突然有人袭击了我们。他们比我们见过的那些掠夺者更聪明，装备更精良。最大的可能是雇佣兵，谁雇佣的我不好说。
他们向埃勒斯比的头骨开枪，暴露了自己的身份。我们后退了，但布拉德膝盖中了一枪，他爬得不够快，被他们刺穿了。我们花了些时间来回射击，最后还是赢了。不过并不彻底，麦戈文也没能挺住，他们不是那么容易就能搞定的，肺部穿刺，他不可能得到医疗帮助。我给了他我私藏的酒，瓦格斯给了他一针吗啡针-X。
他握了握我的手，要我快点。然后他在昏倒前向大家道别，给了他几分钟时间，让威士忌和吗啡真正把他弄晕，然后我割断了他的喉咙。
多纳利的眼睛湿润了。她是个好孩子，不应该过这样的生活。NCR要绞死她的原因是什么？偷了几支步枪还是什么？她让我想起了艾莉，或者说她是我想象中的艾莉长大后的样子。她没见过她母亲，我就是她的父亲，这太不公平了。
是的，酒似乎让我变得多愁善感了。我一直能看到珍妮的脸，我得提醒自己她今天没死。不，今天我们失去了埃勒斯比，布拉德和麦戈文。世界上又少了一个沙漠游骑兵，他的同类中的最后一个。失去了他们，这个世界变得更加贫穷，甚至不会记得他们的名字。还有一些东西需要我去背负。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is simple!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这很简单！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
OK guys, I left a crew to man the tunnel that goes back into the Mojave. If we can lock down the path from here over there, then we'll own this place. Once we've done that, we're gonna work with Worm and take down Madsen's walls. Hader told me that if we all attack at once, we would take that shitty town, easy!
Right now though, we need to focus on clearing this passage. The two biggest problems are those mercenary assholes, and legion scouting parties. So, it's simple! Kill all of them!
Samir
ESP.TRADUIT:
好了，伙计们，我留了一队人负责守住通往莫哈韦沙漠的隧道。如果我们能封锁这条路，我们就能拥有这里了。完成之后，我们就和沃姆合作拆掉马德森的墙。哈德尔告诉我，如果我们一起进攻，我们就能轻松拿下那个破镇子！
但现在，我们需要集中精力清理这条通道。最大的两个问题是那些雇佣兵和军团侦察队。所以，很简单！把他们全杀了！
- 萨米尔

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stash Location
ESP.TRADUIT: 藏匿地点

ESP.ORIGINAL:
This is some dumb shit! I came up this way for a fresh start, cause I heard that a lot of people trying to get away from the NCR come up this way. Just to be on the safe side, I stashed my prison clothes, my dynamite, and my knife, so I could go incognito.
Well, good news is that this town is exatcly what I thought it would be. I don't have to hide who I am from anyone here. The bad news is I CAN'T GET BACK TO MY STASH. I buried it in a box in the woods near that caved-in car tunnel down south a ways. It was clear when I buried it, but now there are a bunch of raiders milling around there! What the fuck!
At least they're too dumb to go searching in the brush for buried treasure. I think I'll sneak in there during the night and snatch it away. Yeah.
ESP.TRADUIT:
真是个蠢货！我走这条路是为了一个新的开始，因为我听说很多人试图走这条路摆脱NCR。为了安全起见，我把我的囚衣、炸药和刀藏了起来，这样我就可以隐姓埋名了。
好消息是这座小镇和我想象的完全一样。我不必对这里的任何人隐瞒我是谁。坏消息是我无法回到我的藏匿处了，我把它埋在树林里的一个箱子里，就在南边那条塌陷的汽车隧道附近。我埋的时候很清楚，但现在有一群掠夺者在那里转来转去！这他妈是怎么回事！？
至少他们太蠢了，不会去灌木丛里寻找埋藏的宝藏。我想我会在晚上偷偷溜进去把它抢走，耶。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't touch my shit!
ESP.TRADUIT: 别碰我的东西！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Guys! This is my personal loot-box, OK? I know exactly what's inside it at any given time, so if anyone fucks around with it, I'll fucking know!
If any of you do fuck around with it, I'm going to start snipping fingers on all of you until someone cops to it! I'm not fucking joking!
Samir
ESP.TRADUIT:
伙计们！这是我的私人战利品盒，懂吗？我随时都知道里面有什么，所以如果有人敢动它，我他妈会知道的！
如果你们谁敢乱动，我就开始割你们的手指直到有人报警！我他妈没开玩笑！
- 萨米尔

ESP.ORIGINAL: Statement of Vindication
ESP.TRADUIT: 辩护声明

ESP.ORIGINAL:
I, John Patrick Lewison, am of sound mind and body, and I am not writing this under duress.
Earlier this morning, at approximately 3:16 AM, I was woken up by strange noises outside of my home. I investigated, but found no trace of any intruders. As of right now, 6:47 AM, November 14th, 2279, I believe I shall be killed soon.
I investigated the outside of my home again at first light, and found multiple sets of footprints that were not my own. I believe that they were left by members of the New California Republic.
I have been on the run from the NCR since September 21st, 2277, for alleged crimes that I did not commit. The NCR has wanted me dead ever since, and it would not be unlike them to track me so far in their search for revenge.
If you find this tape, but not me, then know that the NCR has succeeded in murdering me.
John Patrick Lewison
ESP.TRADUIT:
我，约翰·帕特里克·刘易森，身心健康，我不是迫于压力才写这篇文章的。
今天凌晨3点16分左右，我被屋外奇怪的声音吵醒。我调查过了，但直到现在也没有发现任何入侵者的痕迹，2279年11月14日早上6点47分，我相信我很快就会被杀死。
我在晨曦中再次调查了我的家外面，发现了多组不是我自己的脚印。我相信它们是NCR的人留下的。
自从2277年9月21日以来，我一直在逃离NCR的追捕，因为我被指控犯下了我没有犯下的罪行。NCR从那以后就一直想要我的命，他们追踪我到现在都是为了复仇，这并不奇怪。
如果你找到了这盘带子，但没有找到我，那你就知道NCR已经成功谋杀了我。
- 约翰·帕特里克·刘易森

ESP.ORIGINAL: To Worm
ESP.TRADUIT: 给沃姆

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Tell you what, bitch. I'll start calling you "Mr." Worm when you STOP calling me fucking Babydick, OK?! My dick is huge, man! You'll just have to take my word for it, though, cause I'm not gonna show it to you! Only bitches get to see the python, OK?
Anyway, word from Samir is that a rich-boy NCR pussy rolled past Madsen and is holed up in that old mansion north of town. If we kill him and sell the body back to the NCR, we get cash! Or we could tell the bitch that we'll kill him, unless he gets us cash! Apparently the bounty on him is for his wild-ass sexual appetites. Just like me, only he really does have a babydick, cause he likes to fuck little kiddies, so that just makes sense.
I know you wanna take Madsen for ourselves, but I think we'd be better off milking this NCR cow.
Oh, yeah, 20K was looking for you. Sounded bad, man. I'd stay hidden in your little basement for a bit if I was you.
ESP.TRADUIT:
告诉你吧，贱人。我会开始叫你沃姆“先生”，你别再叫我小鸡巴了，好吗！我的老二很大，伙计！你只能相信我的话，因为我不会给你看的！只有母狗才能看到巨蟒，懂吗？
不管怎样，萨米尔说有个NCR的娘们富家子经过了马德森，躲在镇北的老房子里。如果我们杀了他，然后把尸体卖给NCR，我们就能拿到钱！或者我们可以告诉那婊子，除非他给我们钱，否则我们就杀了他！显然他的赏金是因为他狂野的性欲，就像我一样，只是他真的有个小鸡巴，因为他喜欢操小孩儿，所以这就说得通了。
我知道你想占领马德森，但我觉得我们最好还是去挤NCR这头奶牛的奶。
对了，20K在找你。听起来不是好事，哥们。如果我是你，我会在你的小地下室躲一阵子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Incident Report
ESP.TRADUIT: 事故报告

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Tagged a driver going way over the limit. Idiots never figure we'll pop out from behind the billboard, haha.
Driver was a male, caucasian, heavily intoxicated and belligerent. When Officer Carden went to administer the breathalyzer, he called her a "fascist officer cunt." He then began to rant about how Jews were secretly funding all the recent Robobrain movies in order to drive him to suicidal madness.
Passenger was female, caucasian. She was passed out, and came back positive for traces of lysergic acid diethylamide and psycho.
After subduing the driver, we determined that the both of them were runaway dregs from Maine, with no family or friends to speak of. Seeing as how they will likely not be missed, we've taken them into the basement for communion.
The void overflows with the lifeblood of the unclean. I near my final ascension. I can hear the eternal plain beckoning my earthly soul, and it is a sweet song, my brothers.
Officer Barnes
P.S. The coffee machine broke again! :(
ESP.TRADUIT:
标记了一个超速驾驶的司机。这白痴从没想过我们会从广告牌后面跳出来，哈哈。
司机是白人男性，严重醉酒，好斗。卡登警官去做酒精测试时，他称她为“法西斯军官屄”。然后他开始咆哮犹太人是如何秘密资助所有最近的脑控机器人电影，以疯狂的驱使他自杀。
乘客是白人女性。她昏倒了，检测结果显示有麦角酸二乙基酰胺和疯狂药。
制服了司机后，我们断定他们俩都是从缅因州逃跑的渣滓，没有家人或朋友。鉴于他们很可能不会被察觉，我们把他们带到地下室进行圣餐。
虚空中充满了不洁之人的生命。我即将升天，我能听到永恒的平原在召唤我尘世的灵魂，那是一首甜美的歌，我的兄弟们。
- 巴恩斯警官
P.S：咖啡机又坏了! :(

ESP.ORIGINAL: Respond Now
ESP.TRADUIT: 立刻回复

ESP.ORIGINAL:
I don't know where you've run to, but my guess would be the Fogerty Mansion. If that's true, then respond to me.
Adam, this is an embarrassment. Running has only made things worse for you, boy. If you had just used your head, stayed where you were, everything would be fine. What evidence do they have against you? The allegations of a single child? You're a Burke. You're my son. Their words are powerless. But now? Now you've fled like a coward, and in so doing, you've confirmed to the world that you're guilty of the charges leveled at you.
Come back home. I'll make this go away. Everyone will forget about it. Don't jeopardize the family legacy for this.
ESP.TRADUIT:
我不知道你去了哪里，但我猜应该是福格蒂宅邸。如果这是真的，那就给我答复。
亚当，这太丢人了，逃跑只会让你的情况更糟，孩子。如果你动动脑筋，呆在原地，一切都会好起来的。他们有什么对你不利的证据？一个孩子的指控？你是伯克，你是我的儿子，他们的话是无力的。但是现在呢？现在你像个懦夫一样逃跑了，这样做，你向全世界证明了对你的指控是有罪的。
回家来吧，我会解决这件事的。所有人都会忘记它，别为了这事危及家族遗产。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know you're there...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道你在那儿...

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Adam, I know you're at the Fogerty Manor. How stupid are you? Do you honestly believe that nobody knew our ancestral ties to the place? Use your head, for once in your life.
Respond to my messages, right now. You're trying my patience. I want you to return to California. You know me, boy. You know what I can do, the resources at my disposal. You're my only son, so when I tell you that I will ensure you face no punishment for your actions, you know that I mean it.
The military has put a warrant out for you. Bounty hunters will come. When that happens, don't you dare resist. Just nod your head and do exactly what they say. Now, while we wait for that to happen, return my messages.
ESP.TRADUIT:
亚当，我知道你在福格蒂庄园。你有多蠢？你真的相信没人知道我们祖先和这里的关系吗？你能不能用你的脑子思考一次？
马上回复我的信息，不要再考验我的耐心了。我要你回加州，你了解我的，孩子。你知道我能做什么，我能动用什么资源。你是我唯一的儿子，所以当我告诉你我会保证你不会因为你的行为而受到惩罚，你应该清楚我是认真的。
军方已经对你发出了逮捕令。赏金猎人会来的。当这种情况发生时，你可不要反抗，只要点头，照他们说的做就行。在我们等待这一切发生的时候，回我的信息，马上。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Caleb's Journal - Entry 4
ESP.TRADUIT: 凯莱布的日记 - 条目4

ESP.ORIGINAL:
The slavers have turned an old luxury hotel into their base of operations. Assaulting it isn't tenable, yet. Which isn't to say that a suicide attack like that wouldn't be a fitting end for me. But I'm not going anywhere. Not while men like that still walk on this earth. I have a duty, and I'm going to kill ever last one of them.
For now, me and my posse are operating out of this little town, Madsen. Good folk here. In another life, I think I could've settled down here with Ellie.
Funny. Jenny's been gone for so long that I can't even picture her in my fantasies of a better life. I like to think she wouldn't hate me if she knew what I'd become. Shouldn't be too big a surprise. Never did understand how her pacifistic Followers training had the leniency for her to shack up with some hot-headed killer-for-hire. I guess that's why she's gone, and I'm still here. There's no place in this world for righteousness or mercy. There could be justice, though. I'll make sure of that.
I'm starting to suspect that I'll never rest. That just means there's more work to be done. No, I'm not going anywhere.
ESP.TRADUIT:
奴隶贩子把一家旧豪华酒店变成了他们的大本营，攻击它是不可行的。这并不是说这种自杀式袭击对我来说不是一个合适的结局，但我哪儿也不去，只要有这样的人还活着就不会走。我有责任，我要杀光他们中的每一个人。
目前，我和我的手下在这个叫马德森的小镇外活动。这里很棒，如果有来生，我想我可以和艾莉在这里安定下来。
有趣，珍妮离开太久了，我甚至无法在幻想中想象她的美好生活。我想如果她知道我变成了什么样子她就不会恨我了，应该不会有太大的惊喜。我一直不明白她接受了天启追随者的训练为什么还会和一个鲁莽的雇佣杀手同居。我想这也许就是她离开而我还在这里的原因。这个世界上没有正义和仁慈的地方，不过，正义是可以有的，我会确保这一点。
我开始怀疑，我永远不会休息。这只是意味着还有更多的工作要做。不，我哪儿也不去。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Orders
ESP.TRADUIT: 命令

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Sergeant Beauxchamp, it has come to my attention that there is a pre-war military storage depot north of Madsen. Obviously, I want it.
However, the armory has been occupied by a contingent of these shitsucking northern raiders. These miserable cretins are starting to piss me off, so killing them would make me very happy.
Your orders are to take a small team with you to the armory. If you determine that your team can capture the armory, do so. The town to the south, Madsen, has an open contract for the termination of the man running the armory, as an added incentive.
If the defenses are too strong, return to the FOB and gather as many men as you need. I want that armory. If we can claim it, we may very well have a new HQ. Even if not, we'll have the weapons and armor secured within. This needs to happen, sergeant. No excuses.
General Brandice
ESP.TRADUIT:
博尚中士，我注意到在马德森以北有一个战前军事仓库。 很明显，我需要这个。
然而，军械库已经被这些该死的北方掠夺者占据了。 这些可怜的白痴开始惹我生气，所以杀了他们会让我很高兴。
你的命令是带一个小队和你一起去军械库。 如果你确定你的团队可以占领军械库，那就这样做。 南部的小镇马德森有一份终止经营军械库的人的公开合同作为额外的激励。
如果防御太强，请返回 FOB 并根据需要召集尽可能多的人。 我需要那个军械库。 如果我们能占领它，我们很可能会有一个新的总部。 即使没有，我们也会把武器和盔甲锁在里面。 这必须发生，中士，没有理由。
- 布兰迪斯将军

ESP.ORIGINAL: Greg's Confession
ESP.TRADUIT: 格雷格的忏悔

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Sarah, you were right.
I didn't go to New York last year. I was in Colorado. But I wasn't cheating on you, Sarah. I'm not a good man, but I'd have to be the devil himself to do something like that to someone like you.
So, I can't lie anymore, babe. I was in Colorado, and I was on the news. That gold robbery... that was me. I bought the auto dealership with the money I made from the heist, and I set us up for life. So, if you're reading this, something went wrong. I had to hide.
I'm sure that, now that you know, you're seeing me in a different light. I understand. But, if you still feel something for me, despite this, then let's meet up again. How about that lake where I accidentally ruined your wolf shirt?
Oh, if you're not Sarah, and you're maybe just some cop who busted open my safe, then this is all an elaborate hoax, so go fuck off and eat some donuts.
Love you, babe Greg Madsen
ESP.TRADUIT:
莎拉，你是对的。
去年我没有去纽约，我在科罗拉多。 但我没有欺骗你，莎拉。 我不是一个好人，但我必须自己成为魔鬼才能对你这样的人做出这样的事情。
所以，我不能再撒谎了，宝贝。 我在科罗拉多州，我上了新闻。 那个黄金劫案...是我。 我用抢劫所得的钱买下了汽车经销店，为我们的生活做了准备。 所以，如果你读到这封信，就说明出了问题。我不得不躲起来。
我敢肯定，现在你知道了，你会以不同的眼光看待我，我明白。但是，如果你仍然对我有感觉，尽管如此，那么我们再见面吧。我不小心弄坏你狼T恤的那个湖怎么样？
哦，如果你不是莎拉，而且你可能只是一个破坏了我保险箱的警察，那么这都是一个精心设计的骗局，所以去他妈的，吃点甜甜圈吧。
我爱你，宝贝 - 格雷格·马德森

ESP.ORIGINAL: Supply Problems.
ESP.TRADUIT: 供应问题

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Hey, Mitchell, what the hell is going on over there?
I requisitioned six (6) of those brand new assaultron units units last week. Just this morning, we were delighted to find a shipment of protectrons. Glitchy ones, too.
I know it's easy to confuse a clunky, ancient, obnoxious piece of scrap with faulty pathfinding with a state-of-the-art, sleek, deadly, weirdly sexual new-model assaultron, but get your shit together.
ESP.TRADUIT:
嘿，米切尔，那边到底是怎么回事？
上周我征用了六个这种全新的突袭者单位。就在今天早上，我们还很高兴地发现了一批保卫者，就是也有点毛病。
我知道很容易把一个笨重的，古老的，令人讨厌的有缺陷寻路系统的废品和和一个先进的，光滑的，致命的，诡异性感的新型攻击器搞混，但是请你振作起来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Request Denied
ESP.TRADUIT: 请求被拒绝

ESP.ORIGINAL:
I've been informed you wanted me to transfer Private Woodrugh to you. You think I don't know what your goal is? You disgust me, Gibson. You disgust everyone.
Request Denied. Commander Murton
ESP.TRADUIT:
我被告知你想让我把二等兵伍德鲁格调给你。你以为我不知道你的目的是什么？你让我恶心，吉布森，你让所有人厌恶。
请求被拒绝。 - 莫顿指挥官

ESP.ORIGINAL: WHERE ARE MY ASSAULTRONS?!?!?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的突袭者在哪？！？！？

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Mitchell, get me my god damn assaultrons right now, or I will cleave your head in two with a battle axe!
These things are the top-of-the-line, ultra-lethal killing machines we need, if we're going to put those zipperheads out of comission. They've already been approved, and by my understanding, deployed, and yet... you're telling me there are none to be had. In Washington.
That's ridiculous, and a sorry excuses if you think I won't see your incompetence. Get me my assaultrons, or so help me god, I'll come for you. In fact, I'm giving you a time limit. If there aren't any assaultrongs over here by 10:00am on the 23rd, your ass is mine.
ESP.TRADUIT:
米切尔，马上给我找到我的突袭者，不然我就用战斧把你的头劈成两半！
如果我们要让那些拉链头赶走的话，那么这些东西是我们需要的最顶级的，致命的杀人机器。它们已经被批准，据我所知已经部署了，但是...你告诉我没有，在华盛顿。
这太荒谬了，如果你认为我看不到你的无能，那真是个令人遗憾的借口。带我的突袭者来，否则我发誓，我一定会来找你的。这是最后通牒，如果23号早上10点前这里还没有任何突袭者，你就死定了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Duties
ESP.TRADUIT: 职责

ESP.ORIGINAL:
20, I'm taking another walk. You will lead until I get back. Keep the crews in line. I do not want to have to reunite my army when I return. I have advice:
First, get Steak Knife into the Trench. His crew is too small to operate on it's own, though he seems to believe it's better his way. Some idiot technique he picked up in his little powder gang. Tired of his whining. If he disobeys you, crush his skull.
Samir should remain in his tunnel. With the passage into the Mojave sealed, his clearing is an adequate place to ambush travelers. All the same, he has been quite clear in his desire to supplant you as my second. If he manages to kill you, he will have earned the chance. It may be in your benefit to preemptively crush his skull.
Worm is too far to get a hold of. Some rumors say he was killed. I hope that's true, but if it isn't, crush his skull. I don't trust a man who does not blink.
Lastly, Wilson must fortify his section of the pass. His region is as narrow a bottleneck as can be found in the region. And yet, it remains clear and free, because he would rather spend his time with whores. Is he too weak to lay with a woman without paying for her time? Give him the rest of the day to secure the pass, or else you will crush his skull.
Hader
ESP.TRADUIT:
20，我要再去散散步，在我回来之前部队由你来领导。让全体队员守规矩，我可不想回来的时候还要重新召集我的军队。
我给你的建议是:
首先，把牛排刀安排到战壕里。他的队伍太小，无法独立运作，尽管他似乎认为这是更好的方式。他在自己的小炸药帮里学到的都是一些愚蠢的技巧，我已经厌倦了他的抱怨。如果他不听话，就敲碎他的脑袋。
萨米尔应该留在他的隧道里。进入莫哈韦沙漠的通道被封锁了，他的空地是伏击旅行者的好地方。当然，你应该很清楚他想取代你做我的副手，如果他杀了你，他就会赢得这个机会。先捏碎他的脑袋也许对你有好处。
沃姆太远了，找不到他了。有传言说他被杀了，我希望这是真的，但如果不是，你需要砸碎他的头骨。我不相信一个不眨眼的人。
最后，威尔逊必须加固他的那一段关口。他所在的地区是最狭窄的瓶颈，然而，它仍然是清晰和自由的，因为他宁愿把时间花在妓女身上。他是不是太软弱了，不花钱就不能和女人上床？给他今天剩下的时间来确保通行，否则你最好砸碎他的脑袋。
- 哈德尔

ESP.ORIGINAL: Eliza's Note
ESP.TRADUIT: 伊丽莎的笔记

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Unbelievable. Really. Are you fucking kidding me? I seem to recall being told you guys were a gang of badasses and "freedom fighters" or something. Yeah, freedom fighters. Sure, if you consider freedom to be the same thing as slurping on big-scary-boss-man Hader's dick all goddamn day. You spineless bunch of hypocritical dickheads.
In the meanwhile, fuck all of you. You can kiss my ass. I'll see about joining the Khans, I think. You won't see me around here again, and if you do, I'm going to fill you all with lead.
Case in point: I killed Jim while he was taking a piss, and I was gonna kill Tina this morning but, she was naked and I got distracted, so I just knocked her out. Anyway, any of y'all want to make this personal and come after me, I say bring it on, bitches.
Eliza Kinney
ESP.TRADUIT:
真的难以置信，你他妈开什么玩笑？我好像记得有人跟我说过你们是一帮坏蛋和"自由战士"之类的。是的，自由战士，当然如果你们认为自由和整吸大老板哈德尔的鸡巴是一回事的话，你们这群没骨气的伪君子。
与此同时，操你们所有人，舔我的屁股吧傻逼们，我会去加入大汗帮的，我不会再出现在这里了，如果你们再出现在我面前，我就把你们都灌满铅。
举个例子，我在吉姆尿尿的时候杀了他，我今天早上本来要杀蒂娜的，但是她光着身子，我分心了，所以我就把她打晕了。不管怎样，如果你们有谁想针对我，那就放马过来，贱人们。
- 伊丽莎·金尼

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bloody Holotape
ESP.TRADUIT: 血腥的全息磁带

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Sammy, this is your father. I wish I could be with you right now, son. I really do. But I have a chance to save you, and if that means I have to be away from you and your mother, than so be it.
That doctor can cure you, boy, and daddy is making sure we can afford it. I've got a load of cargo from up north. I'm gonna sell it off, and send the money back home. If you're reading this, than the money has already arrived, because I'm gonna send this message along with it.
I can't be home until this business is taken care of, but I want you to know that I'm doing this for you.
I love you, son.
ESP.TRADUIT:
萨米，我是你爸爸。我真希望现在能和你在一起，儿子。但我必须离开你和你母亲才能救你，真的，我只能选择这样。
那个医生能治好你，孩子，爸爸在确保我们能负担得起。我有一车从北方来的货物，我要卖掉它，把钱寄回家。如果你在看这篇文章，那就说明钱已经到了，因为我会把这条信息和它一起发送出去。
在这事解决之前我不能回家，但我想让你知道我这么做是为了你。
我爱你，儿子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Warning Letter
ESP.TRADUIT: 警告信

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Mrs. Tasha Martingale
This is the last friendly letter we will be sending you. We both know that, due to our lovely eminant domain laws, "your" property will invariably cease being so within the coming months. Due to the nature of your last correspondance with us, we have taken the fair and reasonable offer off the table. This is your doing. Now, you are left with two choices.
1. You and your husband and your baby gather your belongings and leave at once. That will be the end of our business, and we shall endeavor to never deal with you ever again.
2. Your husband's sordid criminal history becomes a concern to us, and we're forced to call CPS to make sure your baby is safe from the monsterously unsafe conditions you are subjecting it to via your continued association with convicted criminal Pablo Martingale.
I'm not a cruel man, and I understand that this is something of a lose/lose scenario for you. While that is entirely your fault for your behavior towards us earlier, I can't help but want to help you. I'm sure a better deal could be worked out if you were to come by my office, say, evening, this sunday? Of course, it's a small space, so this would only be feasible if you came alone. If you really want to show your commitment, may I suggest something tight and low-cut?
Daryl Fischer North Wind Power Company
ESP.TRADUIT:
塔莎·马丁格尔夫人
这是我们寄给您的最后一封友好的信。我们都知道，由于我们可爱卓越的领地法，"你的"财产将在未来几个月内永远不再属于你。由于贵方上次来函的性质，我方已放弃了公平合理的报价，这都是你的功劳。现在，你有两个选择。
第一，你和你的丈夫还有你的孩子收拾好你们的东西马上离开。我们的生意到此为止，我们将尽力不再和你来往。
第二，你丈夫肮脏的犯罪史让我们很担心，我们不得不给儿童保护署打电话以确保你的孩子不会因为你和罪犯巴勃罗·马丁格尔的持续交往而被置于极其不安全的环境中。
我不是一个残忍的人，我知道这对你来说是一种双输的局面。虽然你之前对我们的行为完全是你的错，但我还是忍不住想帮你。我相信如果您能在这个星期天晚上到我的办公室来，我们可以达成更好的交易。当然，这是个小地方，所以只有你一个人来的时候才可行。如果你真的想表达你的承诺，我可以建议你穿紧身低胸的衣服吗?
- 达里尔·菲舍尔 北风电力公司

ESP.ORIGINAL: To my brothers
ESP.TRADUIT: 给我的兄弟

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Jim-Jam, Slim-Slam, I'm sorry.
I sought to put an end to the mighty Cazador Queen. With her death, I would prove my worth as an heir to the Master. But the queen bested me. I feel the poison in my blood, and her larvae writhing in my flesh.
I want you two to go to Jacobstown. Find Marcus. You're good at heart, brothers. Don't fall in with the wrong crowd. I shall miss you both.
Ezekial
Zim-Zam
ESP.TRADUIT:
吉姆·果酱，斯利姆·猛撞，对不起。
我想要终结强大的猎蜂女王。她死了，我就能证明我作为主教继承人的价值。但女王胜过了我，我感觉到我血液里的毒素，她的幼虫在我的肉里翻滚。
我希望你们俩去雅各布斯镇，去找马可世。兄弟们，你们有颗善良的心，不要和坏人混在一起。我会想念你们俩的。
埃泽基亚尔
- 齐姆·赞姆

ESP.ORIGINAL: Madsen Bounties
ESP.TRADUIT: 马德森赏金

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Notice to all interested parties. (How's that for mayoral?)
The town of Madsen is now accepting bounties on the following individuals:
Hader: This one is the big priority. All of those raider crews running roughshod through the valley answer to Hader. How did one guy manage to wrangle all these gangs that are normally at each other's throats? Simple, by being fucking seven-feet-tall and strong as a Deathclaw. Anyone takes him down, you've earned a big-ass payday. Location unknown.
20K: Hader's second-in-command. He mostly serves to relay Hader's orders from crew to crew, but he does actually command some respect with his underlings. He used to be in the Kings, so god only knows how he ended up a shot-caller in a serious gang.
Steak Knife: This guy's credentials, as far as I can gather, consist of having a dumbass moniker, and an unhealthy obsession with bladed instruments. Probably also dynamite, on account of him being one of those goofy escaped convicts from the south. Because he's so goddamn close to the town, it's Colin Luke's responsibility to deal with him. If someone else does it instead, because Colin is a lazy ass, guess who's going to pay the reward out of his own pocket?
Spooky Mountain Ghoul Bitch: This one isn't actually a raider, but I'd like her to die violently, all the same. Don't know much about her, just that she's some crazy ghoul living in the mountains, killing anyone and everyone she can get her rotting hands on.
Samir: This one likes throwing his weight around, but he isn't as important as he claims. Near as I can tell, his only job is securing the tunnel that leads into the Mojave. That in mind, killing him should do wonders for traffic into Madsen.
El Generalisimo: Ever wonder why the raiders up here are so well-armed? Because this guy got his greasy paws on an old-world armory and got his crew locked and loaded with seriously high-end shit. He has to pay, plain and simple.
Worm: Might be redundant to list this one. From the sound of things, he's trying to consolidate power to usurp Hader's control of the gangs. No way in hell he could pull that off, so he'll probably get killed by his boss.
Authorized and written by Irene, high war-chief of the Road Snakes and mayor of Madsen.
ESP.TRADUIT:
通知有关各方。(市长怎么样？)
马德森镇现在接受以下人员的赏金:
哈德尔：这是最紧急的，所有在山谷里横行霸道的掠夺者都是哈德尔的手下。一个人是怎么搞定这些通常互相争斗的帮派的?很简单，因为他有七英尺高，像死亡爪一样强壮。谁能扳倒他，你就能赚一大笔钱。位置未知。
20k：哈德尔的副手。他主要负责把哈德尔的命令传递给每个人，但他确实赢得了下属的尊重。他以前是猫王帮的，所以天知道他是怎么成为一个重要帮派的头目的。
牛排刀：据我所知，这家伙的资历包括这愚蠢的绰号，以及对刀片器械的病态痴迷。也可能是炸药，因为他是从南方来的那些愚蠢的逃犯之一。他离镇子太近了，对付他是科林·卢克的责任。因为科林是个懒鬼，所以如果别人搞定了他，猜猜谁会自己掏腰包支付报酬?
幽灵山食尸鬼婊子：这不是一个真正的掠夺者，但我希望她也能一样死于暴力。我不太了解她，只知道她是个住在山里的狂尸鬼，杀了所有她能染指的人。
萨米尔：这个人喜欢发号施令，但他并不像他声称的那么重要。据我所知，他唯一的工作就是保护通往莫哈韦沙漠的隧道。考虑到这一点，杀了他应该会给马德森的交通带来奇迹。
大元帅：想知道为什么这个掠夺者的装备如此精良吗？因为这家伙在旧世界的军械库里把他的手下都锁定并装上了非常高端的东西。他必须付出代价，就这么简单。
沃姆：列出这个傻逼可能有点多余。听起来，他是想篡夺哈德尔对帮派的控制权。不过他绝对不可能做到，所以他很可能会被他的老板杀了。
授权并由艾琳撰写，她是公路蟒蛇帮的高级军事长官和马德森镇镇长。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Caleb's Letter
ESP.TRADUIT: 凯莱布的信

ESP.ORIGINAL:
&PCName;
As you can probably see, I'm no longer here. I'm sorry for lying to you, but as I said before, my work is more important than some ranger's vendetta.
While I did take advantage of your absence to move onward, those slavers weren't just a distraction. You saw, first-hand, what sorts of men they were. You should know, more than anything else, that they deserve worse than death. The only reason I still walk this earth is an obligation to cleanse it of scum like them.
It was men like the ones I had you kill that cut my wife down. And it's because of men like them that I spend every waking moment fearing for my daughter's safety. And as long as their sort still continue to suck air, I cannot allow myself to submit to death, even if it is well earned.
I'd like you to have my rifle, and use it to cleanse this world. I'd also like if you reported back to Early and told him that I was dead and gone, so he'd stop hunting me and interrupting my work. If not, and you still believe me to be a monster, than maybe one day we'll have our shootout. Maybe you'll kill me with the rifle I gave you. I'd rather you use it to help me make the world better than it was when I found it.
Caleb Alquist
ESP.TRADUIT:
&PCName;
你可能已经知道了，我已经不在这里了。很抱歉我骗了你，但就像我之前说的，我的工作比某个游骑兵的复仇更重要。
虽然我确实利用了你不在的机会继续前进，但那些奴隶贩子并不仅仅是用来分散你的注意力的，你应该亲眼看到了他们是什么样的人。最重要的是，他们应该受到比死亡更糟糕的惩罚，我还活着的唯一原因就是有义务清除他们这样的人渣。
就是我让你杀的那些人杀了我妻子。正是因为他们这样的人存在我不得不每时每刻都担心我女儿的安全。只要他们这种人还在呼吸空气，我就不能让自己屈服于死亡，即使它是应得的。
我想让你拿着我的步枪，用它来净化这个世界。我还希望你能向厄尔利报告我已经死了，这样他就不会再追杀我，打扰我的工作了。如果不是，或者你还认为我是个怪物，那么也许有一天我们会有一场枪战。也许你会用我给你的步枪杀了我。但我更希望你用它来帮助我，让这个世界变得比我发现它时更好。
- 凯莱布·阿尔奎斯特

ESP.ORIGINAL: Warning Notice
ESP.TRADUIT: 警告通知

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Hey everyone! If any of you wants to resupply on hot weapons, ammo, and high-explosives, please stop on by my shop, and don't directly grab the stuff from my storage shed, OK? I understand the urge to hang out in the shed, since it's full of awesome shit, but it's unsafe, OK? As in explode-y unsafe! Like, legitimately, this thing could explode any second, so just leave it alone and let me handle it. Awesome, thanks!
May Ito
ESP.TRADUIT:
嘿，大家好！如果你们谁想补充热武器，弹药和烈性炸药，请到我的店里来，不要直接从我的仓库里拿东西，好吗？我理解你想待在小屋里的冲动，因为里面全是很棒的东西，但那不安全，好吗？炸药不安全！这东西随时都可能爆炸，所以别管它，让我来处理。真棒，谢谢!
- 伊藤梅

ESP.ORIGINAL: Moist Holotape
ESP.TRADUIT: 潮湿的全息磁带

ESP.ORIGINAL: REMEMBER THE SCENT OF MOTHER!
ESP.TRADUIT: 记住妈妈的气息！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Centurion's Orders
ESP.TRADUIT: 百夫长的命令

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Centurion Cillus
Your orders in the region dubbed "The North Road" are threefold.
1. Claim as much ground as possible. Communities are starting to form in the region, and they will likely fold over if confronted by the might of the Legion.
2. There is an independent band of slavers in the area. Contact has already been established. They can be considered allies, for the moment. Evaluate their captures. You have full authorization to pay for any you deem worthy.
3. The last man to occupy your position led his centuria into the region, and offered them to a regional raider tribe, as a sacrificial tribute. He slaughtered all 80 of his men, and crowned himself the warchief.
You don't have a full centuria at your disposal, and for that I am sorry. However, Frumentarius Stones-Thunder has successfully courted the favor of a large raider band in the Mojave. Once this is finalized, he will transfer them north, where they shall supplement your own forces. Their warlord, a degenerate calling himself "Big Daddy" will have to be killed as soon as his men are broken in.
ESP.TRADUIT:
百夫长西尔卢斯
你在"北路"地区的命令有三。
第一，尽可能多的占领土地。社区开始在该地区形成，如果面对军团的强大力量，他们可能会垮台。
第一，这个地区有一群独立的奴隶贩子已经与我们建立了联系。目前，他们可以被视为盟友。评估他们捕获的奴隶，你有权为任何你认为值得的东西付钱。
第三，最后一个担任你目前职位的人带领他的百人队进入了这个地区，并将他们献给了一个地区掠夺者部落作为祭品。他屠杀了他所有的80个部下，并把自己封为大酋长。
你可没有整整一个世纪的时间，为此我很抱歉。然而，帝国特务雷霆之石已经成功地获得了莫哈韦沙漠一大群掠夺者的青睐。一旦这件事定下来，他会把他们带到北方，在那里他们可以用来补充你的部队。他们的军阀，一个自称“大老爹”的堕落的人，一旦他的手下加入你们，就把他杀掉。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Formal Contract
ESP.TRADUIT: 正式合同

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Hello, Matheson. I hope this letter finds you well.
Sadly, my employer is not faring well, himself. You see, some murderer-for-hire killed his only son. He's been locked in his study for days, now. As his representative in these sorts of personal matters, I've taken it upon myself to avenge this travesty.
You know what needs to be done. The target is named &PCName;.
Make it as painful as you can without compromising your effectiveness, and I'll pay you double whatever you're earning from Sullivan.
Zed
ESP.TRADUIT:
你好，马西森，我希望你收到这封信时一切都好。
遗憾的是，我的雇主自己也过得不太好。有个雇佣杀手杀了他唯一的儿子，他把自己锁在书房里好几天了，作为他在这些私人事务上的代表，我要亲自为这场闹剧进行报复。
你知道该做什么，目标名为&PCName;。
在不影响工作效率的前提下，尽量让他痛苦，我会付你从苏利文那里赚的双倍的钱。
- 泽德

ESP.ORIGINAL: Washington Note
ESP.TRADUIT: 华盛顿笔记

ESP.ORIGINAL:
I am sorry, Bertrand. While I do indeed love you with all my heart, I simply cannot escape from the reality that I love Gallo with all my heart AND all my soul! He needs me! But more to the point, I need him! I am going east. I shall not stop until I am nestled with him, deep in the depths of the sewer.
I'm coming home, my sweet baby boy! I'm coming, and I'm bringing Nuka with me!
ESP.TRADUIT:
对不起，伯特兰。虽然我确实全心全意地爱着你，但我也无法逃避我全心全意地爱着加洛的现实！他需要我！但更重要的是，我需要他！我要去东部，除非我和他依偎在一起，深埋在阴沟深处，否则我不会停止。
我要回家了，我亲爱的宝贝！我来了，我要带努卡一起去！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Groundskeeper's Log
ESP.TRADUIT: 场地管理员的日志

ESP.ORIGINAL:
June. 3
I saw Ms. Fogerty with that Burke boy again today. From all the liquor being wasted, I assume it was that hooligan's 21st recently. Why such a respectable woman would dally with rabble like that is beyond me. But it isn't my concern. If I told Mr. Fogerty, he'd fire me for insulting her honor. This job doesn't pay well enough for me to do detective work and prove his wife is sleeping around on him.
Sept. 17th
One of the windows to my shed was broken, and there was a dead rabbit rotting on my floor. Single shot in the carcass. Someone killed it and waited for it to start attracting flies before doing this. I know who I blame. There's something wrong with that boy. With that whole family. I remember his pa back in school. The way he would leer at the middle-school girls. Whatever problem he had, it's in the blood now.
Oct. 11th
I went inside for a glass of water. In the kitchen, I found Ms. Fogerty and the Burke boy in a... primal moment. I don't think they saw me before I got the hell out of there.
Oct. 13th
I overheard Ms. Fogerty on the phone before I got to kitchen. She said she was pregnant. She promised the person she was speaking with that "Steven will never know it isn't his." She laughed at something. "If I divorced him, I'd lose everything I have."
Oct. 18th
I haven't seen Mr. Fogerty in four days. His car is still there, and I haven't heard of anything that would be distracting him. I get paid tomorrow. If he still isn't around, I suppose I'll ask the wife. It feels wrong to me. I think I'll look for work elsewhere.
Oct. 19th
I have to get out of here. I can't
ESP.TRADUIT:
6月3日
我今天又看到福格蒂女士和那个叫伯克的男孩在一起。从浪费的酒来看，我猜是那个流氓最近的第21次了。我真搞不懂，这么一个受人尊敬的女人怎么会跟这样的垃圾调情。但这不关我的事，因为就算我告诉福格蒂先生，他也会因为我侮辱了她的名誉而解雇我。这份工作的薪水可不够让我去做侦探证明他的妻子在跟别人鬼混。
9月17日
我棚子的一扇窗户坏了，地板上有一只腐烂的死兔子，有人杀了它，然后等它开始吸引苍蝇后再一枪打中它的尸体。我知道是谁干的了。那个男孩有点不对劲。和全家人一起。我记得他爸爸上学的时候向中学女生抛媚眼的样子。不管他有什么问题，现在都在血里了。
10月11日
我进去喝了一杯水。我发现福格蒂女士和伯克家的男孩在厨房里...释放原始的本能。我想他们在我离开之前没看到我。
10月13日
我去厨房前无意中听到福格蒂女士在打电话，她说她怀孕了。她向和她谈话的人保证说:“史蒂文永远不会知道那不是他的。”她因为什么事笑着说。“如果我和他离婚，我会失去我所有的一切。”
10月18日
我已经四天没见过福格蒂先生了，他的车还在，我也没听说有什么能让他分心的事。我明天领工资。如果他还不在，我想我会问问他妻子。(我觉得不太对劲)我想我会去别处找工作。
10月19日
我得离开这里。我不能

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mercenary Tape
ESP.TRADUIT: 雇佣兵磁带

ESP.ORIGINAL: Make it Clean
ESP.TRADUIT: 把他解决掉

ESP.ORIGINAL:
I know we're supposed to be avoiding the Mojave, but I need you to take a trip, all the same. Outer Vegas, specifically. South of the city is some NCR farm, but as much fun as it would be to burn the thing to the dust, that isn't why you're going there. No, there's a house next to the farm that belonged to a man named Frederick Przybylski, though apparently he calls himself "Big Daddy" now. I'll blame that bit of idiocy on dementia, since he's an old man.
If he happens to be home, kill him. Make it clean and quick. You could say he raised me, so I don't want you to make him suffer. If he isn't home, or after you've killed him, burn the house down to the foundation.
The NCR will be right outside, so if any killing happens, make it silent. Tell him that I sent you, and he'll drop his guard. I'll say it once more: Make it fast and painless.
He may not be home. If so, just burn the place and then come back.
Sheridan
ESP.TRADUIT:
我知道我们应该避开莫哈韦沙漠，但我还是需要你去维加斯外围一趟。特别是城南那个NCR农场，虽然把它烧成灰烬很有趣，但这不是你去那里的原因。不，农场旁边有栋房子是一个叫弗雷德里克·普兹比斯基的人的，不过他现在自称"大老爹"了。我会把他的愚蠢归咎于痴呆症，因为他是个老人。
如果他碰巧在家，你就杀了他，干净利落的。可以说是他养大了我，所以我不希望你让他太痛苦。如果他不在家，或者在你杀了他之后，把房子烧成平地。
NCR就在附近，所以如果发生战斗，不要多说话。告诉他是我派你来的，他就会放松警惕。我再强调一遍:干净利落点。
他可能不在家。如果是这样，就把那地方烧掉，然后再回来。
- 谢里丹

ESP.ORIGINAL: Petey's Note
ESP.TRADUIT: 佩蒂的笔记

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Peter, why haven't I heard from you in so long? I don't understand why you have to go to that nasty Mojave when you have a family that loves you here in California. Why won't you be with us, Peter? Why don't you love your family?
Harry said you were going to be a bounty hunter. I told him that's ridiculous. You'd never do something dangerous like that, right? You know how I worry about you, Peter!
Are you making sure to keep hydrated? It gets thirsty out in all that sun! And I hope you have warm socks, in case you run into a freak blizzard.
Why do you want us to call you Petey? Peter was your uncle's name. Are you ashamed to be named after your uncle Peter? Don't you love your family anymore?
Love, Mom
P.S. Remember to have snacks with you in case you get hungry!
ESP.TRADUIT:
彼得，为什么这么久都没有你的消息？我不明白你为什么要去那个讨厌的莫哈韦，你在加州有爱你的家人。你为什么不和我们呆在一起，彼得？你为什么不爱你的家人？
哈里说你要去当赏金猎人，我告诉他这太荒谬了，你绝对不会做这种危险的事，对吗？你知道我有多担心你，彼得！
你有在多喝水吗？太阳那么大你肯定会口渴的！我希望你也准备了厚袜子，以防你遇到突如其来的暴风雪。
你为什么想让我们叫你佩蒂？彼得是你叔叔的名字，以你彼得叔叔的名字命名让你感到羞耻吗？你不再爱你的家人了吗？
爱你的，妈妈
附：记得随身带零食，以防你突然饿了！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bounty Hunter's Journal
ESP.TRADUIT: 赏金猎人的日记

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Been tracking this kid for the past few days. Decent price on his head, which means plenty of food for me. He's hired some local mercs to run protection for him in the valley, here. Tough enough bastards, I guess, but I've dealt with them.
There's a mansion dead ahead. Folks in Madsen say he's holed up in there, so that's where I'm headed at first light.
Hunkered down in the skeleton of an old house for the night. Better cover for the wind than anywhere else around. It had a basement I almost slept in, but I heard something skittering around down there. Nothing good, so I left it shut.
Going to bed now. Tomorrow, I nab Burke.
ESP.TRADUIT:
过去几天我一直在追踪这孩子，他的头价值不菲，这对我来说意味着充足的食物。他雇了一些当地的雇佣兵在山谷里保护他，就在这儿。这些混蛋够狠的，但我和他们打过交道。
正前方有一座宅邸。马德森的人说他躲在那里，所以天一亮我就去那里了。
躲在一幢旧房子的废墟里过夜，这比其他地方更能避风。有个地下室我差点就睡在里面了，但我听到有东西在下面晃动。没什么好东西，所以我把它关上了。
现在该睡觉了。明天，我要抓住伯克。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Orders
ESP.TRADUIT: 命令

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ranger Forsier, your current orders are to operate undercover, in order to gather intelligence regarding possible the possible drug trade in Outer Vegas. Make careful note of all traffic to and from the 22nd room of the old Tiki Tonga apartment complex, located south of Westside. Make special note of any Great Khans that you see. Discretion is paramount.
ESP.TRADUIT: 游骑兵弗西尔，你目前的任务是卧底，搜集有关在外维加斯可能发生的毒品交易的情报。仔细记录所有进出旧提基·汤加公寓大楼(位于西区南部)22号房间的情况。特别注意你看到的任何大汗帮成员。谨慎行事是最重要的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Change of Plans
ESP.TRADUIT: 计划变更

ESP.ORIGINAL:
When was the last time you guys saw Hader? Yeah, that's what I thought. Giant prick is never around the valley, but we're supposed to just do whatever it is he'd want? Fuck that. Anyway, remember how he took charge around here? If he's willing to betray his whole squad of Legion guys, what the fuck are the chances he won't sell us down the river as soon as it's convenient for him? Fuck him, for real. I've got it worked out with Samir, down south. We lay all our firepower on Madsen from the north while Samir's bastards attack the south. We do that, the whole valley is ours. After that, we can throw Hader on a tire-fire and watch him scream. In the mean time, keep this to yourself. Most of these dumbshit thugs are probably loyal to him, Samir included.
Mr. Worm
ESP.TRADUIT:
你们最后一次见到哈德尔是什么时候？是的，我就是这么想的，这个大混蛋从来都不在山谷里，但我们就该按他说的做吗？操他妈的，还记得他是怎么掌控这里的吗？如果他连军团的人都可以背叛，那他有多大可能不会在方便的时候出卖我们？操他妈，真的，我和南边的萨米尔谈妥了，我们从北方把所有火力都对准马德森，然后萨米尔的兄弟从南方进攻。如果我们这么做，整个山谷就是我们的了，之后，我们可以把哈德尔扔到点燃的轮胎上看他尖叫。与此同时，别把这件事告诉别人。这些蠢货暴徒中的大多数可能都忠于他，萨米尔也不例外。
- 沃姆先生

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wanted Fugitive!
ESP.TRADUIT: 通缉逃犯！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Notice to all law-abiding peoples of the NCR and/or greater Mojave Wasteland.
The following individual, ADAM TYLER BURKE, is wanted on charges of aggravated assault, rape, abuse of a child, obstruction of justice, evasion of justice, and bribing a government official. For these crimes against the good people of the New California Republic, the following bounty of 3000 CAPS is payable upon the successful capture of the fugitive so that he may stand trial. A bounty of 500 CAPS is payable upon the successful termination of the fugitive.
Target name: Adam Tyler Burke
Race: Caucasian
DoB: 13/09/2259
ESP.TRADUIT:
通知NCR以及莫哈韦荒原所有守法的人民。
以下个人，亚当·泰勒·伯克，因被控故意伤害罪、强奸罪、虐待儿童罪、妨碍司法公正罪、逃避司法惩罚罪以及贿赂政府官员罪而被通缉。鉴于他对新加州共和国的善良人民犯下的罪行，任何捉拿他接受审判的人都可以获得3000瓶盖的赏金。成功抓获逃犯者可获得500瓶盖的赏金。
目标姓名：亚当·泰勒·伯克
种族：白种人
日期：2259年9月13日

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good News!
ESP.TRADUIT: 福音！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Citizens of Madsen, we come bearing good news! Our lord and savior, Gecko Jesus, is risen! Praise be unto Gecko Jesus! Praise him, praise him!
Rejoice, our Lord walks among us once more!
ESP.TRADUIT:
马德森的市民们，我们带来了福音！我们的主和救世主，蜥蜴耶稣复活了！赞美蜥蜴耶稣！赞美他，赞美他！
喜乐吧，我们的主又在我们中间行走了！

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you doing?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在干什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Listen up, Steak Knife. I don't know how much you know about us, but the big boss man doesn't like you. Hell, I don't fucking like you. You're here solely through the grace of Samir sticking his sweaty neck out for you.
So, that in mind, what the fuck are you doing, ignoring orders and doing your own thing? Hader wants us to band together so we can hit Madsen and actually do some fucking damage. If Hader says jump, motherfucker, you get your ass in the air! You know he used to be in the fucking legion? You think he's gonna give you a pass if you keep going off to play grab-ass when you're supposed to be in the Trench, getting ready to strike?
Smarten up, or I got authorization to paste your ass and take command of your crew. That's a promise, not a threat.
20K
ESP.TRADUIT:
听好了，牛排刀。我不知道你对我们了解多少，但大老板不喜欢你。见鬼，我他妈不喜欢你。你能在这里完全是因为萨米尔为你出头。
所以，你他妈到底在干什么，无视命令，做自己的事？哈德尔想让我们联合起来这样我们就能袭击马德森，真正地搞点破坏。如果哈德尔让你跳，混蛋，你就把你的屁股放在空中！你知道他以前是他妈的军团吗？你觉得准备进攻的时候你却躲在战壕里他会放过你吗？
放聪明点，我完全可以揍扁你然后指挥你的手下。这是承诺，不是威胁。
- 20K

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mayor's Decree
ESP.TRADUIT: 市长的法令

ESP.ORIGINAL:
In case any of you aren't up to speed, I'll make it quick. Your old chief is dead, at my hand. His successor, your amigo Colin Luke, has ceded authority to me. In case the matter still wasn't settled, that fuckwit Dooley challenged me for the title. I beat him squarely (may have broken a couple fingers. He'll get better.) so my new position as gang boss is beyond dispute.
As the new boss, I'll be making some changes.
1. No more banditry. Caravans and travelers are to be treated fairly and without hostility. If anyone attacks you, you can defend yourselves. Hader's gang, Legion, and those slaver fucks in the Rio Grande, are free game. Raid them all you want.
2. Any non-residents passing through the town MUST pay a one-time toll of 1000 caps. We're not going to be a town of bums.
3. Be fucking civilized. No killing unless it's a case of you or them. No raping, no stabbing, no slaving, no stealing. Drugs, whores, gambling, street-fighting, and day-drinking are all good.
4. We welcome outside trade. All forms of currency are accepted here.
5. Business owners will be expected to make a small contribution to the town fund every month. It's not really a tax so much as your monthly rent. If you want to set up outside the walls, it's all free, and good fucking luck with that.
Supreme mayor-for-life Chief of the Road Snakes
Irene
ESP.TRADUIT:
如果你们中有人不了解情况，我就说直接点。你的老首领死死在我手上了。他的继任者，你们的朋友科林·卢克已经把权力交给了我。为了防止有人觉得这事还没解决，我得告诉你们，那傻逼杜利来挑战我的地位，我彻底打败了他(可能断了几根手指，他会好起来的)，所以我作为帮派老大的地位是毋庸置疑的。
作为新的老大，我会做一些改变。
第一：不再有强盗行为了，商队和旅行者应该受到公平和没有敌意的对待。如果有人攻击你们，你们可以自卫。哈德尔的团伙、军团、还有里约大酒店那些该死的奴隶贩子，都可以随心所欲的对付他们。
第二：任何经过该镇的非居民必须一次性缴纳1000瓶盖的通行费。我们不会成为一个流浪汉之城。
第三：是他妈的文明。除非是你或他们的案子，否则不能杀人、强奸、持刀伤人、奴役、偷窃。毒品，妓女，赌博，街头斗殴，白天喝酒都是很好的。
第四：我们欢迎对外贸易，这里接受各种货币。
第五：企业主每个月都要向镇上的公共基金捐一小笔钱，这不是一种税收，而是你的月租。如果你想在墙外设点，那是完全免费的，祝你好运。
最高终身市长 公路蟒蛇帮首领 - 艾琳

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll eat your fucking heart!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要吃了你的心脏！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You cowardly bitch! I bet you're curled into a little ball, pissing in your britches in fear of me and my babygirl Linda! We're gonna fuck you up, you fucker! Nobody walks away from this company, nobody nobody NOBODY!! Brandice made me the second-in-command, he gave ME the power armor, so that means you don't get to disobey my orders! You got Linda here so mad, she's begging me to let her beat you death! No shooting for you, no no, bad little babies get beaten or maybe drawn-and-quartered, haha! I'll be the one to do it! Is the little deserter baby crying because big bad Brennan is being a meanie? Are you gonna make a mess in your pants, little baby? Men don't walk out of this outfit, so you clearly aren't a man! I bet you got a little vagina down there, you stupid fucking dickhead! Fuck you! I hope a fucking mutated bear rapes you to death! Fuck you fuck you fuck you bitch, fucking kill yourself before I fucking kill you with my hands motherfucker! I'll eat your goddamn coward's heart! Linda says I should cut off your head and boil it and turn your skull into a fucking coffee cup! I MIGHT DO IT, HAHAHAHA!!!
FUCK YOU Captain Brennan, motherfucker!!!
ESP.TRADUIT:
你这个懦弱的婊子！我打赌你怕我和我的宝贝女儿琳达，现在一定蜷缩成一团，尿在裤子里！我们会让你完蛋的，你个混蛋！没人能离开这家公司，没有人，没有人，没有人！布兰迪斯让我当二把手，他给了我动力装甲，所以这意味着你不能违抗我的命令！你把琳达弄得很生气，她求我让她把你打死！不是开枪打你，不不，坏小孩会被打或者被分尸，哈哈！我会是做这件事的人！那个逃兵像婴儿一样哭是因为大坏蛋布伦南在耍流氓吗？你要把裤子弄得一团糟吗，小宝贝？男人不会从这身衣服里走出来，所以你显然不是男人！我打赌你下面有个小屄，你个傻逼！操你妈的！我希望有一只该死的变异的熊把你强奸致死！操你妈，操你妈，操你妈，婊子，在我用手杀了你之前自杀吧，混蛋！我要吃了你这懦夫的心脏！琳达说我应该把你的头砍下来煮开然后把你的头骨做成一个他妈的咖啡杯！我可能会试试，哈哈哈！！
操你妈 布伦南上尉，操你妈的！！！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Heard this one yet?
ESP.TRADUIT: 听过这个吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL:
God damn Richards shot this merc in the femoral, otherwise we'd could've collared the bitch and actually sell off a strong one. Still, before she bled out, I got her talking. Her people got hired on to bodyguard some VIP fugitive out of NCR. Worth looking into. Either we haul his ass back ourselves and get the reward money, or we let him pay us off. Sounds like he's got cash to spare. Either way, we should look into it. Tell Tex what I got, okay?
Bryant
ESP.TRADUIT:
该死的理查兹打中了这个雇佣兵的大腿动脉，否则我们就能逮住这个婊子然后卖个好货。但在她失血过多之前，我还是让她开口了。她的人被雇来护送一个重要逃犯逃出国家监狱。这值得调查一番，我们要么亲自把他拖回来拿赏金，要么让他给我们钱。听起来他有点闲钱，不管怎样，我们都应该调查一下。这件事告诉特克斯，知道了吗？
- 布莱恩特

ESP.ORIGINAL: May's Wish-List
ESP.TRADUIT: 梅的愿望清单

ESP.ORIGINAL:
1. Chinese Type 93 rifle(s)! I know, they're not the rarest firearms in the world, but I'd at least like one that hasn't been extensively fired, and definitely with no history of being pawed at by raiders. I happen to know that the old-world government liked to confiscate things like this. Meaning, I bet they got some mostly pristine, disassembled rifles somewhere. And, I also happen to know that a bit to the north of Madsen, there's an old military trash hole. Seems like that might be a good place to look! Also, I just want to draw attention to the phrase "trash hole" because it's great.
2. Spec-ops M1911A1! This is my favorite model of pistol, and this particular one has cool features/history. It belonged to a military special-forces operator, where it got extensive use for secret covert military badass things. To reward their guy for his good work, the government secured him a spot in one of their vaults. Vault 3, specifically. If the Fiends touched it, I will shit a house.
3. Type III Anti-materiel rifle prototype! Designed as a one-man power armor neutralizer, the rifle was planned to be mass-produced in the event that the Chinese got their own power armor working. But, things all exploded before that could happen, so there's only one of these rifles in existence. This is sexy, and I must have it. Fortunately, it should be close-by, up in the old armory north of town. I would have got it myself, but sadly, the armory is the HQ of one of the raider bands around here.
4. Museum-quality FN light machine gun! I read this ancient article about some pre-war weapon enthusiast, which is really the best kind of enthusiast. I guess he was planning to open his own little firearms exhibit, and to facilitate this, he got a bunch of pristine weapons ready for display. Now, a firearms exhibit sounds amazing, and in a perfect world, I would live there forever. But it's actually kind of a shit world, so everything got blown up before the exhibit could happen. The guns should be in a storage area in Vegas. I need this machine gun, or my life will be lame and worthless.
5. Prize-winning 870 Remington shotgun! Some pre-war guy used this gun a whole bunch, and impressed people into giving him a little golden cup and taking some pictures of dead animals. I don't really get it, but I want the shotgun, damn it! The previous owner lived alone in the mountains, and I got no idea how to get up there. But I bet you do!
6. Lever-action .44 Marlin! So, when I was a kid, this stranger with a badass rifle came through town. I begged him to let me shoot it, and eventually he agreed and I fired it once. It's the first gun I ever held, and I've been suffering separation anxiety for the entire decade since then. The dude said he lived in Bonnie Springs, so go there and find me that rifle! Please.
I dunno, I guess that's it for right now. Thanks a bunch, whoever I gave this letter to!
ESP.TRADUIT:
1.中国93式步枪！我知道它不是世界上最稀有的枪，但我至少想要一种没有被广泛使用过的枪，而且绝对没有被掠夺者用过的。我碰巧知道旧世界的政府喜欢没收这样的东西。意思是我猜他们肯定有一些原始的，拆过的步枪。我还碰巧知道，在马德森北边不远的地方，有一个旧的军事垃圾坑。看来那是个好地方!另外，我只是想让大家注意“垃圾坑”这个词，因为它很棒。
2. 特种作战M1911-A1！这是我最喜欢的手枪，它非常特别，有很酷的功能和历史。它属于一个军事特种部队操作员，在那里它被广泛用于秘密处决一些坏蛋。为了奖励他的出色工作，政府特别为他在3号避难所安排了一个位置。如果恶魔帮碰了它，我要在他们的房里拉屎。
3.原型Ⅲ反器材步枪！设计为一人用反动力装甲武器，该步枪计划在中国研发出动力装甲的情况下批量生产。但是，在那发生之前，所有东西都爆炸了，所以只有一把这样的步枪，太性感了，我非要不可。幸运的是它应该就在附近，在城镇北部的旧军械库。我本来想自己去的，但遗憾的是，军械库是这附近一个掠夺者的总部。
4. 文物级FN轻机枪！我读过一篇关于战前武器爱好者的古老文章，这是最好的武器爱好者。我猜他是打算开一个自己的小型枪械展，为了方便展出，他准备了一堆原始武器。如果在一个完美的世界里，枪支展览听起来很棒，我愿意永远生活在那里。但这其实是个狗屎世界，所以展览还没开始，一切就都毁了。枪应该在维加斯的仓库里。我需要这把轻机枪，否则我的生活就会变得一无是处。
5. 获奖的雷明顿M870霰弹枪！有个战前的家伙经常用这把枪，让人们给他一个小金杯还拍了一些动物尸体的照片。我不太明白，但我想要猎枪，该死的！以前的主人一个人住在山里，我不知道怎么去那儿，但我打赌你知道！
6. 马林.44杠杆步枪！当我还是个孩子的时候，有个陌生人带着一把很厉害的步枪穿过小镇，我求他让我开一枪，最后他同意了，我开了一次枪。这是我第一次拿枪，从那以后的十年里我一直在承受分离焦虑。那家伙说他住在邦妮泉，快去把枪给我找来！求你了。
我不知道了，我想现在就到这里吧。不管这封信给了谁！都非常感谢你！

ESP.ORIGINAL: What the fuck, May?
ESP.TRADUIT: 搞什么，梅？

ESP.ORIGINAL:
May, Dooley told me that he saw you dragging some fucking howitzer shells into your little munitions shack. That true? It shouldn't be true, because we don't have a goddamn howitzer in town. What in god's name would you want with a bunch of old-ass giant explosives? Nobody is going to want to buy them, so don't tell me they're for your shop. Throw them in the lake or something, but I don't want them in our walls, damn it. I mean it, get rid of them.
Colin Luke
(Someone, presumably May, has scribbled a response in obnoxiously bright red ink) Haha, no. I'm keeping 'em.
ESP.TRADUIT:
梅，杜利告诉我他看到你把榴弹炮弹拖进你的小军需品室。真的吗？这不应该是真的，因为我们镇上根本就没有榴弹炮。你要一堆又老又大的炸药干什么？没人想买，所以别告诉我是给你店里买的。把他们扔到湖里什么的，但我不想让他们在我们的墙里，该死。我是认真的，扔掉他们。
- 科林·卢克
(有人，大概是梅，用鲜艳得令人讨厌的红墨水草草写下了回复)
哈哈，不，我要留着。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nice job!
ESP.TRADUIT: 干得好！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Good work on finding those whores for us, Theo. Goddamn Wilson ain't sharing any of his bitches, even though he's got like four or five of them. I hear that Hader isn't too happy with Wilson's fucking terrible attempts at holding the passage, here. I'm not trying to kiss ass, but seriously, you've brought in more goodies than the "boss" ever has. If Hader does decide he's had enough of Billy Babydick, you should volunteer to take his place.
Oh, yeah, the mutant you were asking about? I guess he calls himself "Jim-Jam" for some reason. He's about as dumb as a bag of retarded hammers, so he'll do literally anything you say, as long as you don't insult him, and you preface your orders by saying his stupid name. I don't know where the guys found him, but I'm pretty sure there was a second one, acting as muscle for one of the other crews. Might be 20K's group? I don't really care enough to remember.
ESP.TRADUIT:
帮我们找妓女这事你干得不错，西奥。该死的威尔逊不肯分享他的婊子，虽然他有四五个。我听说哈德尔对威尔逊想要守住通道的糟糕想法不太满意。我不是想拍你马屁，但说真的，你带来的好东西比"老板"带来的还多。如果哈德尔觉得他受够了比利这个小鸡巴，你应该自告奋勇接替他的位置。
哦对了，你问那个变种人？我猜出于某种原因他叫自己"吉姆果酱"他就像一袋弱智棒槌一样蠢，所以你说什么他都会照做，只要你不侮辱他，而且在下达命令前先说出他愚蠢的名字。我不知道他们是在哪里找到他的，但我很确定还有一个人，是其他成员的保镖，可能是20K的团体？我不太记得了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Legion
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团

ESP.ORIGINAL:
The Legion has finally returned to the valley. I can make do with killing caravans and merchants, but there is nothing so sweet as the of killing Legionaries. I hope that they have made my death a priority. Let them come, all of them. I will bathe in Legion blood before I am slain. I will feel their bones break in my hands, and taste the iron of their blood as it spatters across my face.
They thought they broke me. It still makes me smile. I was a boy when they took me, but they thought I was so young I would forget my own name? The faces of my parents as they burned on a Legion pyre? My brothers, as they collared them and took them away? They thought I was too strong to be anything less than a warrior, though. Perhaps they were right about that. I remember Scipio telling me that I was the strongest Legionary he had ever seen, that I may one day be named Legate after Lanius. I suppose I'll never know, after my great victory as a centurion. Glorious. The way my century disarmed without question, and followed me into that pit. I still hear their cries as I ordered the raiders to gun them down. I will never hear a sweeter sound in all my days. Obedient to the last, they could never imagine that I was not broken.
Yes, let more come. Let the north run red with the blood of Caesar's dogs.
ESP.TRADUIT:
军团终于回到山谷了。我可以干掉商队和商人，但没有什么比干掉军团更让我开心的了。我希望他们把我的死放在第一位，让他们都来吧，在我被杀之前我会沐浴在军团的血中。我会感觉到他们的骨头在我的手中断裂，品尝他们的血溅在我脸上的滋味。
他们以为自己击垮了我。很好笑，他们带走我时我还是个男孩，但他们以为我这么小，会忘记自己的名字？我父母被烧死时的面容？我的兄弟们被抓走的时候？不过他们认为我太强壮了，不可能不成为战士。也许他们是对的，我记得西庇阿告诉我，我是他所见过的最强壮的军团成员，也许有一天我会被任命为拉尼尔斯的特使。我想我永远也不会知道了，在我光荣的作为百夫长大获全胜之后。我的部队毫不怀疑地解除了武装，跟着我进了那个坑，我还能听到他们的哭声，因为我命令掠夺者用枪把他们打死，我这辈子再也听不到比这更甜美的声音了。他们永远无法想象我没有被打垮。
是的，再来多一些。让凯撒之犬的鲜血染红北方吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Madsen
ESP.TRADUIT: 马德森

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Tired of hearing them bitch about that town. As if holding it is how they define victory. If I cared, I would have every last raider in this valley arm up and follow me as I lead the charge. I would tear their gates open with my bare hands. Any who resist our assault would die. Those who submit to us would be toys for our amusement.
But I don't care about that town. It doesn't matter. If it did, it would send me a worthy challenge. I don't care. It's time will come. All their times will come.
ESP.TRADUIT:
厌倦了听他们抱怨那个小镇。好像占领了它就是胜利的定义。如果我在乎，我会让山谷里所有的掠夺者武装起来跟着我一起冲锋。我会赤手空拳把他们的大门撕开。任何反抗我们进攻的人都会死，那些屈服于我们的人将成为我们娱乐的玩具。
但我不在乎那个镇子。没关系。如果真是这样的话，那将给我带来一个有价值的挑战。我不在乎，是时候了，他们所有的时代都会到来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Legacy
ESP.TRADUIT: 遗产

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Hacksaw approached me today and asked me what my goal was. Why did I take command of this region if I didn't intend to conquer it and expand outward? I ordered my men to assemble and heed my words. After they gathered and I had their attention, I took hold of Hacksaw and tore his head off with my bare hands. His skull has been mounted by my throne, along with the other traitors.
There is no legacy. There will never be a legacy. When I am dead, this gang shall fracture and go to war amongst itself, as new prospective leaders try to claw their way to my throne, over the corpses of their compatriots. As it should be. War is not the means of bringing peace. War is the goal. Human lives are fleeting and worth nothing more than whatever intangible value society deems them to possess. This world is fire and pain, a great crucible where the strong are forged from the weak. As it should be. As it has always been.
The Legion taught me this truth, even though they do not realize it themselves. They shall. I will teach them. I've seen the moment of realization on face after face. As they lie in the dirt, bodies mangled, bones shattered, their blood feeding the earth below them. I look into their eyes, I see them all come to the same realization. And then I lower my boot-heel into their skull. People are so fragile, how do they delude themselves that they are worth more than what they are?
ESP.TRADUIT:
钢锯今天走近我，问我的目标是什么。如果我不打算征服它并向外扩展，我为什么要控制这个地区？我命令我的人聚集并听从我的话。在他们聚集并将注意力集中在我身上的时候，我抓住钢锯，空手地将他的头扯了下来。他的头骨和其他叛徒一起被安置在我的宝座上。
没有遗产。永远不会有遗产。当我死后，这个帮派将分裂并在内部开战，因为新的潜在领导人试图从他们同胞的尸体上爬上我的宝座。应该是这样。战争不是带来和平的手段。战争是目的，人的生命转瞬即逝，其价值无非是社会认为他们拥有的无形价值。这个世界是火与痛，是强者与弱者的熔炉，应该永远都这样。
军团教会了我这个真理，尽管他们自己并没有意识到。我会教他们的，我在一张又一张的脸上看到了领悟的时刻。当他们躺在泥土中时，尸体被肢解，骨头破碎，他们的血液滋养着他们脚下的大地。我看着他们的眼睛，我看到他们都得到了同样的认识。然后我把我的靴跟放到他们的头骨里。人都那么脆弱，他们怎么自欺欺人地认为自己比实际更有价值？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Way beyond me
ESP.TRADUIT: 超越我

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Looked at this hydraulic lift for a couple hours. Thing's all busted. No fixing it, least not with any of the tools and skills I have. Got access to the area underneath the lift, though that manhole outside. Nothing interesting down there, just rows of rusted-out cars. Tires are crumbled to dust, bodywork is too corroded to strip for scrap. Nothing down there worth fixing the lift to access. My recommendation is we block off the manhole, too. Nothing but tetanus down there.
Brandon
ESP.TRADUIT:
我看了个液压升降机好几个小时，这东西全坏了，没法修好了，至少我所有的工具和技能都没用。我通过外面的检修孔进入电梯下面的区域，下面没什么有趣的东西，只有一排生锈的汽车，轮胎都碎成了灰，车身被腐蚀成无法剥落的碎片，当废品都不行。下面没有什么东西值得我们修电梯，我的建议是我们也堵住检修孔，下面只有破伤风。
- 布兰登

ESP.ORIGINAL: Up for a wager?
ESP.TRADUIT: 想打赌吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Word from the big boss is that there's no limit on what we can do to legion prisoners. I know he doesn't like it when we make sport out of caravaners or townies, so legion will have to do.
They make you work for it, though. If they think you're gonna catch 'em, they usually cut their wrists. Samir's crew got the drop on three of 'em, couple days ago. Brought them back to the radio tower. Hader was there and he looked them over. Said if any of them could kill him, they could go free. One of them agreed. Hader dropped his hammer, said he didn't need a weapon. Then, I swear to god I am not making this up, he floored the legionary in one punch, then tore his fucking head off with his bare hands. Craziest shit I've ever seen.
He asked the next legionary if he would fight him, but the big badass legion boy pussed out. Hader said that cowards like that don't deserve a good death. Locked him in the cell to starve. Told us if we wanna snack on something, do it where the prisoner can see us. Then he said he was bored, and we could do whatever we want with the third guy.
Bats showed us this little deep-frier he rigged up with a bedframe and a generator. We're gonna hook this cocksucker up, and wager on how high his screams will get before his heart explodes. You in?
ESP.TRADUIT:
大老板说我们对军团囚犯的处置是无限制的。我知道他不喜欢我们用商队或乡下人来做运动，所以军团也可以。
虽然他们让你为之工作，如果他们认为自己会被抓住，他们通常会割腕。萨米尔的人几天前干掉了三个人。把他们带回了无线电塔。哈德尔在那里，他看了一遍。他说如果有人能杀了他，他们就能重获自由。其中一人同意了。哈德尔丢了锤子，说他不需要武器。然后，我对天发誓，这不是我编的，他一拳打倒了那个军团，然后徒手把他的头扯了下来，这是我见过的最疯狂的东西。
他问下一个军团男孩是否愿意和他战斗，但是那个大坏蛋军团男孩退缩了。哈德尔说那样的懦夫不应该死得痛快。把他关在牢房里饿死。告诉我们如果想吃点什么，就在犯人能看见的地方吃。然后他说他很无聊，我们可以对第三个人为所欲为。
蝙蝠给我们看了这个他用床架和发电机组装起来的小油锅。我们要把这混蛋吊起来，赌他的尖叫声在他的心脏爆炸前能达到多高，你参加吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks again!
ESP.TRADUIT: 再次感谢！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Jon, I'm really glad to hear that you're still doing well up there! I'm always a little afraid that those raiders will finally get into town one day. Sorry, can't help it!
Thank you for always writing me back. I still can't believe how great you've been. I know most guys in your business would kill a girl for even thinking of trying to get out of the lifestyle. But here you are, actually giving me severance pay, and responding to my letters.
I'm in Primm right now, but I'm heading into California in a few hours. This is my last stop in the Mojave, and I guess it's good timing, since we keep hearing about some big prison break that just went down. I don't want to be here by the time the dust settles, you know? Plus, there's this really annoying guy with dreadlocks wandering around town, mumbling to himself about bears and couriers. Like, constantly, I don't think he's been quiet for a single minute, and I've been in town for three days.
Anyway, my letters might slow way down once I'm settled in NCR land. At that point, the distance will make it hard to hire any reliable couriers. Still, I'll do what I can. I know you keep insisting that I don't owe you for all you did for me, but sorry, I definitely do owe you my life. Hope I can repay the favor, one day!
Sandy
ESP.TRADUIT:
乔恩，我很高兴听到你在那里仍然做得很好！我总是有点害怕有一天那些掠夺者最终会进入城镇。对不起，没办法！
谢谢你总是给我回信，我还是不敢相信你表现得这么好。我知道在你这行，大多数人会杀了一个想要摆脱这种生活方式的女孩，但你却给了我遣散费，还回我的信。
我现在住在普瑞姆，但几小时后我就要去加州了。这是我在莫哈韦沙漠的最后一站，我想这是个好时机，因为我们不断听说有重大越狱事件发生。我不想等到一切尘埃落定的时候再出发。另外，还有个留着脏辫的讨厌鬼在镇上游荡，嘴里嘟囔着熊和邮差的事。我一直觉得他一刻也不安静，而我已经在城里待了三天了。
不管怎样，一旦我在NCR的土地上定居下来，我的信件可能会慢下来。由于距离遥远，到时候很难找到可靠的邮差。不过，我会尽我所能。我知道你一直坚持说我不欠你，但对不起，我确实欠你一条命。希望有一天我能报答你的恩情！
- 桑迪

ESP.ORIGINAL: Slave Collar Note
ESP.TRADUIT: 奴隶项圈注意事项

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Alright boy, I've rigged the collar on your personal girl to keep her real close. Some of the collars would let a slave get a mile off before the proximity collar would blow their heads off. Yours has to stay within several yards of you, or she's a goner. Plus, you could always just auto-detonate the bitch if she gives you any trouble. Her type is easy to replace. Enjoy yourself, son.
Tex
ESP.TRADUIT:
好了，孩子，我给你的私人女友戴上了项圈让她必须离你很近。有些项圈会让奴隶离开一英里，然后项圈才会炸开他们的头，你的婊子必须保持在离你几码远的范围内，否则她就死定了。而且，如果她给你惹了什么麻烦你也可以引爆她，她这种类型的婊子很容易找到。好好享受吧儿子。
- 特克斯

ESP.ORIGINAL: Snuff Film
ESP.TRADUIT: 虐杀电影

ESP.ORIGINAL: This holotape contains a video of Tex Bradshaw as he commits unspeakable abuses on a slave, ending in her murder. From how he speaks, it's clear that he has been filming such atrocities for several years, and this is only his most recent recording.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这盘全息录像带里有一段特克斯·布拉德肖对一名奴隶犯下的不可言说的虐待行为，并最终杀死她的视频。从他说话的方式可以清楚地看出，他已经拍摄这种暴行好几年了，而这只是他最近的一次录像。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tex Bradshaw
ESP.TRADUIT: 特克斯·布拉德肖

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Got all I could about Bradshaw for you, along with some intel about the northern region. And this means we're even, so don't come calling for shit like this again, okay?
Bradshaw was born, if you can believe this, in Texas. He's 50-or-so. Been moving slaves for a couple decades now, but he's really hit his stride once the Legion came into power. Most of his captives get sold off to the Legion as soon as he gets them. More on that in a second.
He arrived at the north road region a few months before the Legion came, likely to capture some of the local raiders and townies before the Legion could crucify 'em all. Lot of drugs and debauchery up there, so I'm sure it'd make any good Legionary's eye twitch. He's done well for himself, but I guess sales are down for two reasons: One, the NCR locked the tunnel leading up that way, so travelers and caravaners slowed to a trickle. Second, the Legion is only just getting back on it's feet. The original force sent up that way was wiped out by, get this, internal sabotage. Their centurion, some giant freak called Hercules of Holbrook, actually turned coat and led his Legionaries into a trap, in exchange for taking command of all the raiders in the area.
Now, little fucked-up detail about Tex. He likes to keep one captive from every slave raid. The unlucky girl, and it's always a girl, will be forced to co-star in one of Tex's depraved little torture-murder-rape holovids. Don't know if he keeps them for himself or sells them, but either way, it's pretty fucked.
ESP.TRADUIT:
我把布拉德肖的所有信息都给你了，还有一些关于北部地区的情报。这意味着我们扯平了，所以别再来找我了，好吗？
布拉德肖出生在德克萨斯州，信不信由你。他50多岁，几十年来他一直在贩卖奴隶，自从军团掌权后，他的事业蒸蒸日上，大多数情况下他抓到俘虏就会卖给军团。稍后会详细介绍。
他比军团早几个月到达北路地区，可能是为了在军团将他们全部钉死之前抓捕一些当地的掠夺者和镇民。那里毒品泛滥淫乱不堪，所以我相信任何一个优秀的军团战士都会心动。
他自己做得很好，但我猜销售额下降有两个原因:第一，NCR封锁了通往那里的隧道，所以旅行者和商队的来往下降了。其次，军团才刚刚恢复元气，最初派往那里的部队被内奸摧毁了。他们的百夫长，一个叫霍尔布鲁克·赫拉克勒斯的巨人怪胎把他的军团部队带进了陷阱，并以此获得了该地区所有掠夺者的指挥权。
现在说说该死的特克斯的小细节。他每次抢劫奴隶都要留下一个不幸的女孩，她将被迫在特克斯的一部堕落的酷刑-谋杀-强奸短片中担任主演。不知道最后他是自己留着还是卖了，但不管怎样，都很糟糕。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuck it, I'm out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 妈的，我不干了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If anyone finds this and wants to know why I shot myself, ask Theo! He knows what he fucking did!
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果有人发现了这个，想知道我为什么开枪自杀的话，去问西奥！他知道他做了什么！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Personnel File: Irene
ESP.TRADUIT: 人事档案：艾琳

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Name: Irene, surname unknown
Allegiance: Madsen
Additional notes: Trying to keep relations with the town open, if not quite friendly. Madsen is the only civilized area in the vicinity, so I'd rather they don't close their gates to us. The town is offering a financial reward for the deaths of any regional raider captains. The woman in charge of this enterprise, Irene, is the town's founder and de facto leader. Don't know where she came from, but reports indicate she's skilled with firearms and her leadership is uncontested.
ESP.TRADUIT:
姓名：艾琳，姓氏不详
势力：马德森
补充说明：尝试保持与该镇开放的策略，即使不是很友好。马德森是附近唯一的文明地区，所以我希望他们不要对我们关闭大门 该镇为任何地区掠夺者队长的死亡提供经济奖励，负责这个团体的女性艾琳是该镇的创始人和事实上的领导者。不知道她来自哪里，但报告表明她精通枪械，她的领导地位无可争议。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Personnel File: Adam Burke
ESP.TRADUIT: 人事档案：亚当·伯克

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Name: Adam Burke
Allegiance: NCR (Loose affiliation at the moment)
Additional notes: Burke has absolutely no combat experience, he's as spineless as I've ever seen, and is firmly in possession of an infuriating mixture of arrogance and naivety. If we weren't being paid so much to keep him alive and free, I'd shoot his ass already. I still haven't ruled out the possibility of turning him over to the NCR in exchange for the 3000 cap reward, but I'd rather we not gain a reputation of contract breaching. Besides, his father is a very influential figure in California. I'd prefer to have him on our side.
ESP.TRADUIT:
姓名：亚当·伯克
势力：NCR(松散的隶属关系)
补充说明：伯克绝对没有战斗经验，他是我见过的最没有骨气的人，他拥有一种令人恼火的傲慢和天真的坚定。要不是我们付了那么多钱让他活着，保证他的自由，我早就毙了他了。我还没有排除把他交给NCR以换取3000瓶盖的可能性，但我希望我们不要获得违约的名声。此外，他的父亲在加州是一个很有影响力的人物，我更希望他站在我们这边。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Personnel File: Stolidus Cillus
ESP.TRADUIT: 人事档案：斯托利杜斯·西尔卢斯

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Name: Centurion Stolidus Cillus
Allegiance: Caesar's Legion (Obviously)
Additional Notes: Legion is pushing into the valley. Annoying, but their numbers are unimpressive. While hostile, the Legion is primarily focused on our mutual enemy, the raiders. We won't go out of our way to antagonize the legion, but if they get caught in the crossfire, well, nobody will miss them. Don't have much to say about Cillus, himself. Not a very impressive figure. Wouldn't surprise me if his assignment was really just an excuse for someone to get him out of their hair.
ESP.TRADUIT:
名称：百夫长斯托利杜斯·西尔卢斯
势力：凯撒军团(显然)
补充说明：军团正在向山谷推进。烦人，但他们的人数并不令人印象深刻。虽然充满敌意，但军团的主要目标是我们共同的敌人，掠夺者。我们不会去招惹军团，但如果他们被卷入交火中，没人会怀念他们的。关于西尔卢斯本人，我没什么可说的，不是什么很了不起的人物。如果他的任务真的只是为了让别人摆脱他的困扰而找的借口，我也不会感到惊讶。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Personnel File: Hader
ESP.TRADUIT: 人事档案：哈德尔

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Name: Hader
Allegiance: Raiders, Caesar's Legion (formerly)
Additional Notes: Hader is the reason for the Legion's weak presence in the valley. When he arrived, he was known as Centurion Hercules of Holbrook. His only real notoriety stemmed from an incident in Two-Sun where he tore a super mutant's arm off in single combat. His first assignment as Centurion was to pacify the northern valley for Caesar. Instead, once they let him off the leash, he led his troops into a box canyon, where the raiders were waiting on the cliff tops. He had, apparently, cut a deal with them. Once his entire 100-man unit was dead, he took command of the raiders and changed his name to Hader. Hader swiftly consolidated power by killing every raider boss that wouldn't submit to him. It seems to have worked, as the disparate raider bands all fight under one banner: his own. Nobody seems to be sure what goals, if any, he is working towards. What is known is that his raiders are incredibly annoying, and the single greatest headache in the region.
ESP.TRADUIT:
姓名：哈德尔
势力：掠夺者, 凯撒军团(以前)
补充说明：哈德尔是军团在山谷中存在薄弱的原因。当时，他被称为百夫长霍尔布鲁克·赫拉克勒斯。他唯一真正的恶名源于在双阳战争中撕掉了一个超级变种人的手臂。他担任百夫长后的第一个任务是为恺撒平定北部山谷。没想到他在脱离指挥后就带领他的部队进入了一个箱形峡谷，那里的掠夺者正在悬崖顶上埋伏。显然，他和他们达成了协议。当他的100人部队全部阵亡后，他接管了掠夺者部队，并将自己的名字改为哈德尔。哈德尔杀死了每一个不愿屈服于他的掠夺者首领，迅速巩固了自己的权力。这似乎奏效了，因为不同的掠夺者都在他的旗下作战。似乎没有人知道他的目标是什么(如果有的话)。我们所知道的是，他的掠夺者部队非常烦人，也是该地区最令人头疼的存在。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stay Put
ESP.TRADUIT: 留在原地

ESP.ORIGINAL:
