Burke, we're here to keep you alive and out of enemy hands. We aren't here to wait on you like goddamn maid service. We reinforced this room, so stay put. You have a terminal and whatever reading material you brought along, so if that isn't enough for you, try playing wall-ball. When your daddy clears us to escort you home, we'll leave. That's the end of it.
General Brandice
ESP.TRADUIT:
伯克，我们在这里是为了让你活着，远离敌人的掌控的。我们不是来这里像该死的侍女一样伺候你的，我们加固了这间房，所以别乱动。你有一个终端和任何你带来的阅读材料，所以如果这些对你来说还不够的话，那就试试打壁球。等你爸爸批准我们送你回家，我们就走，就这些。
- 布兰迪斯将军

ESP.ORIGINAL: Last Warning
ESP.TRADUIT: 最后的警告

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Sergeant Bodean, this is the last time I will give you this order. Disregard it, and I'll give Captain Brennan the go-ahead to discipline you in whatever way he deems acceptable. Do not, under any circumstances, produce any more moonshine while you're on assignment. I don't care that your undisciplined ass is bored and cold up by the mansion. I'm told that the area has been secured, but I've no doubt that there are openings that could be patched up with whatever scrap metal you insist on wasting for your little moonshine stills. Captain Brennan reports that he fragged the previous one, so if another pops up, it's your ass.
Also, stay out of the mansion, period. The only reason you have the front door key is so that it doesn't get knocked off a table and lost in the snow. You can play grab-ass with your buddies stationed inside when you're off duty.
General Brandice
ESP.TRADUIT:
博代安中士，这是我最后一次命令你。如果你无视它，我只能授权布伦南上尉用他认为可以接受的任何方式来惩罚你。在任何情况下，都不要在执行任务时制造什么私酿酒。我才不管你这没规矩的混蛋在宅邸里无聊又冷漠。我听说那片区域已经被封锁了，但我毫不怀疑那里有一些缺口可以用你坚持要浪费在私酒蒸馏室里的任何废铁来修补。布伦南队长报告说他干掉了前一个，所以如果再出现一个，你就死定了。
还有，别去那房子，就这样。你带大门钥匙的唯一原因就是防止它从桌子上掉下来掉到雪地里。你下班的时候可以和驻扎在里面的哥们玩抓人游戏。
- 布兰迪斯将军

ESP.ORIGINAL: Personnel File: Tex Bradshaw
ESP.TRADUIT: 人事档案：特克斯·布拉德肖

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Name: Tex Bradshaw
Allegiance: Rio Grande Slavers, Caesar's Legion
Additional Notes: Originally hails from Texas, which is unoriginal. Bradshaw runs the local slaver crew, which have proven hostile to us during our few encounters with them. They're selling to the Legion, so suppose they're fighting to keep the cash flowing. Bradshaw himself is known to be a sadistic thug by some slaves we liberated from them. His second in the operation is his son, Dan. Despite his ostensible power in the organization, Dan serves no purpose beyond forcing himself on female captives. Nepotism, most likely.
ESP.TRADUIT:
姓名：特克斯·布拉德肖
势力：里约大酒店贩奴集团，凯撒军团
补充说明：最初来自德克萨斯州，这是不符合事实的。布拉德肖经营着当地的贩奴集团，在我们与他们的几次相遇中，他们对我们充满敌意。 他们将奴隶卖给军团，所以假设他们正在努力保持现金流。我们从他们手中解放出来的一些奴隶将布拉德肖称为虐待狂，他的副手是他的儿子丹，不过他在组织中只是拥有表面上的权力，除了对女俘虏施暴之外，他没有任何用处。完全是靠裙带关系。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Regarding Hader
ESP.TRADUIT: 关于哈德尔

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Remember that tunnel where that Samir asshole was hanging out? Direct line south of Madsen, even a blind inbred could find it?
Word is that's the way to get to Hader's little fortification. So head on south, go through the tunnel, kill anyone inside, crawl through the tight bits, and there you go: Fort Hader, dead ahead. What kind of asshole names his HQ after himself? Fucking raiders.
Big price on his head, you know the drill.
Authorized and written by Irene, high war-chief of the Road Snakes and mayor of Madsen.
ESP.TRADUIT:
还记得那个混蛋萨米尔常去的那个隧道吗？直接从马德森往南走，连盲人都能找到的那个？
据说那是去哈德尔那小要塞的方法。往南走，穿过隧道，杀了里面的人，爬过狭窄的缝隙，就到了，哈德尔要塞就在正前方。什么样的傻逼会用自己的名字来命名总部？操他妈的掠夺者。
他的人头值大价钱，你懂的。
授权并由艾琳撰写，她是公路蟒蛇帮的高级军事长官和马德森镇市长。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Strange Holotape
ESP.TRADUIT: 奇怪的全息磁带

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Remember these wise words, my student!
BEAR BULL COURIERS HISTORY BEAR BEAR BEAR BULL THE DIVIDE MACHINE FLAGS DIVIDE BEAR BEAR CAESAR COURIERS DIVIDE BEAR BEAR BEAR BEAR BEAR NATIONS FLAG HISTORY
ESP.TRADUIT:
记住这些明智的词语，我的学生！
熊公牛邮差历史熊熊熊公牛大裂谷机器旗帜分裂熊熊凯撒邮差分裂熊熊熊熊熊国家旗帜历史

ESP.ORIGINAL: To Crazy Ronald
ESP.TRADUIT: 给疯子罗纳德

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Hey, Ronald! It's the General! Me and ol' Billy Nips just got ourselves hired on by some badass crew shacked up south of Bitter Springs.
The party ain't started unless Crazy Ronald is at my back, so get your ass down here! I tried to talk to you in person, but your door was locked, and we could hear you screaming "BEAR" over and over, so we decided to just leave a note. Come meet up with us at Ford Cavern as soon as you get this! The guy in charge is named "Big Daddy", and it sounds like he already has a job for us. Something about killing a Brotherhood of Steel jackass or something.
Hurry up, my dude! -General Mills
ESP.TRADUIT:
嘿，罗纳德！是杰纳勒尔！我和老比利·尼普斯被一群住在苦泉镇南部的混蛋雇了。
除非疯子罗纳德在背后支持我，否则派对没法开始，快给我滚出来！我想亲自跟你谈谈，但你的门被锁上了，我们听到你一遍又一遍地喊"熊"所以我们决定留个纸条。收到消息后马上到福特洞穴和我们会合！负责的人叫"大老爹"，听起来他已经给我们安排好了工作。杀一个钢铁兄弟会的混蛋什么的。
快点，老兄！ - 杰纳勒尔·米尔斯

ESP.ORIGINAL: Frederick's Journal
ESP.TRADUIT: 弗雷德里克的日记

ESP.ORIGINAL:
I'll kill them all. The Khans. The NCR.
The NCR stole my boy away from me, and the Khans killed him for it. They're both guilty. I told him not to join up with them. A man should be free to do as he wills, but Carl was so idealistic. He bought into all the NCR bullshit. Thought he could help people.
I wonder, if he knew that I had raided and pillaged alongside the likes of Sheridan and Forrester, would he have forgiven me? Would he still look up to the NCR if he knew that those boys were likes sons to me? They could've been brothers to Carl.
But I let Carl make his choice. I wouldn't stop him from joining the NCR. He was so proud. Born and bred in the Mojave, but he signed up with the NCR because he felt it was the right thing. Was it? The path he followed led him to that camp his squad stayed in for the night. And that path led to some fucking Great Khan cunt throwing a frag grenade into Carl's tent as he slept. The path he followed got him killed for nothing, so what good was it?
I've stepped off of my own path. I said goodbye to the gang. Said I was too old, had to raise my boy now that he was old enough to make his own choices. Well, now my boy is gone. There is nothing left for me to pretend to be. I'll make a new gang. I can do it. I'm not that fucking old. Yeah... I'll send word to Sheridan. See if I can find out whatever happened to Forrester. Supposed to be some gang of bounty-hunters-turned-raider led by some Doyle guy. I'll dangle some caps in his face...
And I'll spend every last remaining year of my life making the Khans and the NCR pay for what they've done to me.
ESP.TRADUIT:
我要把他们都杀了！大汗帮和NCR，
NCR从我身边偷走了我的儿子，大汗帮杀了他，他们都有罪。我告诉过他不要加入他们，一个人应该有自由去做他想做的事，但是卡尔太理想化了...他相信了那些NCR的屁话，以为他能帮助别人。
我在想，如果他知道我曾经和谢里丹、弗雷斯特这样的人一起抢劫和掠夺，他会原谅我吗？如果他知道那些男孩对我来说就像喜欢的儿子一样，他还会尊敬NCR吗？他们本可以是卡尔的兄弟。
但我让卡尔自己做了选择，我不会阻止他加入NCR。他很骄傲，在莫哈韦出生长大，但他加入了NCR因为他觉得这是正确的选择。是这样吗？他沿着小路来到了那个营地，他的小队在那里过夜，一个该死的大汗帮在卡尔睡觉的时候往他的帐篷里扔了个手榴弹。他走的那条路让他白白送了命，那有什么好处？
我已经离开了自己的路，我跟那帮人说了再见，我说我太老了，必须抚养我的儿子，因为他已经长大到可以自己做选择了。好了，现在我的儿子没了，我已经没有什么好假装的了，我要组建一个新帮派，我能做到，我他妈没那么老。是的...我会给谢里丹送信的，看看我能不能找到弗雷斯特的下落。应该是一帮由多伊尔领导的赏金猎人转行的劫匪干的，我会把瓶盖摆在他脸上的...
我要用我生命中剩下的每一年让大汗帮和NCR为他们的所作所为付出代价。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Statement of Intent
ESP.TRADUIT: 意向声明

ESP.ORIGINAL:
This is a message to the NCR!
I am Big Daddy, and I am your worst nightmare! When you face down against me, you will miss being chopped apart by the Legion! Do not bother to look for me! I will find you and end you! Flee, flee back to California. It will not save you! Martin Forrester, another free man you murdered without cause, was trained by me! His cruelty with a blade, he learned at my hand!
I, Big Daddy, will make you pay for your crimes!
ESP.TRADUIT:
这是给NCR的信息！
我是大老爹，你最可怕的噩梦！当你面对我时，你会怀念被军团斩成碎片的日子！别费事找我了！我会找到你，杀了你！逃吧，逃回加州去吧，没人能救你！马丁·弗雷斯特，另一个被你无缘无故杀害的自由人，是我训练出来的！他冷酷的刀法，是从我这里学来的！
我，大老爹，要让你为自己的罪行付出代价！

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm gonna make this real easy for you, pal. Your life, or your money. What's it going to be?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会让你轻松点的，老兄，你的小命，还是你的钱，二选一。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harris [07037927] (mod) Quest : ([0703C1BA]RoadHarrisDialogue) 0703C1BA (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\maleadult01default\roadharris_greeting_0003c1bb_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, hey! I didn't think I'd see you again. It's me, Harris, remember?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦,嘿!我以为再也见不到你了。是我，哈里斯，记得吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harris [0703CDCD] (mod) Quest : ([0703C1BA]RoadHarrisDialogue) 0703C1BA (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\maleadult01default\roadharris_greeting_00056d39_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I, uh... I tried to mug you in that alley, up north in Madsen? Yeah... that was crazy. Anyway, I've been trying to get my life squared away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我,呃...我想我曾经在马德森北边的那条巷子里抢劫你？是的...这太疯狂了。总之，我一直在努力让我的生活步入正轨。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harris [0703CDCD] (mod) Quest : ([0703C1BA]RoadHarrisDialogue) 0703C1BA (EDID) EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\maleadult01default\roadharris_greeting_00056d39_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Been staying away from the jet. Must be working, 'cause my hands finally stopped shaking all the time. Still a bit itchy, though...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一直在远离杰特，这肯定有效果，因为我的手终于不抖了。不过还是有点痒...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harris [0703CDCD] (mod) Quest : ([0703C1BA]RoadHarrisDialogue) 0703C1BA (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\maleadult01default\roadharris_greeting_00056d39_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I actually got work as a courier for the NCR, if you can believe that. I'd probably be dead in a ditch somewhere if you didn't talk me out of it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能相信吗？我还在NCR找了份邮差的工作。要不是你劝我，我可能已经死在某个沟里了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harris [0703CDCD] (mod) Quest : ([0703C1BA]RoadHarrisDialogue) 0703C1BA (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\maleadult01default\roadharris_greeting_00056d39_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, I need to get back to work, but it's good to see you're still in one piece. Stay safe out there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 总之，我得回去工作了，但很高兴看到你安然无恙。注意安全。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harris [0703CDCD] (mod) Quest : ([0703C1BA]RoadHarrisDialogue) 0703C1BA (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\maleadult01default\roadharris_greeting_00056d39_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good to see you again, friend.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很高兴再见到你，朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harris [0703CDCD] (mod) Quest : ([0703C1BA]RoadHarrisDialogue) 0703C1BA (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\maleadult01default\roadharris_greeting_00056d3a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm the debug man!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是调试人员！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Debuggio [070AB492] (mod) Quest : ([0703C1BA]RoadHarrisDialogue) 0703C1BA (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh shit, you're new. Uh, right, this is the gun store, which is the best kind of store. I'm May. Uh, yeah, I'm the owner and operator, or whatever.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死，你是新来的。对了，这是枪店，最好的那种店。我是梅，呃对，我是老板和经营者，或者什么的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May Ito [07012A8D] (mod) Quest : ([070488F8]RoadMayDialogue) I Plead the Second EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadmayvoice\roadmaydialogue_greeting_000488f9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Looking to buy explosive ordnance? If you're not, you should be.
ESP.TRADUIT: 想买爆炸品？如果你不想，那你口是心非。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May Ito [07012A8D] (mod) Quest : ([070488F8]RoadMayDialogue) I Plead the Second EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadmayvoice\roadmaydialogue_greeting_000488fa_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know what you need? You need to turn all who would stand before you into quivering piles of unidentifiable viscera!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道你需要什么吗?你要把所有站在你面前的人都变成一堆颤抖的无法辨认的内脏!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May Ito [07012A8D] (mod) Quest : ([070488F8]RoadMayDialogue) I Plead the Second EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadmayvoice\roadmaydialogue_greeting_000488fb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How many raiders have you shot? Wait, wait, don't tell me! I'd probably need to be lying down for that one, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你射杀了多少掠夺者？等等，等等，别告诉我！我可能会是下一个，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May Ito [07012A8D] (mod) Quest : ([070488F8]RoadMayDialogue) I Plead the Second EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadmayvoice\roadmaydialogue_greeting_00048f1c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Radio is stupid. How many people y'think went out and named their pistols "Big Iron" cause of that song? It has to be at least a hundred...
ESP.TRADUIT: 电台太傻逼了，你觉得有多少人会因为那首歌而把他们的大左轮命名为"大铁（big iron）"？至少得有一百多...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May Ito [07012A8D] (mod) Quest : ([070488F8]RoadMayDialogue) I Plead the Second EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadmayvoice\roadmaydialogue_greeting_0004e1e5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wish I had been born a Boomer... Oh, hey, what's up?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望我畜生在大炮族...哦，嘿，怎么了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May Ito [07012A8D] (mod) Quest : ([070488F8]RoadMayDialogue) I Plead the Second Comment (NAM2) : Wistful, to self for the first sentance. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadmayvoice\roadmaydialogue_greeting_0004e1f3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well well well, if it isn't "the Courier" that everyone is so impressed by... I've been tracking you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 喔~喔~喔，这不是大名鼎鼎的邮差么...我一直在追踪你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Petey Baja [0702ACAB] (mod) Quest : ([070488FF]RoadPeteDialogue) 070488FF (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\maleadult01default\roadpetedialogue_greeting_00048900_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're not so tough. I see tough every day when I look into a fucking mirror. I'm gonna put you down, and they're gonna write songs about me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你没那么狠。我每天照镜子的时候都能看到一个硬汉，我要把你放倒，然后他们就会为我写歌。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Petey Baja [0702ACAB] (mod) Quest : ([070488FF]RoadPeteDialogue) 070488FF (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\maleadult01default\roadpetedialogue_greeting_00048900_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Man, don't fool around with me right now. You're ruining the experience...
ESP.TRADUIT: 伙计，现在别跟我开玩笑。你在破坏体验...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felix [070021B6] (mod) Quest : ([0704F444]RoadToddQuest) Wonder Where I Found You EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\todddealervoice\roadtoddquest_greeting_0004f44f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, what's up, man?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，怎么了，伙计？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felix [070021B6] (mod) Quest : ([0704F444]RoadToddQuest) Wonder Where I Found You Comment (NAM2) : Slow and stoner-y EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\todddealervoice\roadtoddquest_greeting_0004f450_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, hey, welcome. Come on in, huh, we're all friends here! I hope!
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，嘿，欢迎，进来吧，我们都是朋友！我希望！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steve Forsier [07001ED1] (mod) Quest : ([0704F444]RoadToddQuest) Wonder Where I Found You EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\toddrangervoice\roadtoddquest_greeting_0004fa5a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Heh, name's Steve. What can I do for you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，我叫史蒂夫。我能为你做些什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steve Forsier [07001ED1] (mod) Quest : ([0704F444]RoadToddQuest) Wonder Where I Found You EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\toddrangervoice\roadtoddquest_greeting_0004fa5a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, welcome back!
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，欢迎回来！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steve Forsier [07001ED1] (mod) Quest : ([0704F444]RoadToddQuest) Wonder Where I Found You EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\toddrangervoice\roadtoddquest_greeting_0004fa5b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm getting my shit together. This op was a bust. I'm done here. I just want to go home and see my wife and daughter again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在整理我的东西，这次行动失败了，我受够了，我只想回家再看看我的妻女。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steve Forsier [07001ED1] (mod) Quest : ([0704F444]RoadToddQuest) Wonder Where I Found You EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\toddrangervoice\roadtoddquest_greeting_0004fa5c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, hey. Turns out I don’t get to go home. I get to sweat my balls off in this middle-of-nowhere shithole. Not fighting Legion or nothing. Nope.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，嘿，结果我回不去了。我得在这个偏僻的鬼地方流汗，军团都没见到一个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steve Forsier [07050C8F] (mod) Quest : ([0704F444]RoadToddQuest) Wonder Where I Found You EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\toddrangervoice\roadtoddquest_greeting_0006e1e9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Howdy. You need something from me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好，你想从我这里得到什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb Alquist [0701367F] (mod) Quest : ([0704FA68]RoadCalebDialogue) 0704FA68 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcalebvoice\roadcalebdialogue_greeting_0004fa69_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hello again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 又见面了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb Alquist [0701367F] (mod) Quest : ([0704FA68]RoadCalebDialogue) 0704FA68 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcalebvoice\roadcalebdialogue_greeting_0004fa6a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't know you, so if you're from out of town, I don't sell shit or do shit. If you're a local, I'm not looking for work, neither.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不认识你，如果你是外地来的，我什么也不卖，什么也不做。如果你是本地人，我也不找工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colette [070488D6] (mod) Quest : ([07056115]RoadColetteQuest) Blood for Blood EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolettevoice\roadcolettequest_greeting_00056727_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You visit the bar yet? Good place to toss a few caps and wake up the next morning with no idea what horrible decisions you made during the night.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你去过酒吧了吗？在这里扔几枚瓶盖，第二天早上醒来就不知道自己晚上做了什么可怕的决定。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colette [070488D6] (mod) Quest : ([07056115]RoadColetteQuest) Blood for Blood EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolettevoice\roadcolettequest_greeting_00056728_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey look, it's some... greenery. What a novel concept.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，看，这是一些...绿色植物，多么新颖的概念。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colette [070488D6] (mod) Quest : ([07056115]RoadColetteQuest) Blood for Blood EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolettevoice\roadcolettequest_greeting_00056729_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And you're back. Got something to say?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你回来了，有什么要说的吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colette [070488D6] (mod) Quest : ([07056115]RoadColetteQuest) Blood for Blood Comment (NAM2) : neutral EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolettevoice\roadcolettequest_greeting_0005672a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can I help you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 需要帮忙吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Ross [07056D40] (mod) Quest : ([07056115]RoadColetteQuest) Blood for Blood EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\aarossvoice\roadcolettequest_greeting_00056d43_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Courier [07056D36] (mod) Quest : ([07056115]RoadColetteQuest) Blood for Blood EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\maleadult01defaultb\roadcolettequest_greeting_0005faab_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just need to rest my brahmin before heading out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 出去之前我得让我的婆罗门休息一下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Courier [07056D36] (mod) Quest : ([07056115]RoadColetteQuest) Blood for Blood EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\maleadult01defaultb\roadcolettequest_greeting_0006433f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, happy day. It's been far too long since last we hosted a visitor. My name is Bartholomew, and my spherical associate there is Mrs. Jessica.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，快乐的一天。我们已经很久没招待客人了。我叫巴塞洛缪，我的球形助手名叫杰西卡夫人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bartholomew [070617C3] (mod) Quest : ([070617DE]RoadBoozeQuest) Liquid Gold EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadrobuts\roadboozequest_greeting_000617df_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've no idea how long it's been since the last person to enter our home. Please, please, help yourself to a drink.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不知道上次有人进入我们家是多久以前的事了。请，请，自己拿点喝的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bartholomew [070617C3] (mod) Quest : ([070617DE]RoadBoozeQuest) Liquid Gold EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadrobuts\roadboozequest_greeting_000617df_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're always welcome in our home, my friend.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们家随时欢迎你，我的朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bartholomew [070617C3] (mod) Quest : ([070617DE]RoadBoozeQuest) Liquid Gold EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadrobuts\roadboozequest_greeting_0006ab19_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: 10,000 bottles of beer on the wall, 10,000 bottles of beer. Take one down, pass it around, 9999 bottles of beer on the wall. 9999 bottles of beer...
ESP.TRADUIT: 墙上有一万瓶啤酒，一万瓶啤酒。拿下一瓶，传下去，墙上有9999瓶啤酒。9999瓶啤酒...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mrs. Jessica [070617C4] (mod) Quest : ([070617DE]RoadBoozeQuest) Liquid Gold EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadrobuts\roadboozequest_greeting_0006ab23_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Excuse me a moment. You're wanted at Ranger Station Foxtrot. Sounded urgent. Of course, everything rangers say sounds urgent.
ESP.TRADUIT: 打扰一下，游骑兵驻扎站F在找你。听起来很紧急，当然，游骑兵说的每件事听起来都很紧急。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Brandt [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([0706BD44]RoadSecondQuest) As I Walk Through the Valley EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadvoicebrandt\roadsecondquest_greeting_0006bd45_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sounds like the man to speak with is a ranger named Early. I don't know any more than that. I'd ask him if you want the details.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听起来是一个叫厄尔利的游骑兵。我只知道这些，如果你想知道细节，我可以问他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Brandt [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([0706BD44]RoadSecondQuest) As I Walk Through the Valley EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadvoicebrandt\roadsecondquest_greeting_0006bd45_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Been hearing stories about you. Some kinda courier shaking the Mojave up like a hornet’s nest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一直在听你的故事，某个邮差把莫哈维地区搞得像个大黄蜂的窝。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bob Early [07002604] (mod) Quest : ([0706BD44]RoadSecondQuest) As I Walk Through the Valley EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roaddeltorovoice\roadsecondquest_greeting_0006bd46_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Must be some kinda dedication to your job, considering that’s still your title after all the other things you’ve been doing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你肯定对工作很投入吧，毕竟你做了那么多事情，但大家一如既往地叫你邮差。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bob Early [07002604] (mod) Quest : ([0706BD44]RoadSecondQuest) As I Walk Through the Valley EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roaddeltorovoice\roadsecondquest_greeting_0006bd46_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Which is why I wanted to have a chat with you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以我才想和你谈谈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bob Early [07002604] (mod) Quest : ([0706BD44]RoadSecondQuest) As I Walk Through the Valley EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roaddeltorovoice\roadsecondquest_greeting_0006bd46_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You’re back. How goes the mission?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你回来了，任务进展如何？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bob Early [07002604] (mod) Quest : ([0706BD44]RoadSecondQuest) As I Walk Through the Valley EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roaddeltorovoice\roadsecondquest_greeting_0006bd47_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don’t have any more work for you, but feel free to make yourself at home.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没有更多的工作要给你，但请随意，在这里不要拘束。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bob Early [07002604] (mod) Quest : ([0706BD44]RoadSecondQuest) As I Walk Through the Valley EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roaddeltorovoice\roadsecondquest_greeting_0006bd48_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, see, this is weird to me. I generally like to manage the goings-on in my town. When shit gets done, it tends to be on my orders.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看，这对我来说很奇怪。一般来说，我喜欢管理我镇上的事务。这些事情被完成往往是在我的命令之下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Irene [0700C003] (mod) Quest : ([0706C36B]RoadIreneDialogue) When My Time Comes EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\femaleadult11\roadirenedialogue_greeting_0006c36d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, when I'm told that some raider with a micropenis attacked one of Jon's whores, it goes on my list of shit I need to take care of.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，当我听说有个小鸡巴的掠夺者袭击了乔恩的一个妓女，这事就上了我的待办清单。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Irene [0700C003] (mod) Quest : ([0706C36B]RoadIreneDialogue) When My Time Comes EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\femaleadult11\roadirenedialogue_greeting_0006c36d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Instead, though, I get Jon knocking on my door, telling me that some outsider already took care of it, and now they're off getting booze for him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然而，我得到的却是乔恩敲我的门，告诉我有个外人已经搞定了，现在他们去给他买酒了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Irene [0700C003] (mod) Quest : ([0706C36B]RoadIreneDialogue) When My Time Comes EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\femaleadult11\roadirenedialogue_greeting_0006c36d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whole situation seems odd to me. So, what am I supposed to make of it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得整个情况很奇怪。所以，我该怎么理解呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Irene [0700C003] (mod) Quest : ([0706C36B]RoadIreneDialogue) When My Time Comes EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\femaleadult11\roadirenedialogue_greeting_0006c36d_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I see you're still alive. What's up?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看到你还活着。怎么了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Irene [0700C003] (mod) Quest : ([0706C36B]RoadIreneDialogue) When My Time Comes EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\femaleadult11\roadirenedialogue_greeting_0006c36f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Irene [0700C003] (mod) Quest : ([0706C36B]RoadIreneDialogue) When My Time Comes EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\femaleadult11\roadirenedialogue_greeting_0006c370_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There you are. Good. It would be a shame if you stormed in here, slaughtered my men, and we miss each other completely.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在这里，很好。如果你冲进来杀了我的人，而我们却都没见过一面，那就太遗憾了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hader [0704EE05] (mod) Quest : ([0706C36B]RoadIreneDialogue) When My Time Comes EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\aaaroadhadervoice\roadirenedialogue_greeting_00075b4c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, here you stand. Are you going to try begging me to spare you, or are you less worthless than that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，你站在这里。你是想求我饶你一命，还是说你没那么多价值？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hader [0704EE05] (mod) Quest : ([0706C36B]RoadIreneDialogue) When My Time Comes EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\aaaroadhadervoice\roadirenedialogue_greeting_00075b4c_2.ogg
NPC : Hader [0704EE05] (mod) Quest : ([0706C36B]RoadIreneDialogue) When My Time Comes EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can I kill something now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我现在可以杀人吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Todd [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0700765B]ToddDialogue) 0700765B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\toddvoice\todddialog_followerstactic_00007671_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Enough of that. Let's go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 够了，我们走吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your distance is good. Let's talk about something else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的距离不错。让我们谈谈其他事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can we talk about, like, fuckin' politics, if we're sticking with this boring wordy shit?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我们非要坚持这无聊的废话的话，我们他妈的能谈谈政治吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Todd [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0700765B]ToddDialogue) 0700765B (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\toddvoice\todddialog_followerstactic_00007670_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Enough about distance, let's chat about other stuff!
ESP.TRADUIT: 够了，让我们聊聊其他的东西！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stay close to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 紧跟着我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine, I'm on your ass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我紧跟其后。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Todd [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0700765B]ToddDialogue) 0700765B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\toddvoice\todddialog_followerstactic_0000766f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stay close.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟紧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's talk about how close you're following me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们来讨论下你我之间的距离。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Jeeeeeesus.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Todd [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0700765B]ToddDialogue) 0700765B (EDID) EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\toddvoice\todddialog_followerstactic_0000766e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's talk about how close you're following me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们来谈谈你应该跟得我有多近。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want you to use ranged weapons.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你使用远距攻击武器。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ech. Fine, but I'm warning you right now, bitch, I'm a lousy shot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恩，好吧，但我现在警告你，贱人，我枪法不好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Todd [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0700765B]ToddDialogue) 0700765B (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\toddvoice\todddialog_followerstactic_0000766d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Use a gun.
ESP.TRADUIT: 用枪。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Switch to a melee weapon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 切换到近战武器。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hell yeah.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然是。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Todd [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0700765B]ToddDialogue) 0700765B (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\toddvoice\todddialog_followerstactic_0000766b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Use a melee weapon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 用近战武器。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's talk about something else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我们谈谈其他事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ugh.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Todd [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0700765B]ToddDialogue) 0700765B (EDID) EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\toddvoice\todddialog_followerstactic_00007669_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's talk about something else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们聊点别的吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's all. Let's get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就这样。我们走吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fucking finally.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他妈的总算。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Todd [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0700765B]ToddDialogue) 0700765B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\toddvoice\todddialog_followerstactic_0000766a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Enough of that. Let's hit it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 够了，我们开始行动。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want you to change your combat style.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你改变你的战斗风格。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is gonna be some shit...
ESP.TRADUIT: 这肯定会很糟糕...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Todd [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0700765B]ToddDialogue) 0700765B (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\toddvoice\todddialog_followerstactic_00007667_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: About your combat style...
ESP.TRADUIT: 关于你的战斗风格...

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's talk about your tactics.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们谈谈你的战术吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuckin' tactics? I hit people. With a board.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么鬼战术？我用块板子打人？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Todd [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0700765B]ToddDialogue) 0700765B (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\toddvoice\todddialog_followerstactic_00007666_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's talk about tactics.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们来谈谈战术。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们走。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh-huh.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊哈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Todd [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0700765B]ToddDialogue) 0700765B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\toddvoice\todddialog_followersletsgo_00007665_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我们出发吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's time for us to part ways.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们该分道扬镳了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: For real?
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Todd [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0700765B]ToddDialogue) 0700765B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\toddvoice\todddialog_followersfired_00007660_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We need to split up for a while.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们得分开一段时间。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think we should travel together.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得我们应该同行。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hell yeah.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然是。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Todd [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0700765B]ToddDialogue) 0700765B (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\toddvoice\todddialog_followershired_00007664_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's head out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们出去吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: On second thought, stick with me for a little longer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想了一下，还是留在我身边吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You got it, boss.
ESP.TRADUIT: 明白了，老大。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Todd [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0700765B]ToddDialogue) 0700765B (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\toddvoice\todddialog_followersfiredn_00007661_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Actually, scratch that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 实际上，忽略它。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, I'm sure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我确定。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh. OK. Well, I'll be back at Westside. Just getting fucked up. Yeah.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，好的，我会回到西区的。只是搞砸了，是的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Todd [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0700765B]ToddDialogue) 0700765B (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\toddvoice\todddialog_followersfiredy_00007662_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want you not to attack enemies unless I've already engaged them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我没有动手，你也不要擅自攻击敌人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's stupid. You're stupid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 蠢，你蠢人还叫我办蠢事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Todd [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0700765B]ToddDialogue) 0700765B (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\toddvoice\todddialog_followerstactic_0000766c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't attack anyone unless I initiate it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除非我主动，否则不要攻击任何人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want you to attack enemies the moment you see them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要你看到敌人就马上攻击他们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 完毕。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Todd [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0700765B]ToddDialogue) 0700765B (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\toddvoice\todddialog_followerstactic_00007668_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Attack enemies the moment you see them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在你看到敌人的那一刻就攻击他们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like you to go back to the Lucky 38 for now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你现在回幸运38赌场去。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Heh. Sure thing. I might make a detour to piss in that Ultra-Fucks fountain, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈，那是当然，不过我可能会绕道去"超美多"喷泉里撒尿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Todd [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0700765B]ToddDialogue) 0700765B (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\toddvoice\todddialog_followersfiredy_00007663_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah. Why don't you hang back at the Lucky 38?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，你为什么不去幸运38赌场？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kinda figured I'd die choking to death while I sleep...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得我会在睡觉时呛死...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Todd [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0700765B]ToddDialogue) 0700765B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\toddvoice\todddialogue_healthquarter_0005610e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Gimme stimpaks, and any other drugs you got!
ESP.TRADUIT: 给我治疗针，还有你其他的药品！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Todd [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0700765B]ToddDialogue) 0700765B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\toddvoice\todddialogue_healthhalf_0005610b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, that's fuckin' broken.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，这他妈的坏了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Todd [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0700765B]ToddDialogue) 0700765B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\toddvoice\todddialogue_healthhalf_0005610c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wake
ESP.TRADUIT: 醒来

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yo, I just black out?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我刚晕过去了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Todd [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0700765B]ToddDialogue) 0700765B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\toddvoice\todddialogue_wake_00056113_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The fuck was that about?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那他妈是怎么回事？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Todd [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0700765B]ToddDialogue) 0700765B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\toddvoice\todddialogue_wake_00056114_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is this thing even working?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这玩意有用吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Todd [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0700765B]ToddDialogue) 0700765B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\toddvoice\todddialog_armorineffectiv_00056100_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, get me some armor that's actually fucking bulletproof!
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，给我买些他妈的防弹的盔甲！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Todd [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0700765B]ToddDialogue) 0700765B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\toddvoice\todddialog_armorineffectiv_00056101_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh-oh, no more ammo. Guess have to smash some skulls in the old fashioned way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊哦，没有子弹了。估计得用老式的方法去砸碎一些头骨。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Todd [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0700765B]ToddDialogue) 0700765B (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : Fake remorse EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\toddvoice\todddialogue_noammo_00056111_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Crippled
ESP.TRADUIT: 伤残

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm fine, just need to dose up and I won't feel a thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没事，只要一服药，就不会有任何问题了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Todd [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0700765B]ToddDialogue) 0700765B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\toddvoice\todddialogue_crippled_00056109_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I find myself asking that every time sweat falls into my eyes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 每次汗水流入我的眼睛，我都会这么问自己。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Brandt [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07014F32]RoadMainQuest) Far From Any Road EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadvoicebrandt\roadmainqu_aabrandtlocatio_00014f37_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was supposed to be stationed at Camp Guardian, where I would actually be able to do my job efficiently.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我本该驻扎在守卫营地，在那里会更有效地完成我的工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Brandt [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07014F32]RoadMainQuest) Far From Any Road EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadvoicebrandt\roadmainqu_aabrandtlocatio_00014f37_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But a great vagueness descended on Guardian, and they've ceased any and all contact. Instead of being stationed there, I'm just sitting here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，营地陷入了茫然中，他们停止了和外界的任何联系。 我不是驻扎在那里，只是在那虚度光阴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Brandt [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07014F32]RoadMainQuest) Far From Any Road EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadvoicebrandt\roadmainqu_aabrandtlocatio_00014f37_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you doing out here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在这里做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is a Ranger station. I'm not a Ranger, and I don't have any authority over them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是一个游骑兵驻扎站，而我不是游骑兵，无法对他们指手画脚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Brandt [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07014F32]RoadMainQuest) Far From Any Road EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadvoicebrandt\roadmainqu_aabrandtclarify_00014f3a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why aren't you in charge?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么不是你负责？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm supposed to be keeping an eye on the road leading north. That whole stretch, starting with the tunnel, is infested with raiders. And worse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我职责是留意通往北方的道路。 从隧道开始，整段路段都盘踞着掠夺者，甚至比掠夺者更糟的家伙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Brandt [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07014F32]RoadMainQuest) Far From Any Road EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadvoicebrandt\roadmainqu_aabrandtguardia_00014f3c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Observation tends to be easier from a point of elevation. Shocking, no?
ESP.TRADUIT: 从高处观察比较容易，突然打他一发，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Brandt [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07014F32]RoadMainQuest) Far From Any Road EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadvoicebrandt\roadmainqu_aabrandtguardia_00014f3c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What were you supposed to do at Guardian?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你应该在守卫营地做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a natural filtering point for raiders. They want to get away from us, so they head east. Too far east, they find Caesar.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是掠夺者们的天然筛选点。他们想远离我们，所以往东走，但在遥远的东方，凯撒在等着他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Brandt [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07014F32]RoadMainQuest) Far From Any Road EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadvoicebrandt\roadmainquest_aabrandtroad_00014f3e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, they got to thinking they could use that bottleneck to ambush caravans and such. In response, we slapped a lock on their front door.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们开始认为可以利用这个瓶颈路段来伏击商队之类的。作为应付手段，我们在他们的前门上加了一把锁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Brandt [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07014F32]RoadMainQuest) Far From Any Road EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadvoicebrandt\roadmainquest_aabrandtroad_00014f3e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But in case we got to thinking that we could pay attention to something that actually matters, an important fugitive fled up there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但如果我们想谈的是重点，那重点是有个重罪逃犯逃到了那里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Brandt [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07014F32]RoadMainQuest) Far From Any Road EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadvoicebrandt\roadmainquest_aabrandtroad_00014f3e_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's going on with the north road?
ESP.TRADUIT: 北路怎么了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Right, It's ridiculous. This is a complete farce. This asshole didn't run with valuable intel or anything. It's all for show.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对的，确实荒谬。这完全是一场闹剧，关于这混蛋甚至没有任何有价值的情报，都就是在作秀。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Brandt [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07014F32]RoadMainQuest) Far From Any Road EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadvoicebrandt\roadmainqu_aabrandtquestst_00014f40_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's the spoiled son of an important fellow back west. Senator Burke. His brat, Adam, got caught making a big mess, and he ran.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是西部一个大人物，参议员伯克的儿子。他娇生惯养的儿子，亚当，把他老爸的声誉弄的一团糟，被抓了，然后他跑了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Brandt [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07014F32]RoadMainQuest) Far From Any Road EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadvoicebrandt\roadmainqu_aabrandtquestst_00014f40_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sick bastard was having his way with little girls and then waving his money around to make it go away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个变态在玩弄那些小女孩之后，挥洒着他的瓶盖，想彻底掩盖这件事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Brandt [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07014F32]RoadMainQuest) Far From Any Road EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadvoicebrandt\roadmainqu_aabrandtquestst_00014f40_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, someone got wise, and brought it to the authorities. Somehow, the Burkes got word, and Adam split.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，有人变聪明了，把它交给了当局。不知何故，伯克一家听说之后，亚当就跑了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Brandt [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07014F32]RoadMainQuest) Far From Any Road EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadvoicebrandt\roadmainqu_aabrandtquestst_00014f40_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hmm. You look like the mercenary type. If you're interested, I'd be authorized to pay you for going after Burke.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，你看起来像是个雇佣兵，如果你有兴趣，我可以付钱让你去找那个伯克。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Brandt [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07014F32]RoadMainQuest) Far From Any Road EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadvoicebrandt\roadmainqu_aabrandtquestst_00014f40_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fugitive?
ESP.TRADUIT: 逃犯？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Excellent. I should warn you, the reward is only payable in full if you bring him back alive. Dead, you only get 500.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太好了。不过我得警告你，只有把他活着带回来才能得到全部的赏金，他死了的话你只能得到500。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Brandt [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07014F32]RoadMainQuest) Far From Any Road EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadvoicebrandt\roadmainqu_aabrandtaccept_00014f43_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Along with the knowledge that you rid the world of one more child-raping piece of filth.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再加上，你把世界上又一个强奸儿童的混蛋除掉了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Brandt [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07014F32]RoadMainQuest) Far From Any Road EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadvoicebrandt\roadmainqu_aabrandtaccept_00014f43_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's the key to that lock we put on the north road gate. Be extremely careful. It's nasty up there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是我们装在北路大门上的锁钥匙。小心谨慎，那边很危险。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Brandt [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07014F32]RoadMainQuest) Far From Any Road EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadvoicebrandt\roadmainqu_aabrandtaccept_00014f43_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, always looking for work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，我一直在找工作。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Brandt [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07014F32]RoadMainQuest) Far From Any Road EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadvoicebrandt\roadmainqu_aabrandtdecline_00014f45_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not interested.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不感兴趣。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great. Wish I got to keep more'n 100 of these. Go on through.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太好了，真希望我能多留100瓶盖，去做你的事吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dooley [07014935] (mod) Quest : ([07018215]RoadDooleyDialogue) 07018215 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadvoicedooley\roaddooley_aadooleypay_00018826_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, here's the caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，这是瓶盖。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuckin' tightwad.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死的小气鬼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dooley [07014935] (mod) Quest : ([07018215]RoadDooleyDialogue) 07018215 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadvoicedooley\roaddooley_aadooleyrefuse_00018828_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nevermind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没关系。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What-? Me, motherfucker! Uh, you go into town, right? See anyone with the armor, the badass guns, the giant fucking dicks, there you go. Road Snakes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么...？我，混蛋！呃，你会去镇上，对吧？你去看谁有盔甲，有枪，有大鸡巴，你就懂了！是公路蟒蛇帮！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dooley [07014935] (mod) Quest : ([07018215]RoadDooleyDialogue) 07018215 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadvoicedooley\roaddooley_dooleyroadsnake_00031941_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What the hell are Road Snakes?
ESP.TRADUIT: 公路蟒蛇帮是什么鬼东西？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, uh... Colin would hit me if I said anyone other'n him. But, uh, nah, he's just the motherfucker organizing the defenses and shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，呃...如果我谈论除他以外的任何人，科林会打我。 但是，呃，不，他只是组织防御和琐事的混蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dooley [07014935] (mod) Quest : ([07018215]RoadDooleyDialogue) 07018215 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadvoicedooley\roaddooley_aadooleyboss_00031943_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go into town, the biggest shot-caller is Irene. She's crazy, man. Only reason it ain't official is cause she spends all her time fucking hookers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去镇上吧，老大是艾琳。她是个疯子，老兄。她不在岗位上的话，那就是她在跟妓女鬼混，还要鬼混一整天。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dooley [07014935] (mod) Quest : ([07018215]RoadDooleyDialogue) 07018215 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadvoicedooley\roaddooley_aadooleyboss_00031943_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Which is fucking awesome, cause, like, you got her titties, right? And then the hooker's titties, so, like, you got titties any which way you look.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这他妈的太棒了，因为...就像...你玩到了她的奶子，对吧？ 然后是妓女的奶子，所以，无论你怎么看，你都会有奶子玩。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dooley [07014935] (mod) Quest : ([07018215]RoadDooleyDialogue) 07018215 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadvoicedooley\roaddooley_aadooleyboss_00031943_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh, speaking of titties, the guy who runs the whorehouse, Jon, he's the guy who knows fuckin' everything going on around here. So, he's like, mayor?
ESP.TRADUIT: 说到奶子，经营妓院的那个人，乔恩，他他妈的知道这里发生的一切。所以...他就像...镇长？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dooley [07014935] (mod) Quest : ([07018215]RoadDooleyDialogue) 07018215 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadvoicedooley\roaddooley_aadooleyboss_00031943_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who's in charge here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里谁负责？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh yeah. See, the other raiders around here don’t have anything but little territories.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦是的。这里的其他掠夺者除了一小片领土外，什么都没有。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colin Luke [07000DFA] (mod) Quest : ([07033B87]RoadColinLuke) Nothing Ventured EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolinvoice\roadcolinluke_aacolinboss_00033b8c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Me, I made something bigger and better. Nobody fucks with us here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我，我做了更大更好的东西。这里没人敢惹我们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colin Luke [07000DFA] (mod) Quest : ([07033B87]RoadColinLuke) Nothing Ventured EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolinvoice\roadcolinluke_aacolinboss_00033b8c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is your town?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是你的城镇吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, well, we’re a gang, right? I don’t care how you define it. Raiders, gangs, tribes, towns, ‘s all the same shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，嗯，我们是一个帮派，对吧？我不在乎你怎么定义它。掠夺者，帮派，部落，城镇，都一样的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colin Luke [07000DFA] (mod) Quest : ([07033B87]RoadColinLuke) Nothing Ventured EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolinvoice\roadcolinl_aacolinraiders_00033b8e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't seem like raiders.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看起来不像掠夺者。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why do you think you’re qualified for any of the shit I do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么觉得你能胜任我做的这些破事？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colin Luke [07000DFA] (mod) Quest : ([07033B87]RoadColinLuke) Nothing Ventured EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolinvoice\roadcolinluke_aacolinwork_00033b90_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you’re looking for work, try the bar. Pretty sure Jon is looking for a cleaner or something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你正在找工作，可以试试这家酒吧。我很确定乔恩在找清洁工之类的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colin Luke [07000DFA] (mod) Quest : ([07033B87]RoadColinLuke) Nothing Ventured EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolinvoice\roadcolinluke_aacolinwork_00033b90_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If I was looking for work, I imagine I'd start with you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我要找工作，我想我应该从你开始？

ESP.ORIGINAL: OK, fine, hotshot. There’s a little crew of raiders in a cave to the north.
ESP.TRADUIT: OK，好吧，高手。北边的山洞里有一小队掠夺者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colin Luke [07000DFA] (mod) Quest : ([07033B87]RoadColinLuke) Nothing Ventured EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolinvoice\roadcolinl_aacolinstartque_00033b92_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They keep throwing shit at the wall, and I don’t feel like dealing with them. Go kick their asses, and I’ll give you a hundred caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们一直往墙上扔垃圾，但我不想跟他们打交道。去给他们个教训，我给你一百瓶盖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colin Luke [07000DFA] (mod) Quest : ([07033B87]RoadColinLuke) Nothing Ventured EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolinvoice\roadcolinl_aacolinstartque_00033b92_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I just figured the guy in charge might have a handle on jobs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是认为负责人可能会处理这些工作。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh-huh.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊哈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colin Luke [07000DFA] (mod) Quest : ([07033B87]RoadColinLuke) Nothing Ventured EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolinvoice\roadcolinl_aacolinquestyes_00033b94_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Consider it done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 包在我身上。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, you fuckin' asked.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，你他妈的问了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colin Luke [07000DFA] (mod) Quest : ([07033B87]RoadColinLuke) Nothing Ventured EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolinvoice\roadcolinl_aacolinquestno_00033b96_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No thanks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，谢谢。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Saves me some time. Here’s your money. If you’re looking to spend it, the brothel is right over there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 节约了我一点时间。这是你的钱，如果你想花钱，妓院欢迎你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colin Luke [07000DFA] (mod) Quest : ([07033B87]RoadColinLuke) Nothing Ventured EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolinvoice\roadcolinl_aacolinquestdon_00033c3f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I killed the raiders.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀了那些掠夺者。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kid with the fat pockets? Sure, he came through here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有钱的小孩？没错，他来过这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colin Luke [07000DFA] (mod) Quest : ([07033B87]RoadColinLuke) Nothing Ventured EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolinvoice\roadcolinluke_aacolinburke_00033c41_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Paid the gate toll, then rushed right on through. Didn't even check the town out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 付了通行费，然后冲了过去。连镇子都没好好看过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colin Luke [07000DFA] (mod) Quest : ([07033B87]RoadColinLuke) Nothing Ventured EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolinvoice\roadcolinluke_aacolinburke_00033c41_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever. Money is money, and it’s always a pleasure to take it from NCR.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无所谓，钱就是钱，从NCR那里拿钱也是一种乐趣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colin Luke [07000DFA] (mod) Quest : ([07033B87]RoadColinLuke) Nothing Ventured EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolinvoice\roadcolinluke_aacolinburke_00033c41_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm looking for guy named Adam Burke. Rich NCR kid?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在找一个叫亚当·伯克的人，一个有钱的NCR小孩儿？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, friend, that's an interesting one. Would you believe that, before the war, I was a humble servant of God?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，朋友，这是个有趣的问题。战前我是上帝谦卑的仆人，你相信吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jon Vicky [0701060B] (mod) Quest : ([07034E48]RoadJonQuest) Application of Force EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadjonvoice\roadjonque_aajonbackstory_00034e4d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Even after my family had died, and my flesh left my body, I tried to spread the good word.
ESP.TRADUIT: 即使在我的家人去世，我的肉体离开我的身体之后，我仍试图传播这个福音。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jon Vicky [0701060B] (mod) Quest : ([07034E48]RoadJonQuest) Application of Force EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadjonvoice\roadjonque_aajonbackstory_00034e4d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It took a good twenty-odd years of post-war life for incredulity to form. After that, I jumped headfirst into the violence and debasement I had seen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 战后20多年我才开始怀疑。在那之后，我一头扎进了我见过的暴力和堕落中。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jon Vicky [0701060B] (mod) Quest : ([07034E48]RoadJonQuest) Application of Force EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadjonvoice\roadjonque_aajonbackstory_00034e4d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fast-forward a few centuries, and our noble Father Jon Vicky is a proud peddler of alcohol, narcotics, and carnal pleasure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 快进几个世纪，我们高贵的乔恩·维基神父是一位自豪于酒、麻醉品和肉体享乐的快乐小贩。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jon Vicky [0701060B] (mod) Quest : ([07034E48]RoadJonQuest) Application of Force EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadjonvoice\roadjonque_aajonbackstory_00034e4d_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's your story?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有什么故事？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm told a man of that summarization had passed through the town, but I can assure you, he didn't visit my place of business.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说有个这样的人经过这里，但我可以向你保证，他没有来过我的办公地点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jon Vicky [0701060B] (mod) Quest : ([07034E48]RoadJonQuest) Application of Force EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadjonvoice\roadjonquest_aajonburke_00034e4f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: While I'm hardly one to condemn a person for their choice of profession, I might advocate leniancy for young Adam, despite the price on his head.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然我不会因为一个人的职业选择而谴责他，但我可能会主张对年轻的亚当宽大处理，尽管他应该为此付出代价。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jon Vicky [0701060B] (mod) Quest : ([07034E48]RoadJonQuest) Application of Force EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadjonvoice\roadjonquest_aajonburke_00034e4f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: After all, a good number of the folks here in Madsen have some form of warrant for their capture, were that they could be found on NCR land.
ESP.TRADUIT: 毕竟，马德森的很多人都有某种形式的悬赏，但仅限于NCR的地盘。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jon Vicky [0701060B] (mod) Quest : ([07034E48]RoadJonQuest) Application of Force EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadjonvoice\roadjonquest_aajonburke_00034e4f_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course, I'm not familiar with the man's alleged crimes. Perhaps he's committed such grave atrocities, his own mother would string him by the neck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，我对他的罪名并不熟悉。也许他犯下了亲生母亲都会绞死他的暴行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jon Vicky [0701060B] (mod) Quest : ([07034E48]RoadJonQuest) Application of Force EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadjonvoice\roadjonquest_aajonburke_00034e4f_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm looking for a man named Adam Burke. Young, wealthy... ring any bells?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在找一个叫亚当·伯克的人。年轻，富有...有什么消息吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, I'm certain we've more than enough young ladies on tap already. All slots are filled, I suppose you could say?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，我确信我们已经有足够多的年轻女士在等待。我想你会说，所有的名额都已经满了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jon Vicky [0701060B] (mod) Quest : ([07034E48]RoadJonQuest) Application of Force EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadjonvoice\roadjonque_aajonqueststart_00034e52_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Although, I suspect that wasn't the service you were offering. Hmm, there is a matter, small though it may be, that I do need taken care of.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，我怀疑你提供的不是这种服务。嗯，有件事，虽然可能性很小，但我确实需要处理一下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jon Vicky [0701060B] (mod) Quest : ([07034E48]RoadJonQuest) Application of Force EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadjonvoice\roadjonque_aajonqueststart_00034e52_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Would you, by any chance, be willing to shuffle off another human being's mortal coil?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你会不会，有可能，愿意帮另一个人离开尘世？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jon Vicky [0701060B] (mod) Quest : ([07034E48]RoadJonQuest) Application of Force EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadjonvoice\roadjonque_aajonqueststart_00034e52_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, say I was looking for work?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，假设我在找工作？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mighty kind of you, friend. Now, a bit of context.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真好，朋友。现在，讲一点背景知识。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jon Vicky [0701060B] (mod) Quest : ([07034E48]RoadJonQuest) Application of Force EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadjonvoice\roadjonquest_aajonaccept_00034e54_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: While the staff here are consummate professionals, there are times where indications of humanity occur. Usually, this is harmless. Usually.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然这里的工作人员都是完美的专业人员，但有时也会出现人性化的迹象。通常，这是无害的。通常。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jon Vicky [0701060B] (mod) Quest : ([07034E48]RoadJonQuest) Application of Force EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadjonvoice\roadjonquest_aajonaccept_00034e54_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A client purchased time with one our dear ladies here, and they absconded to a private suite together. Once there, the pair proceeded to undress.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有个客户和我们亲爱的女士们共度时光，然后他们一起逃到了一个私人套房。一到那里，两人就开始脱衣服。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jon Vicky [0701060B] (mod) Quest : ([07034E48]RoadJonQuest) Application of Force EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadjonvoice\roadjonquest_aajonaccept_00034e54_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As it turns out, the client... lacked for scale, in regards to his more personal regions. His companion couldn't help but laugh at the discovery.
ESP.TRADUIT: 事实证明，这个客户...他的私密领域有点...缺乏规模。他的女伴发现之后忍不住笑了出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jon Vicky [0701060B] (mod) Quest : ([07034E48]RoadJonQuest) Application of Force EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadjonvoice\roadjonquest_aajonaccept_00034e54_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This angered the client, and he proceeded to slash her face with a razor. She's recovering well enough, but in the meantime, the man has to go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这激怒了这位客户，他剃刀划伤了她的脸。好在她恢复得不错，但与此同时，这个人必须被驱逐。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jon Vicky [0701060B] (mod) Quest : ([07034E48]RoadJonQuest) Application of Force EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadjonvoice\roadjonquest_aajonaccept_00034e54_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The man has since fled to the south to prey upon travellers. He's also purchased a handful of hussies to defend his body and lie about his cock size.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个人后来逃到南方去抢劫旅客。他还收买了一堆妓女来为他的身体辩解，对他的鸡巴大小造谣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jon Vicky [0701060B] (mod) Quest : ([07034E48]RoadJonQuest) Application of Force EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadjonvoice\roadjonquest_aajonaccept_00034e54_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, please, prevent him from poisoning the same atmosphere as the rest of us, and I'll be happy to compensate you for services rendered.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，不要让像他一样人破坏这里的气氛，我很乐意为你所做的贡献给予补偿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jon Vicky [0701060B] (mod) Quest : ([07034E48]RoadJonQuest) Application of Force EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadjonvoice\roadjonquest_aajonaccept_00034e54_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, is there anything else I can do for you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，我还能为你做些什么吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jon Vicky [0701060B] (mod) Quest : ([07034E48]RoadJonQuest) Application of Force EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadjonvoice\roadjonquest_aajonaccept_00034e54_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, if the money is right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，价钱合适就行。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You may well be wiser than the rest of us, friend.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可能比我们都聪明，朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jon Vicky [0701060B] (mod) Quest : ([07034E48]RoadJonQuest) Application of Force EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadjonvoice\roadjonquest_aajondecline_00034e56_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, can I do anything else for you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，我还能为你做些什么吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jon Vicky [0701060B] (mod) Quest : ([07034E48]RoadJonQuest) Application of Force EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadjonvoice\roadjonquest_aajondecline_00034e56_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No thanks, I don't need blood on my hands.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不了，谢谢，我的手上不需要有血。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's very good to hear, friend. Your reward, as promised. And a complimentary shot of my finest, as a subtle suggestion for how to spend the prize.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很高兴听到这个，朋友。如承诺的那样，这是你的报酬。再来一杯我最好的酒，作为如何使用奖金的微妙建议。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jon Vicky [0701060B] (mod) Quest : ([07034E48]RoadJonQuest) Application of Force EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadjonvoice\roadjonque_aajonquestfinis_00034e58_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, before you head off again, I wonder if you might find yourself willing to help me with another matter?
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，在你再次出发之前，我想知道你是否愿意帮我做另一件事？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jon Vicky [0701060B] (mod) Quest : ([07034E48]RoadJonQuest) Application of Force EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadjonvoice\roadjonque_aajonquestfinis_00034e58_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I killed that guy for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我为你杀了那个家伙。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course, I'd be happy to host you for as long as you'd like, for the one-time payment of 700 caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，只要你愿意，我很乐意招待你，一次700瓶盖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jon Vicky [0701060B] (mod) Quest : ([07034E48]RoadJonQuest) Application of Force EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadjonvoice\roadjonquest_aajonroom_00034e5a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm interested in a room.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想要一间房。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pleasure to do business with you, my friend. You're welcome to stay for as long as you'd like.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很高兴和你做生意，朋友。你愿意住多久就住多久。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jon Vicky [0701060B] (mod) Quest : ([07034E48]RoadJonQuest) Application of Force EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadjonvoice\roadjonquest_aajonroomyes_00034e5c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll take it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我就要它了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, if you change your mind, I'm likely to still have the available space.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，如果你改变主意了，我很可能还有空房间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jon Vicky [0701060B] (mod) Quest : ([07034E48]RoadJonQuest) Application of Force EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadjonvoice\roadjonquest_aajonroomno_00034e5e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No thanks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，谢谢。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pick your pleasure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 挑选你的快乐。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jon Vicky [0701060B] (mod) Quest : ([07034E48]RoadJonQuest) Application of Force EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadjonvoice\roadjonque_aajoninventory_00034e60_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you have on tap?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们这里都有什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Basic stuff. A bit of ammo, a bit of weaponry, but mostly that’s May’s market. Mostly, I sell your basics. Junk, gear, meds.
ESP.TRADUIT: 基本的东西，一点弹药，一些武器，但大部分都在梅的市场。我主要卖一些基本用品，垃圾、装备、药物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Del Toro [07013086] (mod) Quest : ([07035469]RoadDelToro) 07035469 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roaddeltorovoice\roaddeltoro_aadeltorostock_0003546d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, what do you sell here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们这里卖什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Feel free to overpay me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 欢迎多给我钱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Del Toro [07013086] (mod) Quest : ([07035469]RoadDelToro) 07035469 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roaddeltorovoice\roaddeltor_aadeltoropurcha_0003546f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me see your inventory.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我看看你的存货清单。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a good place. Lots of foot traffic coming both ways. There's always a bit of trouble from raiders, but Colin and his goofy gang deter them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是个好地方，来往的行人很多。掠夺者总是会给我们带来一些麻烦，但是科林和他那帮蠢家伙阻止了他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Del Toro [07013086] (mod) Quest : ([07035469]RoadDelToro) 07035469 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roaddeltorovoice\roaddeltoro_aamadsen_00035471_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Gangers and outlaws founded the place. Then they calmed down, and now we have Madsen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 匪徒和亡命徒建立了这个地方，然后让这里安定下来，逐渐就发展成今天的马德森。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Del Toro [07013086] (mod) Quest : ([07035469]RoadDelToro) 07035469 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roaddeltorovoice\roaddeltoro_aamadsen_00035471_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Most of the people don't want to live under the thumb of the NCR. If they expand this far, town'll dry up. Everyone will move on to greener pastures.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里大多数人都不想生活在NCR的控制之下。如果NCR扩张到这么远，镇子就会枯竭，每个人都会搬到更好的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Del Toro [07013086] (mod) Quest : ([07035469]RoadDelToro) 07035469 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roaddeltorovoice\roaddeltoro_aamadsen_00035471_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me about Madsen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟我说说马德森。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Money, boss. No one here needs to pay taxes, ‘cept the first time to get in the gate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 钱，老板。除了第一次进门外，这里没有人需要交税。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Del Toro [07013086] (mod) Quest : ([07035469]RoadDelToro) 07035469 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roaddeltorovoice\roaddeltor_aadeltorobackgr_00035473_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It’s safe enough. Colin talks big, but that’s all it is. We’re not raiders. Just a normal town, only no NCR. Life is better that way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它足够安全，科林这个人只是有点爱吹牛。然后我们并不是掠夺者，这只是个普通的小镇，只是没有NCR。不过这样的生活更好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Del Toro [07013086] (mod) Quest : ([07035469]RoadDelToro) 07035469 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roaddeltorovoice\roaddeltor_aadeltorobackgr_00035473_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So what brought you to town, then?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么是什么让你来到镇里呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Work? Sure. Bring me interesting stuff, and I'll buy it from you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 工作？当然，你有有趣的东西，我就从你这里买。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Del Toro [07013086] (mod) Quest : ([07035469]RoadDelToro) 07035469 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roaddeltorovoice\roaddeltoro_aadeltorowork_00035475_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't suppose you have any work for me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不会有工作要给我吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Madsen is, at the moment, a perfect example of a nascent frontier town. It's only recently shed it's status as an outpost of raiders and brigands.
ESP.TRADUIT: 目前，马德森是一个新兴边境城市的完美例子。直到最近，它才摆脱了掠夺者帮派或掠夺者前哨这个定位。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jon Vicky [0701060B] (mod) Quest : ([07034E48]RoadJonQuest) Application of Force EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadjonvoice\roadjonquest_aajonmadsen_000366b0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The inhabitants most motivated by their baser instincts have moved on to greener pastures, of their own volition, or otherwise.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些受他们卑鄙本能驱使的居民，出于他们自己的意愿或其他原因，已经搬到了自己认为的更好的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jon Vicky [0701060B] (mod) Quest : ([07034E48]RoadJonQuest) Application of Force EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadjonvoice\roadjonquest_aajonmadsen_000366b0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The next step, I imagine, will be for saner minds to drown out the din of Colin and Dooley, and the town shall entirely shed the raider image.
ESP.TRADUIT: 下一步，我想，将是更理智的头脑淹没科林和杜利的喧嚣，城镇将完全摆脱掠夺者的形象。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jon Vicky [0701060B] (mod) Quest : ([07034E48]RoadJonQuest) Application of Force EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadjonvoice\roadjonquest_aajonmadsen_000366b0_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Assuming the NCR can resist the urge to lay claim to our little home, I expect Madsen to prosper for the forseeable future.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果NCR能够抵制住侵略和扩张的冲动，马德森的繁荣指日可待。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jon Vicky [0701060B] (mod) Quest : ([07034E48]RoadJonQuest) Application of Force EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadjonvoice\roadjonquest_aajonmadsen_000366b0_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And God help us if the Legion's eyes fall upon us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果军团的目光落在我们身上，愿上帝保佑我们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jon Vicky [0701060B] (mod) Quest : ([07034E48]RoadJonQuest) Application of Force EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadjonvoice\roadjonquest_aajonmadsen_000366b0_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can you tell me about this town?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能告诉我关于这个小镇的什么吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] What? No, shut up! I want your money, now hand it over!
ESP.TRADUIT: (失败)什么？不，闭嘴！我要你的钱，快给我！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harris [07037927] (mod) Quest : ([0703C1BA]RoadHarrisDialogue) 0703C1BA (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\maleadult01default\roadharris_aaharrisspeechc_0003c1bd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What if, instead of giving you my money, I give you... This neat-looking rock I found!
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我不给你钱，而是给你...我找到了这块看起来很整洁的石头！

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] What? I'm not a raider! I'm just trying to make some money, so... Uh...
ESP.TRADUIT: (成功)什么？我不是掠夺者！我只是想赚点钱，所以...呃...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harris [07037927] (mod) Quest : ([0703C1BA]RoadHarrisDialogue) 0703C1BA (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\maleadult01default\roadharris_aaharrisspeechc_0003c1be_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...I'm trying to rob people to pay for chems. I guess I am a raider. How the hell did that happen?
ESP.TRADUIT: ...我试图抢劫他人来支付化学药品的费用，这像是一个掠夺者。 我到底是怎么变成这样的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harris [07037927] (mod) Quest : ([0703C1BA]RoadHarrisDialogue) 0703C1BA (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\maleadult01default\roadharris_aaharrisspeechc_0003c1be_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, how's the raider life treating you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，掠夺者的生活对你来说怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: What, you think I won't shoot you? I'm a hardened killer, man!
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么，你以为我不会开枪吗？我是个冷血杀手，伙计！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harris [07037927] (mod) Quest : ([0703C1BA]RoadHarrisDialogue) 0703C1BA (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\maleadult01default\roadharris_aaharrisrefusal_0003c1c0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go fuck yourself, junkie.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回去干你自己吧，瘾君子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well... Shit, you brought this on yourself!
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯...妈的，这是你自找的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harris [07037927] (mod) Quest : ([0703C1BA]RoadHarrisDialogue) 0703C1BA (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\maleadult01default\roadharris_aaharrisrefuse2_0003c1c2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did you not hear me the first time? Seriously, go fuck yourself, junkie.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你没听到我第一次说的话吗？说真的，去死吧，瘾君子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait, really? Uh, I mean... Smart choice! You, uh... don't follow me, dammit!
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，真的吗？呃，我的意思是...聪明的选择！你，呃...该死，别跟着我！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harris [07037927] (mod) Quest : ([0703C1BA]RoadHarrisDialogue) 0703C1BA (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\maleadult01default\roadharris_aaharrispayment_0003c1c4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, here's 1000 caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，这是1000瓶盖。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait, you too? God damn it! You, uh... You got lucky, this time! To hell with this, I'm out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，你也是？该死！你，好吧...这次算你走运！真他妈的，我要走了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harris [07037927] (mod) Quest : ([0703C1BA]RoadHarrisDialogue) 0703C1BA (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\maleadult01default\roadharris_aaharrispayment_0003c1c5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry, I'm flat broke.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起，我身无分文。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uhh, that's, uh... B-bad move, pal! Get ready to eat lead!
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，那是，呃...糟糕的举动，伙计！ 准备吃枪子吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harris [07037927] (mod) Quest : ([0703C1BA]RoadHarrisDialogue) 0703C1BA (EDID) EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\maleadult01default\roadharris_aaharrisfight_0003c1c7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Attack] Right. Well, you're dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: [攻击] 对，嗯，你死了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wasn't thinking straight. My girl up and left me a while ago. Lost most of my cash on a poker table. Only thing I had left was jet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我当时没想清楚，我女朋友刚和我分手，我又把大部分钱都输在赌桌上了...我只剩下杰特了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harris [07037927] (mod) Quest : ([0703C1BA]RoadHarrisDialogue) 0703C1BA (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\maleadult01default\roadharris_aaharrisreform_0003c1c9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I used the last of my money to get into town, but this whole thing was a mistake. I'm going... to go back home. Look for honest work, maybe?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我用我最后的钱进了城，但我不应该这么做。我要...回家了，也许找份诚实的工作？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harris [07037927] (mod) Quest : ([0703C1BA]RoadHarrisDialogue) 0703C1BA (EDID) EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\maleadult01default\roadharris_aaharrisreform_0003c1c9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry for the trouble. I didn't mean nothing by it. I'll just... I'm just going to get out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起，给你添麻烦了。我没有别的意思，我就是...我要离开这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harris [07037927] (mod) Quest : ([0703C1BA]RoadHarrisDialogue) 0703C1BA (EDID) EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\maleadult01default\roadharris_aaharrisreform_0003c1c9_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It isn't too late to turn things around. Not many people in your position get that chance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在扭转局面还不晚。很少有人像你这样有机会。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shit, what would my family say if they knew about this? This was a mistake. I'll just... leave you be. Sorry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 妈的，要是我家人知道了会怎么说？这是一个错误，我这就...离开你，对不起。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harris [07037927] (mod) Quest : ([0703C1BA]RoadHarrisDialogue) 0703C1BA (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\maleadult01default\roadharris_aaharrisdick_0003c1cb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Because you're too weak and stupid to actually make something of your life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为你太软弱，太愚蠢，无法真正有所作为。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's okay if you need a minute to collect yourself. Looking at this shit can be... overwhelming.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你需要点时间冷静一下也没关系。看看你做的事...把你内心压垮了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May Ito [07012A8D] (mod) Quest : ([070488F8]RoadMayDialogue) I Plead the Second EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadmayvoice\roadmaydia_aaamayshowinven_000488fd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's see what you've got.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我们看看你有什么能耐。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uhh... Cause, you're an asshole. Get ready to eat lead, motherfucker!
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃...因为，你是个混蛋。准备吃枪子吧，狗娘养的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Petey Baja [0702ACAB] (mod) Quest : ([070488FF]RoadPeteDialogue) 070488FF (EDID) EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\maleadult01default\roadpetedi_roadpetetaunt_00048902_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have a higher bodycount than the war. Why does every idiot think they're the one who will get me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀掉的人比战争中死掉的还多，为什么每个白痴都以为他们能抓到我？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No! No! You're... you're gonna be underneath me, cause I'm gonna bury you! Yeah!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不！不！你...你会在我下面，因为我要把你埋了！对！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Petey Baja [0702ACAB] (mod) Quest : ([070488FF]RoadPeteDialogue) 070488FF (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\maleadult01default\roadpetedi_roafpetefuckoff_00048904_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get out of my face, kid. You're beneath me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从我面前消失，孩子，你在我之下。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, you piss off!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，你滚开！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Petey Baja [0702ACAB] (mod) Quest : ([070488FF]RoadPeteDialogue) 070488FF (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\maleadult01default\roadpetedi_roadpetepissoff_00048906_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Piss off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 滚开。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who, me? Well, I'm from Westside, originally. Down around Vegas, you know? It's been... what, four years since I came here? Doubt anyone misses me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谁，我？我最初来自西区。在维加斯附近，你知道吗？我来...这里已经四年了？恐怕没人会想起我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May Ito [07012A8D] (mod) Quest : ([070488F8]RoadMayDialogue) I Plead the Second EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadmayvoice\roadmaydia_aamaybackground_0004e1e7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wouldn't leave the militia alone until they finally gave me a shotgun and a patrol order. I was only, what, 14-15?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会独自离开民兵兵营，但直到他们给了我一把霰弹枪和一个巡逻命令。我那时才14到15岁？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May Ito [07012A8D] (mod) Quest : ([070488F8]RoadMayDialogue) I Plead the Second EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadmayvoice\roadmaydia_aamaybackground_0004e1e7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was pretty boring, really. Only interesting bit was one day, I held up a Khan who was delivering drugs! Pretty much makes me a badass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的很无聊，有趣的是有一天，我抓了一个运毒品的大汗帮！几乎让我成为一个坏蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May Ito [07012A8D] (mod) Quest : ([070488F8]RoadMayDialogue) I Plead the Second EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadmayvoice\roadmaydia_aamaybackground_0004e1e7_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I also might have let her go free in exchange for some free goodies. I actually considered joining the Khans, but that didn't pan out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我睁一只眼闭一只眼放了她以换取一些免费的东西。我真的考虑过加入大汗帮，但没成功。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May Ito [07012A8D] (mod) Quest : ([070488F8]RoadMayDialogue) I Plead the Second EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadmayvoice\roadmaydia_aamaybackground_0004e1e7_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was probably 'cause I was really high, but I seem to recall figuring the best way to impress the Khans would be shooting some random NCR soldier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可能是因为我嗑药嗑嗨了，但我似乎记得，要想给大汗帮留下好印象，最好的办法就是随便射杀一个NCR士兵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May Ito [07012A8D] (mod) Quest : ([070488F8]RoadMayDialogue) I Plead the Second EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadmayvoice\roadmaydia_aamaybackground_0004e1e7_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I sobered up, realized that, uh, I didn't want a price on my head. So, I packed my bags, headed north, and here I am.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我干了，然后我清醒过来，意识到我下半辈子都是亡命之徒了。所以我收拾好行李，往北走了，就来到了这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May Ito [07012A8D] (mod) Quest : ([070488F8]RoadMayDialogue) I Plead the Second EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadmayvoice\roadmaydia_aamaybackground_0004e1e7_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's your story?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有什么故事？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, no, 'cause he was in uniform and carrying a rifle, and was barking orders at some locals. I was, y'know, doing my job as a militiaman. Woman.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，因为他穿着制服，拿着步枪，还对一些当地人发号施令。你知道的，我在尽我的民兵职责。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May Ito [07012A8D] (mod) Quest : ([070488F8]RoadMayDialogue) I Plead the Second EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadmayvoice\roadmaydia_aamaysoldiers_0004e1e9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I may have overreacted, possibly, but that dude was definitely a combatant. Still, I've avoided the Mojave, and excess drugs, ever since.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可能反应过度了，但那家伙绝对是个使枪好手。不过，从那以后，我就一直避开莫哈韦沙漠，也不会服用过量的药物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May Ito [07012A8D] (mod) Quest : ([070488F8]RoadMayDialogue) I Plead the Second EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadmayvoice\roadmaydia_aamaysoldiers_0004e1e9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait, you murdered someone?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，你杀了人？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh, I guess not! And that means he didn't come in here to buy weapons. And if he didn't buy weapons... then he must be a lame pussy. Oh well!
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，我想没有！也就是说他不是来买武器的，如果他不买武器...那他一定是个瘸子。哦没错。
