ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May Ito [07012A8D] (mod) Quest : ([070488F8]RoadMayDialogue) I Plead the Second EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadmayvoice\roadmaydialogue_aamayburke_0004e1eb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm looking for a guy named Adam Burke. Young, rich... ring any bells?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在找一个叫亚当·伯克的人。年轻，富有...你有什么线索吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, dude! I totally do have work!
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，哥们！我确实有工作！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May Ito [07012A8D] (mod) Quest : ([070488F8]RoadMayDialogue) I Plead the Second EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadmayvoice\roadmaydia_aamaystartquest_0004e1ed_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, ever since I was a little baby, or... Maybe ever since I was, like, literate... I've been making this list of guns I want.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，当我还是个婴儿的时候，或者...也许从我识字开始...我一直在列我想要的枪的清单。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May Ito [07012A8D] (mod) Quest : ([070488F8]RoadMayDialogue) I Plead the Second EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadmayvoice\roadmaydia_aamaystartquest_0004e1ed_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've narrowed it down to around six or so. I mean, I want hundreds more, but these six are relatively close by, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经把范围缩小到六个左右了。我的意思是，我想要几百把，但这六把相对比较容易实现，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May Ito [07012A8D] (mod) Quest : ([070488F8]RoadMayDialogue) I Plead the Second EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadmayvoice\roadmaydia_aamaystartquest_0004e1ed_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you can get 'em for me, I'll pay you 1000 caps a piece. How about it, wanna be cool and help me out?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你能帮我弄到，我给你1000瓶盖一把，怎么样，想不想在变酷的路上帮我一把？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May Ito [07012A8D] (mod) Quest : ([070488F8]RoadMayDialogue) I Plead the Second EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadmayvoice\roadmaydia_aamaystartquest_0004e1ed_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm looking for work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在找工作。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pfffft. Lame!
ESP.TRADUIT: 噗，瘸子！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May Ito [07012A8D] (mod) Quest : ([070488F8]RoadMayDialogue) I Plead the Second EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadmayvoice\roadmaydia_aamayquestno_0004e1ef_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nah.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah! You're awesome! Alrighty, so, I got this list, right? The stuff we're looking for isn't gonna be too far.
ESP.TRADUIT: 耶！你真棒！好吧，我有这张单子。这些东西不会太难找的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May Ito [07012A8D] (mod) Quest : ([070488F8]RoadMayDialogue) I Plead the Second EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadmayvoice\roadmaydia_aamayquestyes_0004e1f1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The farthest you'll have to go is Vegas, and I know that isn't that far, cause you and I both came from there at some point or another.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最远的话就去维加斯那边，我知道那也不算很远，因为你我都曾到过那里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May Ito [07012A8D] (mod) Quest : ([070488F8]RoadMayDialogue) I Plead the Second EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadmayvoice\roadmaydia_aamayquestyes_0004e1f1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, good luck! I wish you, y'know, success, and good fortune, and plenty of pleasant sexual adventures. Please get me my guns, now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无论如何，祝你好运！我希望你成功，好运，闹出许多愉快的桃色绯闻。然后把我的枪拿来，赶紧的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May Ito [07012A8D] (mod) Quest : ([070488F8]RoadMayDialogue) I Plead the Second EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadmayvoice\roadmaydia_aamayquestyes_0004e1f1_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我加入。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Man, fucking nothing! Bitch-ass militia kicked me out! Said that I have to use a gun, got all pissy when I smashed some Fiend's head open. Whatever.
ESP.TRADUIT: 兄弟，他妈的什么都没有！该死的民兵把我赶出去了！我之前用锤子敲爆一个恶魔帮的脑袋，但是他们跟我说我必须用枪，我很生气，无所谓了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Todd [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0704F444]RoadToddQuest) Wonder Where I Found You EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\toddvoice\roadtoddqu_aatoddqueststar_0004f447_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My girl overdosed a little back. I got nothing to do but get fucked up. For now. Fuck, man.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的女孩用药过量了，现在我没别的事可做，除了把自己变得更糟。狗日的生活，兄弟。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Todd [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0704F444]RoadToddQuest) Wonder Where I Found You EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\toddvoice\roadtoddqu_aatoddqueststar_0004f447_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shit, I don't know how long my stash will last me. My usual dealer is being a punk, won't sell shit to anyone lately.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死，我不知道我的货还能撑多久。我的老卖家是个混蛋，最近都不卖东西给任何人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Todd [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0704F444]RoadToddQuest) Wonder Where I Found You EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\toddvoice\roadtoddqu_aatoddqueststar_0004f447_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, uh... he told me not to talk with him for a while. He didn't say shit about you. Could you jog down to his place, ask what the fuck is up?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，呃...他告诉我一会儿不要和他说话。他没说你的事，你能去他家，问问他到底怎么回事吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Todd [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0704F444]RoadToddQuest) Wonder Where I Found You EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\toddvoice\roadtoddqu_aatoddqueststar_0004f447_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you do here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在这里做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kick-ass, man. He's holed up in some old-time apartment building south of town. Dude's name is Felix.
ESP.TRADUIT: 牛逼，兄弟。他躲在城南的一栋旧公寓里，那家伙叫菲利克斯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Todd [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0704F444]RoadToddQuest) Wonder Where I Found You EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\toddvoice\roadtoddquest_aatoddyes_0004f449_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Figure out what's up. Get him back in the game, if he's pulling some retirement shit. I owe you for this, amigo.
ESP.TRADUIT: 弄清楚发生了什么，如果他不想干了，那就让他重新入行。我欠你的，朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Todd [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0704F444]RoadToddQuest) Wonder Where I Found You EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\toddvoice\roadtoddquest_aatoddyes_0004f449_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, I'll talk to him for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，我会帮你跟他说的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: God fucking damn it. Shit, maybe I'll just go over myself, anyway. See how he likes that shit, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死的操它妈的，我还是自己去吧。看看他多喜欢这玩意？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Todd [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0704F444]RoadToddQuest) Wonder Where I Found You EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\toddvoice\roadtoddquest_aatoddno_0004f44b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nah, I'm a courier, not a negotiator.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我是邮差，不是谈判专家。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? Todd? Is he trying to get me killed or something? I, uh... I don't sell shit, man. I'm retired. Yeah.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？陶德？他是想害死我还是怎么的？我，呃...我什么都不卖，伙计，我不干了，没错。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felix [070021B6] (mod) Quest : ([0704F444]RoadToddQuest) Wonder Where I Found You EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\todddealervoice\roadtoddqu_aafelixqueststa_0004f451_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You should get going, man. Tell Todd to find someone else. Yeah.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你该走了，伙计，让陶德去找别人，对。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felix [070021B6] (mod) Quest : ([0704F444]RoadToddQuest) Wonder Where I Found You EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\todddealervoice\roadtoddqu_aafelixqueststa_0004f451_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Todd sent me. He wants to know why you stopped selling to him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 陶德派我来的，他想知道你为什么不卖东西给他了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shit... look, man. This... this guy just showed up a few days ago, hanging out in one of the empty rooms. He's freaking me out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 妈的...听着，伙计。这个...这家伙几天前刚来过，在一个空房间里闲逛。他吓到我了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felix [070021B6] (mod) Quest : ([0704F444]RoadToddQuest) Wonder Where I Found You EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\todddealervoice\roadtoddqu_aafelixparanoia_0004f453_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's wrong? You're acting fucking weird.
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么了？你表现得真他妈的奇怪。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is Fiend territory, and some smiley-man is just going to move in? No way. I don't trust him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是恶魔帮的地盘，某个笑脸男就这么闯进来了？不可能，我不信任他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felix [070021B6] (mod) Quest : ([0704F444]RoadToddQuest) Wonder Where I Found You EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\todddealervoice\roadtoddqu_aafelixstranger_0004f455_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell you what... You make him go away, and I'd be happy to get back to business, you know? But I'm not doing shit while he's here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉你...你把他赶走，我就很乐意继续干，你懂吗？但他在的时候我什么都干不了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felix [070021B6] (mod) Quest : ([0704F444]RoadToddQuest) Wonder Where I Found You EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\todddealervoice\roadtoddqu_aafelixstranger_0004f455_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's so weird about this guy?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这家伙有什么好奇怪的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great, thanks. I'm not saying, y'know, kill him, but... you do what you have to do, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 太好了，谢谢。我不是说杀了他，但是...做你该做的，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felix [070021B6] (mod) Quest : ([0704F444]RoadToddQuest) Wonder Where I Found You EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\todddealervoice\roadtoddquest_aafelixagree_0004fa59_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll go scope him out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我去看看他。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uhhh... Nah, man. Sorry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃...不，伙计，对不起。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felix [070021B6] (mod) Quest : ([0704F444]RoadToddQuest) Wonder Where I Found You EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\todddealervoice\roadtoddqu_aafelixinventor_0004fa5e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can I see what you have for sale?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能看看你们有什么要卖的吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, you got it. Here, this'll put you in a good mood.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，没问题，给，这个能让你心情好点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felix [070021B6] (mod) Quest : ([0704F444]RoadToddQuest) Wonder Where I Found You EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\todddealervoice\roadtoddqu_aafelixinventor_0004fa5f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can I see what you have for sale?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能看看你们有什么要卖的吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh, y'know. My girl, man. You know how it is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，你懂的，我的女孩，伙计。你知道那是怎么回事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felix [070021B6] (mod) Quest : ([0704F444]RoadToddQuest) Wonder Where I Found You Comment (NAM2) : Dodgy EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\todddealervoice\roadtoddquest_aafelixkhan_0004fa61_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who's the Khan?
ESP.TRADUIT: 谁是大汗帮的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: She's my runner. I buy direct from the Great Khans. I give her caps, and she brings me the good shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我直接从大汗帮那里买，而她是我的跑腿人。我给她瓶盖，她给我带来好东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felix [070021B6] (mod) Quest : ([0704F444]RoadToddQuest) Wonder Where I Found You EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\todddealervoice\roadtoddquest_aafelixkhan_0004fa62_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, for real, what's with the Khan?
ESP.TRADUIT: 说真的，大汗帮是怎么回事？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nah, man. I sell small time. They go for bulk. But we both get our shit from the Great Khans, so we just leave each other alone. Works for me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，兄弟，我是做小生意的，他们进货量大。但我们的货源都是大汗帮，所以我们就不合作了。我没问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felix [070021B6] (mod) Quest : ([0704F444]RoadToddQuest) Wonder Where I Found You EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\todddealervoice\roadtoddqu_aafelixfiends_0004fa64_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you with the Fiends?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你和恶魔帮混在一起？

ESP.ORIGINAL: What the fuck? NCR ain't got anything better to do than harass small-time dealers?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他妈的什么鬼？NCR除了骚扰小毒贩就没别的事可做了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felix [070021B6] (mod) Quest : ([0704F444]RoadToddQuest) Wonder Where I Found You EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\todddealervoice\roadtoddqu_aafelixquestdon_0004fa66_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: God damn, they don't even own Vegas, and they're trying to uh... control the people here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死的，维加斯都不是他们的地盘，他们还想...控制这里的人
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felix [070021B6] (mod) Quest : ([0704F444]RoadToddQuest) Wonder Where I Found You EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\todddealervoice\roadtoddqu_aafelixquestdon_0004fa66_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shit, bear is just as bad as the Legion, and I've been in Arizona! Son of a bitch... Where'd I put my downers?
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死，熊和军团一样坏，我去过亚利桑那州！狗娘养的...我的镇定剂放哪了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felix [070021B6] (mod) Quest : ([0704F444]RoadToddQuest) Wonder Where I Found You EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\todddealervoice\roadtoddqu_aafelixquestdon_0004fa66_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, there they are... Yeah, that'll feel nice in a minute...
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，他们在这...是啊，一会就好了...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felix [070021B6] (mod) Quest : ([0704F444]RoadToddQuest) Wonder Where I Found You EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\todddealervoice\roadtoddqu_aafelixquestdon_0004fa66_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh yeah, I almost forgot! Uh, you can tell Todd I'm back in business.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦对，我差点忘了！你可以告诉陶德我又开始工作了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felix [070021B6] (mod) Quest : ([0704F444]RoadToddQuest) Wonder Where I Found You EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\todddealervoice\roadtoddqu_aafelixquestdon_0004fa66_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can come on back any time, man. I sell cheap to my friends.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你随时都可以回来，伙计。我会给我的朋友折扣的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Felix [070021B6] (mod) Quest : ([0704F444]RoadToddQuest) Wonder Where I Found You EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\todddealervoice\roadtoddqu_aafelixquestdon_0004fa66_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I dealt with that guy. Turns out he was an NCR ranger monitoring the drug trade.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我和那家伙打过交道，以前他是NCR的游骑兵，负责监视毒品交易。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have you now? Well, you wouldn't be the first to try.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你现在有吗？好吧，你不是第一个尝试的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb Alquist [0701367F] (mod) Quest : ([0704FA68]RoadCalebDialogue) 0704FA68 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcalebvoice\roadcalebd_aacalebthreaten_0004fa6c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, I've been doing this longer than you. Words don't really get under my skin, none. Did your client tell you who I am?
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，我干这行比你久。我不会被这些话激怒的，一点也不会，你的客户告诉你我是谁了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb Alquist [0701367F] (mod) Quest : ([0704FA68]RoadCalebDialogue) 0704FA68 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcalebvoice\roadcalebd_aacalebthreaten_0004fa6c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know that I killed every man, woman, and child in Brighton? Threw their corpses in a ditch and burned the goddamn town to ash.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道我杀了布莱顿的每一个男人，女人和孩子吗？然后，把他们的尸体扔进沟里，把镇子烧成灰。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb Alquist [0701367F] (mod) Quest : ([0704FA68]RoadCalebDialogue) 0704FA68 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcalebvoice\roadcalebd_aacalebthreaten_0004fa6c_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some of 'em tried threatening me, just like you. But the only hesitation I had was when I had to reload.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有些人试图威胁我，就像你一样，但我只有在必须打完一个弹匣之后才会犹豫要不要放你一马。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb Alquist [0701367F] (mod) Quest : ([0704FA68]RoadCalebDialogue) 0704FA68 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcalebvoice\roadcalebd_aacalebthreaten_0004fa6c_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So the righteous threats of death and dismemberment...? Save it for someone who hasn't heard it before.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以死亡威胁...？把这话留给没听过的人吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb Alquist [0701367F] (mod) Quest : ([0704FA68]RoadCalebDialogue) 0704FA68 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcalebvoice\roadcalebd_aacalebthreaten_0004fa6c_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, I imagine you're either driven by a vague sense of justice, or if you're just doing something you're good at for a fair wage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，我想，你要么是被一种模糊的正义感所驱使，要么就是在做自己擅长的事情，以获得公平的报酬。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb Alquist [0701367F] (mod) Quest : ([0704FA68]RoadCalebDialogue) 0704FA68 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcalebvoice\roadcalebd_aacalebthreaten_0004fa6c_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Either way, I'm afraid you're shit out of luck. You draw on me here, you ain't getting either of those things.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎样，恐怕你都不走运了，你在这里向我开枪的话，那你会是竹篮打水一场空。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb Alquist [0701367F] (mod) Quest : ([0704FA68]RoadCalebDialogue) 0704FA68 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcalebvoice\roadcalebd_aacalebthreaten_0004fa6c_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Caleb Alquist, I've come for your head.
ESP.TRADUIT: 凯莱布·阿尔奎斯特，我是来取你的人头的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you say so.
ESP.TRADUIT: 既然你这么说了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb Alquist [0701367F] (mod) Quest : ([0704FA68]RoadCalebDialogue) 0704FA68 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcalebvoice\roadcalebd_aacalebstartcom_0004fa6e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Attack] Fuck the town. We're ending this the old-fashioned way.
ESP.TRADUIT: [攻击]去他妈的城镇，我们要用老办法结束这一切。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Simple. While my posse and I traveled up through the valley, we were constantly harassed by fuckwit raiders. Human garbage, through and through.
ESP.TRADUIT: 简单，我和我的手下在山谷里行走的时候，经常被该死的掠夺者骚扰。他们是彻头彻尾的人渣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb Alquist [0701367F] (mod) Quest : ([0704FA68]RoadCalebDialogue) 0704FA68 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcalebvoice\roadcalebd_aacalebcheating_0004fa70_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: These same raiders also routinely attack the town, they kill or run off merchants, they fuck with commerce. The whole town despises them, as do I.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些掠夺者也经常袭击城镇，他们杀死或赶走商人，破坏商业。全镇的人都鄙视他们，我也是。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb Alquist [0701367F] (mod) Quest : ([0704FA68]RoadCalebDialogue) 0704FA68 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcalebvoice\roadcalebd_aacalebcheating_0004fa70_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That being the case, I offered my posse's services to the town. As we speak, my people are off hunting down any raider they can get their hands on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 既然如此，我就提出让我的队伍为镇上服务。就在我们说话的时候，我的人也正在追捕他们能找到的任何掠夺者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb Alquist [0701367F] (mod) Quest : ([0704FA68]RoadCalebDialogue) 0704FA68 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcalebvoice\roadcalebd_aacalebcheating_0004fa70_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, I don't know how acquainted you got with the upstanding citizenry of Madsen, but I've talked with most of 'em, and we got something in common.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道你和马德森的正直市民有多熟，但我和他们大多数人都谈过，我们有共同之处。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb Alquist [0701367F] (mod) Quest : ([0704FA68]RoadCalebDialogue) 0704FA68 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcalebvoice\roadcalebd_aacalebcheating_0004fa70_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This town was built by people trying to get away from the NCR, and make a new life for themselves. Like me, only stationary.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个小镇是由那些想要逃离NCR，开始新生活的人建造的。像我一样，只是追求安定生活。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb Alquist [0701367F] (mod) Quest : ([0704FA68]RoadCalebDialogue) 0704FA68 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcalebvoice\roadcalebd_aacalebcheating_0004fa70_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, you draw on me here, and every last person in town is going to back me up. You want to get me, you'll have to murder all of them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，你在这里拿我开刀，镇上所有的人都会支持我。你想抓住我，就得把他们都杀了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb Alquist [0701367F] (mod) Quest : ([0704FA68]RoadCalebDialogue) 0704FA68 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcalebvoice\roadcalebd_aacalebcheating_0004fa70_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And you might be thinking you can live with that. You just want to get paid. Fair enough, but let's remember why Early put a price on my head.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可能觉得你可以接受，你只是想得到报酬。有道理，但别忘了厄尔利为什么悬赏要我的人头。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb Alquist [0701367F] (mod) Quest : ([0704FA68]RoadCalebDialogue) 0704FA68 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcalebvoice\roadcalebd_aacalebcheating_0004fa70_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Slaughter a whole town, he ain't paying you a damn thing. He'll just put another bounty out, on you this time around. That'd be a shame, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你杀了整个镇的人，他不会给你钱的，相反他会再发一笔赏金来抓你。那太遗憾了，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb Alquist [0701367F] (mod) Quest : ([0704FA68]RoadCalebDialogue) 0704FA68 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcalebvoice\roadcalebd_aacalebcheating_0004fa70_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you mean?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你什么意思？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not really, no. No more than any of the other "outlaws" hanging around here. You know that young woman in the gun store is wanted for murder?
ESP.TRADUIT: 实际上不是这样的，不比其他在这里游荡的"亡命之徒"多。你知道枪店的那个年轻女人因为谋杀被通缉吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb Alquist [0701367F] (mod) Quest : ([0704FA68]RoadCalebDialogue) 0704FA68 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcalebvoice\roadcalebd_aacalebcoward_0004fa72_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Man's got to have a code. Mine dictates that I do everything in my power to wipe the raider filth from this region, and that's what I aim to do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 人总得有个道德准则，我对自己的要求是尽我所能清除这片区域的掠夺者，这就是我的目标。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb Alquist [0701367F] (mod) Quest : ([0704FA68]RoadCalebDialogue) 0704FA68 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcalebvoice\roadcalebd_aacalebcoward_0004fa72_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd rather not fight you, but what I'm doing is more important than your job. No, if you want me dead, I have a proposition for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不想和你打架，但我现在的工作比你的工作重要。不过，如果你想让我死，我有个提议。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb Alquist [0701367F] (mod) Quest : ([0704FA68]RoadCalebDialogue) 0704FA68 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcalebvoice\roadcalebd_aacalebcoward_0004fa72_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you're just a coward, hiding behind the townsfolk, then?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你只是个躲在市民后面的懦夫？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Could be, sure. Or, you could do a job for me, since you're already in the area. You get paid for your time, and we make this place a little better.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可能是，当然。或者，你也可以帮我个忙，因为你已经在这儿了。你付出的时间都是有报酬的，而我们可以让这里变得更好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb Alquist [0701367F] (mod) Quest : ([0704FA68]RoadCalebDialogue) 0704FA68 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcalebvoice\roadcalebd_aacalebwastetim_0004fa75_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess you're right. Seems like this hunt was a waste of time, then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想你是对的，看来这次狩猎是在浪费时间。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fair enough. Gonna be a lot of bullets heading your direction in a moment, so good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很公平。很快就会有很多子弹朝你的方向飞来，所以祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb Alquist [0701367F] (mod) Quest : ([0704FA68]RoadCalebDialogue) 0704FA68 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcalebvoice\roadcalebd_aacalebcombat_0004fa77_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Attack] Enough talk. I'm taking you down.
ESP.TRADUIT: [攻击]说够了吧，我要干掉你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Simple. Maybe you've seen those slavers operating in the region? Regular slavers, mind you. Not Legion, though they're not any better.
ESP.TRADUIT: 简单，你见过那些奴隶贩子在这一带活动吗？注意，正规的奴隶贩子，不是军团，虽然他们也好不到哪里去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb Alquist [0701367F] (mod) Quest : ([0704FA68]RoadCalebDialogue) 0704FA68 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcalebvoice\roadcalebd_aacalebproposal_0004fa79_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I detest slavers. Whole reason I came north was to hunt them down, each and every one. So, my proposal is this:
ESP.TRADUIT: 我恨奴隶贩子，我来北方的全部原因就是要追捕他们，每一个。所以，我的建议是:
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb Alquist [0701367F] (mod) Quest : ([0704FA68]RoadCalebDialogue) 0704FA68 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcalebvoice\roadcalebd_aacalebproposal_0004fa79_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kill them. All of them, ideally, but my focus is on their boss, man named Tex Bradshaw. Him and his son run this crew, and they need to die.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杀死他们，最好是所有人，但我在意的是他们的老板，一个叫特克斯·布拉德肖的人，他和他儿子是这伙人的老大，他们必须得死。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb Alquist [0701367F] (mod) Quest : ([0704FA68]RoadCalebDialogue) 0704FA68 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcalebvoice\roadcalebd_aacalebproposal_0004fa79_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You do this, and I'll throw some money your way. Or if you come back, still adamant about killing me, I'll agree to settle things out of town.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你这么做，我就给你一笔钱。或者如果你回来仍然坚持要杀我，我同意在城外解决问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb Alquist [0701367F] (mod) Quest : ([0704FA68]RoadCalebDialogue) 0704FA68 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcalebvoice\roadcalebd_aacalebproposal_0004fa79_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Deal?
ESP.TRADUIT: 成交？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb Alquist [0701367F] (mod) Quest : ([0704FA68]RoadCalebDialogue) 0704FA68 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcalebvoice\roadcalebd_aacalebproposal_0004fa79_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you propose?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有什么建议？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Homesteading, my friend. This is how safe havens are established. I know my way around a gun, so the Fiends don't scare me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 种田，我的朋友。安全港就是这样建立起来的，我知道怎么用枪，所以恶魔帮吓不到我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steve Forsier [07001ED1] (mod) Quest : ([0704F444]RoadToddQuest) Wonder Where I Found You EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\toddrangervoice\roadtoddqu_aastevelocation_0005007b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This right here is how we make outer Vegas safe for all comers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是我们在外维加斯保证安全的方法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steve Forsier [07001ED1] (mod) Quest : ([0704F444]RoadToddQuest) Wonder Where I Found You EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\toddrangervoice\roadtoddqu_aastevelocation_0005007b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What the hell are you doing out here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你他妈到底在这干什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I... I just told you, pal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我...我告诉过你了，伙计。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steve Forsier [07001ED1] (mod) Quest : ([0704F444]RoadToddQuest) Wonder Where I Found You EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\toddrangervoice\roadtoddqu_aastevebullshit_0005007d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bullshit. What are you really doing out here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 胡说八道，你到底在这里做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Uh, yeah, I know that. I'm trying to make it safe.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]呃，对，我知道。我正在努力让它安全。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steve Forsier [07001ED1] (mod) Quest : ([0704F444]RoadToddQuest) Wonder Where I Found You EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\toddrangervoice\roadtoddqu_aasteveintellig_0005007f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But it isn't safe here!
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是这里不安全！

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Yeah, alright, fuck it. Fuck this. This is a goddamn waste of my time.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]对，好吧，操他妈的，这他妈的。这简直是在浪费我的时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steve Forsier [07001ED1] (mod) Quest : ([0704F444]RoadToddQuest) Wonder Where I Found You EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\toddrangervoice\roadtoddqu_aasteveintellig_00050080_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, look. I'm a ranger in the NCR. I've been assigned to monitor the drug trade operating out of this building. Waste of goddamn time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，听着，我是NCR的游骑兵。我被派来监视这栋楼里的毒品交易，真他妈浪费时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steve Forsier [07001ED1] (mod) Quest : ([0704F444]RoadToddQuest) Wonder Where I Found You EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\toddrangervoice\roadtoddqu_aasteveintellig_00050080_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's a difference between homesteading and painting a target on your back, and you know it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 种田和自己背上画靶子是有区别的，你知道什么意思。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, you're telling me. It's all politics, lemme tell you. You do your job right, protect the innocent, kill the wicked, and it's worth fuck all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对，还用你告诉我，这都是政治。你做得好你的工作，保护无辜，杀死恶人，这一切都是值得的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steve Forsier [07001ED1] (mod) Quest : ([0704F444]RoadToddQuest) Wonder Where I Found You EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\toddrangervoice\roadtoddqu_aastevebackgrou_00050082_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I killed a guy. Big time raider, slaver, rapist... Irredeemable piece of shit. But fuck it, the NCR wanted to put him on trial. Make it a show!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀了一个人，一流的掠夺者、奴隶贩子、强奸犯...不可救药的人渣。但管他呢，NCR想把他送上法庭，让他成为一场NCR正义秀！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steve Forsier [07001ED1] (mod) Quest : ([0704F444]RoadToddQuest) Wonder Where I Found You EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\toddrangervoice\roadtoddqu_aastevebackgrou_00050082_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Show the Mojave that "Look at us! We're your friends, bringing justice to the people who would hurt you!"
ESP.TRADUIT: 向莫哈维沙漠展示“看看我们！我们是你的朋友，为你向伤害你的人伸张正义！”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steve Forsier [07001ED1] (mod) Quest : ([0704F444]RoadToddQuest) Wonder Where I Found You EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\toddrangervoice\roadtoddqu_aastevebackgrou_00050082_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And I took that from them. I gave him real justice, in the form of a .45-70 slug in the back of the fucking head.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我夺走了这次机会，给了他施加真正的正义。用.45-70的子弹打在他的后脑勺上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steve Forsier [07001ED1] (mod) Quest : ([0704F444]RoadToddQuest) Wonder Where I Found You EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\toddrangervoice\roadtoddqu_aastevebackgrou_00050082_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The irony is, that's always been the way of it in the Mojave. Before we arrived and fucked things up, outlaws were executed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 讽刺的是，莫哈韦沙漠的NCR一直都是这样，喜欢作秀。在他们捉到犯人并把事情搞砸之前，犯人就被我处决了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steve Forsier [07001ED1] (mod) Quest : ([0704F444]RoadToddQuest) Wonder Where I Found You EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\toddrangervoice\roadtoddqu_aastevebackgrou_00050082_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's how the desert rangers did it. And we rolled right over them, didn't we? And now what are we doing? Staking out small-time chem dealers?
ESP.TRADUIT: 沙漠游骑兵就是这么干的，我们直接打碎他的脑袋。 现在我在做什么？盯梢小药品贩子？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steve Forsier [07001ED1] (mod) Quest : ([0704F444]RoadToddQuest) Wonder Where I Found You EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\toddrangervoice\roadtoddqu_aastevebackgrou_00050082_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who the fuck cares? But, no, fuck it! We want to prove the Khans are being naughty, so we can justify Bitter Springs 2.0!
ESP.TRADUIT: 谁他妈的在乎？但是，不，去他妈的！我们想证明大汗帮罪大恶极，这样我们才能合法化苦泉2.0！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steve Forsier [07001ED1] (mod) Quest : ([0704F444]RoadToddQuest) Wonder Where I Found You EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\toddrangervoice\roadtoddqu_aastevebackgrou_00050082_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This seems like an odd job for a ranger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这对游骑兵来说似乎是个奇怪的工作。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know what? I don't even care. Bring it on!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道吗？我根本不在乎，来吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steve Forsier [07001ED1] (mod) Quest : ([0704F444]RoadToddQuest) Wonder Where I Found You EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\toddrangervoice\roadtoddqu_aastevecombat_00050084_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Attack> Well, time to get rid of you.
ESP.TRADUIT: <攻击> 好吧，是时候摆脱你了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah... Yeah, you know what? Fuck this. I'm going back to McCarran. If they don't like it, they can court martial me. I'm done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对...是的，你知道吗？他妈的，我要回麦卡伦去。如果他们不想我回去，那他们可以把我送上军事法庭，我受够了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steve Forsier [07001ED1] (mod) Quest : ([0704F444]RoadToddQuest) Wonder Where I Found You EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\toddrangervoice\roadtoddqu_aastevegoaway_00050086_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You stay safe out there, cause god knows we aren't able to protect you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在外面要注意安全，因为上帝知道我们保护不了你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steve Forsier [07001ED1] (mod) Quest : ([0704F444]RoadToddQuest) Wonder Where I Found You EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\toddrangervoice\roadtoddqu_aastevegoaway_00050086_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is a waste of your time. Why bother?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是在浪费你的时间，何苦呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh hell yes! That's awesome, man. For real. I owe you big time for this shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，见鬼，是的！太棒了，伙计，真的，我欠你个大人情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Todd [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0704F444]RoadToddQuest) Wonder Where I Found You EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\toddvoice\roadtoddqu_aatoddquestdone_00050088_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, so... I got nothing to do around here, man. I'm thinking... what if I tag along with you? Gotta be more interesting than sticking around here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，所以...我在这没什么可干的，伙计。我在想...我跟你一起走怎么样？肯定比呆在这里有意思多了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Todd [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0704F444]RoadToddQuest) Wonder Where I Found You EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\toddvoice\roadtoddqu_aatoddquestdone_00050088_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm good in a fight, man. Don't you worry. So... what do you say?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很擅长打架，伙计，你不担心。所以...你觉得怎么样？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Todd [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0704F444]RoadToddQuest) Wonder Where I Found You EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\toddvoice\roadtoddqu_aatoddquestdone_00050088_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Felix is back in business.
ESP.TRADUIT: 菲利克斯又开始工作了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, OK...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Todd [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0704F444]RoadToddQuest) Wonder Where I Found You EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\toddvoice\roadtoddquest_aatoddbye_0005008a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe another time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许下次吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: OK, shoot.
ESP.TRADUIT: OK，开始。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Todd [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0700765B]ToddDialogue) 0700765B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\toddvoice\todddialog_aatoddquestions_00053463_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to ask you some questions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想问你几个问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Easy. I knew all about Westside, cause I was in the motherfucking Fiends. When I quit that shit, I figured I'd just swap sides.
ESP.TRADUIT: 简单，我了解西区的一切，因为当时我他妈的在恶魔帮。当我戒掉那玩意儿的时候，我想我得换个边站。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Todd [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0700765B]ToddDialogue) 0700765B (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\toddvoice\todddialog_aatoddbackgroun_00053465_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Course, they kicked me out. Pfft. Pussies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，他们把我踢了出去，啐，傻逼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Todd [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0700765B]ToddDialogue) 0700765B (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\toddvoice\todddialog_aatoddbackgroun_00053465_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, how'd you end up in the militia?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么会加入民兵的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good, I was getting twitchy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，我都快抽筋了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Todd [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0700765B]ToddDialogue) 0700765B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\toddvoice\todddialog_aatoddquestions_00053467_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That was all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就这些。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Easy. Jack all the spare chems you can, and then slip outside before the boss notices.
ESP.TRADUIT: 简单，把所有的备用药品都拿出来，然后在老大发现之前溜出去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Todd [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0700765B]ToddDialogue) 0700765B (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\toddvoice\todddialogue_aatoddfiends_00053469_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you can convince a lady to come with, that's a bonus.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你能说服一位女士和你一起去，那本身就是一笔奖金。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Todd [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0700765B]ToddDialogue) 0700765B (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\toddvoice\todddialogue_aatoddfiends_00053469_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait, how the hell do you get kicked out of the Fiends?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，你是怎么被赶出恶魔帮的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, right, so I didn't have anywhere else to go. Neither did Cindy- that bitch I brought along- so, fuck it. I know where Westside is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对，没错，所以我没别的地方可去了。我带来的那个婊子辛迪也是，所以，去他妈的，我知道西区在哪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Todd [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0700765B]ToddDialogue) 0700765B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\toddvoice\todddialogue_aatoddmilitia_0005346b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: See, I waited 'til right after the Khans made a delivery to Motor-Runner, so his stash would be totally full. So, we were loaded.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看，我一直等到大汗帮给轰鸣恶煞送货之后，等他的货都装满。所以，我们是满载而归。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Todd [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0700765B]ToddDialogue) 0700765B (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\toddvoice\todddialogue_aatoddmilitia_0005346b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Actually, Cindy caught me and was gonna rat me out. So, I said "Bitch, you come with me, you'll get tweaked for life!"
ESP.TRADUIT: 其实是辛迪发现了我，想要告发我。所以，我说：“婊子，跟我来，你的人生会完全改变的！”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Todd [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0700765B]ToddDialogue) 0700765B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\toddvoice\todddialogue_aatoddmilitia_0005346b_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So we holed up in Westside and had about... three days of fucking and perma-highs. Problem was, by day three, all that was left was Med-X.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以我们躲在西区，大概...有三天的时间在做爱和嗑药。问题是，到了第三天，就只剩下吗啡针-X了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Todd [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0700765B]ToddDialogue) 0700765B (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\toddvoice\todddialogue_aatoddmilitia_0005346b_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hate fucking downers, so I was basically out of chems. I needed money, and I knew how to kill shit, so I joined the militia.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我讨厌该死的镇定剂，所以我基本上没药了，我需要钱，又会杀人，所以我加入了民兵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Todd [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0700765B]ToddDialogue) 0700765B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\toddvoice\todddialogue_aatoddmilitia_0005346b_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: While I was doing that, Cindy ODed in the tub on all the Med-X, and I got fired the next day for smashing some assholes head into paste.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就在我这么做的时候，辛迪在浴缸里吸毒过量而死，第二天我就因为把几个混蛋的头打成浆糊而被解雇了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Todd [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0700765B]ToddDialogue) 0700765B (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\toddvoice\todddialogue_aatoddmilitia_0005346b_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Apparently everyone needs to use guns. Well, maybe some of us are shitty shots, huh? Why does it matter if I use a gun or a hunk of wood?
ESP.TRADUIT: 显然每个人都需要用枪，也许我们中有些人枪法不好？我用枪还是木头有什么关系？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Todd [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0700765B]ToddDialogue) 0700765B (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\toddvoice\todddialogue_aatoddmilitia_0005346b_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A dead asshole is a dead asshole.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个死了的混蛋就是死了的混蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Todd [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0700765B]ToddDialogue) 0700765B (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\toddvoice\todddialogue_aatoddmilitia_0005346b_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And somehow you went from Fiend to a militiaman?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你从恶魔帮变成了民兵？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Man, fuck the fucking bear! They wanna come in to my fucking desert and tell me how to live my life?
ESP.TRADUIT: 伙计，去他妈的该死的NCR！他们想到我的沙漠里来告诉我该怎么生活？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Todd [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0700765B]ToddDialogue) 0700765B (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\toddvoice\todddialogue_aatoddncr_0005346d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This ain't California, it's fucking Vegas! They can take their asses back to where they came from. Hail Kimball, bitch!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不是加州，这是他妈的拉斯维加斯！他们可以滚回他们来的地方，赞美金博尔，婊子！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Todd [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0700765B]ToddDialogue) 0700765B (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\toddvoice\todddialogue_aatoddncr_0005346d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How do you feel about the NCR?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对NCR的感觉如何？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you fucking crazy? The Legion?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你他妈的疯了吗？军团？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Todd [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0700765B]ToddDialogue) 0700765B (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\toddvoice\todddialogue_aatoddlegion_0005346f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Legion are a bunch of boys in skirts who run around chucking spears at babies and shit! Shit, they might actually be cuntier than the NCR!
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团就是一群穿着裙子跑来跑去的男孩，拿长矛刺婴儿什么的狗屎！该死，他们可能比NCR还古怪！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Todd [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0700765B]ToddDialogue) 0700765B (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\toddvoice\todddialogue_aatoddlegion_0005346f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yo, I hear they nail motherfuckers to telephone poles for hitting the jet. Fuck that, I don't need that shit in my life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说他们会把吸杰特的混蛋钉在电线杆上。操他妈的，我的生活不需要这种东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Todd [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0700765B]ToddDialogue) 0700765B (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\toddvoice\todddialogue_aatoddlegion_0005346f_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's your opinion on Caesar's Legion?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对凯撒军团有什么看法？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Forget that shit, man. House is a made up ghost story, like the Burned Man or the Enclave. NCR made all of them up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 算了吧，伙计，豪斯是虚构的鬼故事，就像火烧人或英克雷一样，这些都是NCR编的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Todd [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0700765B]ToddDialogue) 0700765B (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\toddvoice\todddialogue_aatoddhouse_00053471_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you think of Mr. House?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得豪斯先生怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: What kinda question is that? This is Vegas, motherfucker. We're always gonna be independent, and fuck anyone who says otherwise.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这算什么问题？这里是维加斯，混蛋。我们永远都是独立的，谁不这么说就操他妈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Todd [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0700765B]ToddDialogue) 0700765B (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\toddvoice\todddialog_aatoddfreevegas_00053473_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Besides, you fuckin' watch. If NCR or the Legion do take this place, we'll kick them back out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再说了，你他妈的看着吧。如果NCR或军团占领了这里，我们会把他们赶出去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Todd [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0700765B]ToddDialogue) 0700765B (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\toddvoice\todddialog_aatoddfreevegas_00053473_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shit, you'd have the Fiends, Westside, Freeside, Jackals, Vipers... fuckin'... Jag-Jaguars? Are they a gang? Whatever. They'd all team up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗屎，你会看到恶魔帮，西区，自由城，豺狼帮，毒蛇帮......还有他妈的...美...美洲虎？他们算帮派吗？无论如何，他们会齐心协力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Todd [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0700765B]ToddDialogue) 0700765B (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\toddvoice\todddialog_aatoddfreevegas_00053473_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Viva New Vegas, bitch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 新维加斯万岁，贱人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Todd [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0700765B]ToddDialogue) 0700765B (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\toddvoice\todddialog_aatoddfreevegas_00053473_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How does an independent Vegas sound to you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得一个独立的维加斯怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh man, this is so awesome. I'm gonna keep all these on the shelves and never sell them to anyone!
ESP.TRADUIT: 天啊，兄弟，这太棒了！我要把这些都放在架子上，永远不卖给任何人!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May Ito [07012A8D] (mod) Quest : ([070488F8]RoadMayDialogue) I Plead the Second EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadmayvoice\roadmaydia_aamayquestdone_000540a5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And I know I already paid you for all of them already, but I didn't figure you'd actually get every single one!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道我已经付了你所有的钱，但我没想到你真的能彻底满足我的要求
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May Ito [07012A8D] (mod) Quest : ([070488F8]RoadMayDialogue) I Plead the Second EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadmayvoice\roadmaydia_aamayquestdone_000540a5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But you did, so I'm gonna pay you another 3000, 'cause I like you. Now, I got no more work for you, but let me know if you ever wanna shoot the shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但你做到了，所以我要再付你3000瓶盖，因为我喜欢你。现在，我没有工作给你了，但如果你想射，记得告诉我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May Ito [07012A8D] (mod) Quest : ([070488F8]RoadMayDialogue) I Plead the Second

ESP.ORIGINAL: I mean, literally. The shooting part, not the... I-I got, like, actual targets and shit out back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的意思是，字面意思，就是射击，不是什么...我...我有，就像...实实在在的目标给你杀，好了你可以走了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May Ito [07012A8D] (mod) Quest : ([070488F8]RoadMayDialogue) I Plead the Second EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadmayvoice\roadmaydia_aamayquestdone_000540a5_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, looks like I got everything on your list.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来你单子上的东西我都拿到了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What gave it away, the giant "Great Khans" logo hanging off my back?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是怎么看出来的，挂在我背上的"大汗帮"标志吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colette [070488D6] (mod) Quest : ([07056115]RoadColetteQuest) Blood for Blood EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolettevoice\roadcolett_aacolettegreatk_0005672c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you a Great Khan?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是大汗帮的人吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nope.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colette [070488D6] (mod) Quest : ([07056115]RoadColetteQuest) Blood for Blood EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolettevoice\roadcolett_aacoletteburke_0005672e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm looking for a fugitive from the NCR. Rich kid named Burke. Seen him?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在找NCR的逃犯，一个富二代，名字叫伯克，看到他了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dunno. It’s okay, I guess. Kinda cold for my tastes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不晓得，我想还可以，对我来说有点冷。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colette [070488D6] (mod) Quest : ([07056115]RoadColetteQuest) Blood for Blood EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolettevoice\roadcolett_aacolettemadsen_00056730_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Still... There’s not anyone but raiders and Legion around here. So that’s alright. Much better than NCR, Deathclaws, or Cazadors.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里...一直只有掠夺者和军团，这挺好的，比NCR、死亡爪、大毒蜂好多了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colette [070488D6] (mod) Quest : ([07056115]RoadColetteQuest) Blood for Blood EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolettevoice\roadcolett_aacolettemadsen_00056730_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...That's about it. I'm new here.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...就这些，我是新来的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colette [070488D6] (mod) Quest : ([07056115]RoadColetteQuest) Blood for Blood EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolettevoice\roadcolett_aacolettemadsen_00056730_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can you tell me about Madsen?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能跟我说说马德森吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Revenge.
ESP.TRADUIT: 报仇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colette [070488D6] (mod) Quest : ([07056115]RoadColetteQuest) Blood for Blood EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolettevoice\roadcolett_aacolettereveng_00056732_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...Shit, that sounded melodramatic.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...妈的，听起来太夸张了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colette [070488D6] (mod) Quest : ([07056115]RoadColetteQuest) Blood for Blood EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolettevoice\roadcolett_aacolettereveng_00056732_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, what brought you this far north?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么风把你吹到这么北的地方？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Right, the kind that is "illegal" and that certain dictatorships might use as pretext to hurt my family even more than they already did.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没错，那种“非法”的手段，某些独裁政权可能会以此为借口，进一步伤害我的家人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colette [070488D6] (mod) Quest : ([07056115]RoadColetteQuest) Blood for Blood EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolettevoice\roadcolett_aacolettebackgr_00056734_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was a kid when Bitter Springs went down, but I still remember. How could I forget my parents, my sister, and two of my brothers being murdered?
ESP.TRADUIT: 苦泉镇出事的时候我还是个孩子，但我还记得。我怎么能忘记，我的父母，我的妹妹，还有我的两个兄弟，他们都被杀害了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colette [070488D6] (mod) Quest : ([07056115]RoadColetteQuest) Blood for Blood EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolettevoice\roadcolett_aacolettebackgr_00056734_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Got a few fun little surprises planned for the republic, but I intend for it to stay untraceable. If they knew a Khan was responsible...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我为NCR准备了一些有趣的小惊喜，但我不打算泄露这个秘密。但如果他们知道是大汗帮干的话.....
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colette [070488D6] (mod) Quest : ([07056115]RoadColetteQuest) Blood for Blood EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolettevoice\roadcolett_aacolettebackgr_00056734_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sure those imperialist assholes would love an excuse to wipe out the rest of my people. Well, they won't get one from me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我相信那些帝国主义混蛋会想找个借口消灭我的人民，好吧，我不会让他们得逞的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colette [070488D6] (mod) Quest : ([07056115]RoadColetteQuest) Blood for Blood EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolettevoice\roadcolett_aacolettebackgr_00056734_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Revenge?
ESP.TRADUIT: 报仇？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe you can. See, I did some investigating of my own. I got the name of the sniper that murdered at least three of my family members.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许你可以，我自己也做了一些调查，我知道了杀害我至少三个家人的狙击手的名字。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colette [070488D6] (mod) Quest : ([07056115]RoadColetteQuest) Blood for Blood EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolettevoice\roadcolett_aacolettestartq_00056d3c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Big brave sniper named Jared Ross. Oh, he's not your target, though. No, Jared is mine. But, since he trimmed my family tree, I'll pay him back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 勇敢的大个子狙击手，贾里德·罗斯。不过他不是你的目标，不，贾里德是我的，既然他修剪了我的家谱，我会去修剪他的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colette [070488D6] (mod) Quest : ([07056115]RoadColetteQuest) Blood for Blood EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolettevoice\roadcolett_aacolettestartq_00056d3c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He has a brother. Must make the family proud, all their boys joining the military.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他有一个兄弟，他们的家人一定感到骄傲，自己的儿子都参军了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colette [070488D6] (mod) Quest : ([07056115]RoadColetteQuest) Blood for Blood EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolettevoice\roadcolett_aacolettestartq_00056d3c_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't give a shit who kills the brother, or how he dies. I'm more than willing to pay you to do it for me. You in?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不在乎谁杀了这个兄弟，或者他怎么死的，但我非常愿意付钱让你帮我干这活，你干吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colette [070488D6] (mod) Quest : ([07056115]RoadColetteQuest) Blood for Blood EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolettevoice\roadcolett_aacolettestartq_00056d3c_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can I help you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 需要帮忙吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good answer. Alright.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好答案，很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colette [070488D6] (mod) Quest : ([07056115]RoadColetteQuest) Blood for Blood EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolettevoice\roadcolett_aacoletteaccept_00056d3e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, this Ross asshole is supposed to be stationed for guard duty at that NCR farm in the Mojave, near Vegas.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，这个叫罗斯的混蛋应该被派驻到维加斯附近莫哈韦的那个NCR农场担任警卫工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colette [070488D6] (mod) Quest : ([07056115]RoadColetteQuest) Blood for Blood EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolettevoice\roadcolett_aacoletteaccept_00056d3e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know- the farm that only gives food to NCR people. The one where guys like Ross will shoot any starving locals who come too close.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道的，农场只给NCR的人提供食物。像罗斯这样的人会射杀任何靠近，想讨口饭吃的当地人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colette [070488D6] (mod) Quest : ([07056115]RoadColetteQuest) Blood for Blood EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolettevoice\roadcolett_aacoletteaccept_00056d3e_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, my advice would be stealth. Slit his throat from behind when no one is looking, and you might avoid getting shot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，我的建议是隐蔽，趁没人注意，从背后割开他的喉咙，这样你就能避免中枪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colette [070488D6] (mod) Quest : ([07056115]RoadColetteQuest) Blood for Blood

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have fun.
ESP.TRADUIT: 玩得开心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colette [070488D6] (mod) Quest : ([07056115]RoadColetteQuest) Blood for Blood EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolettevoice\roadcolett_aacoletteaccept_00056d3e_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, I'll do it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我来做吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Huh? Oh, no, my brother was there, though. You might have gotten your paperwork mixed up. I only enlisted last year.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯？哦不，我兄弟当时在那里。你可能把文件弄混了，我去年才入伍。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Ross [07056D40] (mod) Quest : ([07056115]RoadColetteQuest) Blood for Blood EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\aarossvoice\roadcolett_aarossbitterspr_00056d45_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You ever been to Bitter Springs?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你去过苦泉镇吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh, no. You're thinking of my brother, Jared. Look, I didn't know what he was going to do, and, uh... I'd rather not talk about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，不， 你说的是我的兄弟贾里德。 听着，我不知道他要做什么，而且，呃...我也不想谈论他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Ross [07056D40] (mod) Quest : ([07056115]RoadColetteQuest) Blood for Blood EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\aarossvoice\roadcolett_aarossbitterspr_000b9bcf_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He was still my brother, you know? I wish he could have got the help he needed. Hope he's at peace now, anyway.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他始终是我兄弟，你懂吗？我希望他能得到他应有的帮助，无论如何，愿他安息。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Ross [07056D40] (mod) Quest : ([07056115]RoadColetteQuest) Blood for Blood EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\aarossvoice\roadcolett_aarossbitterspr_000b9bcf_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You ever been to Bitter Springs?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你去过苦泉镇吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait, what? Are you sure? I-I don't know what you're talking about...
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，什么？你确定？我不知道你在说什么...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Ross [07056D40] (mod) Quest : ([07056115]RoadColetteQuest) Blood for Blood EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\aarossvoice\roadcolett_aarosswarning_00056d47_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh, if you think it's a good idea, I'll ask my CO for a transfer... Uhm, thank you, I guess.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，如果你认为这是个好主意的话，我会让我的指挥官调任我...嗯，谢谢你，我想。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Ross [07056D40] (mod) Quest : ([07056115]RoadColetteQuest) Blood for Blood EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\aarossvoice\roadcolett_aarosswarning_00056d47_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You need to get out of here right now. Some people are looking to kill you, personally.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你得马上离开这里，有人想亲手杀了你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What the hell? Uh, uh, hostile sighted!
ESP.TRADUIT: 搞什么鬼？呃，呃，看到敌人了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Ross [07056D40] (mod) Quest : ([07056115]RoadColetteQuest) Blood for Blood Comment (NAM2) : nervous aprehension EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\aarossvoice\roadcolett_aarosscombat_00056d49_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Attack> I'm here to kill you, Ross.
ESP.TRADUIT: <攻击>我是来杀你的，罗斯。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good. Well, there's one more thing you can do for me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好，你还可以为我做一件事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colette [070488D6] (mod) Quest : ([07056115]RoadColetteQuest) Blood for Blood EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolettevoice\roadcolett_aacoletterossdo_0005794d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hear you’re a courier. Well, why don’t you courie a package for me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说你是个邮差，那你为什么不给我寄个包裹呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colette [070488D6] (mod) Quest : ([07056115]RoadColetteQuest) Blood for Blood EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolettevoice\roadcolett_aacoletterossdo_0005794d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I’m thinking, drop it off at the Mojave post, and post mark it as outgoing for Shady Sands. Easy, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在想，把它放到莫哈维邮局，然后把它标记为沙荫镇的外发。 很简单，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colette [070488D6] (mod) Quest : ([07056115]RoadColetteQuest) Blood for Blood EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolettevoice\roadcolett_aacoletterossdo_0005794d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, and try not to jostle it too much, or it’ll explode and there won’t be enough of you for the crows to eat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，还有，尽量别挤得太紧，否则它会爆炸的，到时候就乌鸦吃你都不够一顿了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colette [070488D6] (mod) Quest : ([07056115]RoadColetteQuest) Blood for Blood EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolettevoice\roadcolett_aacoletterossdo_0005794d_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I dealt with Ross.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我搞定了罗斯。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure thing, I'll throw it back with the others.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然可以，我会把它和其他的一起扔回去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Courier [07056D36] (mod) Quest : ([07056115]RoadColetteQuest) Blood for Blood EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\maleadult01defaultb\roadcolett_aacourierbomb_0005faad_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need you to get this package to Shady Sands.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要你把这个包裹送到沙荫镇。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colette [070488D6] (mod) Quest : ([07056115]RoadColetteQuest) Blood for Blood EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolettevoice\roadcolett_aacolettedeclin_00064334_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll pass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我就算了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then change your fucking title. You’re a courier who will kill people for money, but balks at actual mail delivery?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就把你的头衔改了，你是个为了钱杀人的邮差，却在自己的本职工作上犹豫不决？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colette [070488D6] (mod) Quest : ([07056115]RoadColetteQuest) Blood for Blood EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolettevoice\roadcolett_aacolettedeclin_00064336_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever, I don't need you, then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎样，我不再需要你了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colette [070488D6] (mod) Quest : ([07056115]RoadColetteQuest) Blood for Blood EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolettevoice\roadcolett_aacolettedeclin_00064336_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not going to deliver a mail-bomb for you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会帮你送炸弹的！

ESP.ORIGINAL: It does sound easy, doesn’t it? Let me know when you’re done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听起来很简单，不是吗？做完了告诉我一声。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colette [070488D6] (mod) Quest : ([07056115]RoadColetteQuest) Blood for Blood EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolettevoice\roadcolett_aacoletteaccept_00064338_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sounds easy enough. You got it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听起来很容易，我马上照办。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Look, jerkoff. First off, save your worthless platitudes for dumb little kids. I don't need them.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]听着蠢货。首先，把你那些没用的陈词滥调留给那些笨小孩吧，我不会听你废话的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colette [070488D6] (mod) Quest : ([07056115]RoadColetteQuest) Blood for Blood EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolettevoice\roadcolett_aacolettespeech_0006433a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Second, my family is dead, so it doesn’t really matter what they would want.
ESP.TRADUIT: 其次，我的家人都死了，所以他们对现在的我而言并不重要。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colette [070488D6] (mod) Quest : ([07056115]RoadColetteQuest) Blood for Blood EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolettevoice\roadcolett_aacolettespeech_0006433a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Third, we’re Khans. So, yes, they really fucking would want me to enact bloody vengeance on their murderers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 第三，我们是大汗帮，所以，是的，他们真的希望我对伤害他们的凶手进行血腥的复仇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colette [070488D6] (mod) Quest : ([07056115]RoadColetteQuest) Blood for Blood EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolettevoice\roadcolett_aacolettespeech_0006433a_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, are you going to do your job and help me blow the NCR up, or am I going to need to do it myself?
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，你是要做好你的工作：帮我炸掉NCR，还是要我自己来做?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colette [070488D6] (mod) Quest : ([07056115]RoadColetteQuest) Blood for Blood EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolettevoice\roadcolett_aacolettespeech_0006433a_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Would your family want you to do this?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的家人希望你这么做吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] The point... Is that I want to strike at the NCR. All of it. They need to pay for what they did! They can't just... get away with it!
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 重点是...我想攻击 NCR。 他们需要为自己所有的所作所为付出代价！ 他们不能就...逍遥法外！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colette [070488D6] (mod) Quest : ([07056115]RoadColetteQuest) Blood for Blood EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolettevoice\roadcolett_aacolettespeech_0006433b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're murderers and war criminals, so I'm going to give them what they deserve.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们是杀人犯和战犯，所以我要给他们应得的惩罚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colette [070488D6] (mod) Quest : ([07056115]RoadColetteQuest) Blood for Blood EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolettevoice\roadcolett_aacolettespeech_0006433b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...But, sure. Shitty underpaid mailroom employees didn't do shit to me. It's the untouchable ones that are responsible.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...但，没错。收发室那些低薪的烂员工也没对我做什么，毕竟那些贱民们也是打工人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colette [070488D6] (mod) Quest : ([07056115]RoadColetteQuest) Blood for Blood EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolettevoice\roadcolett_aacolettespeech_0006433b_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What a garbage-goddamn system. Don't understand why anyone would accept it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真是个该死的垃圾系统，真不明白为什么会有人接受。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colette [070488D6] (mod) Quest : ([07056115]RoadColetteQuest) Blood for Blood EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolettevoice\roadcolett_aacolettespeech_0006433b_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...I need to rethink this shit. Uh, look, here’s the money I would have paid you.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...我得重新考虑一下。听着，这是我付给你的钱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colette [070488D6] (mod) Quest : ([07056115]RoadColetteQuest) Blood for Blood EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolettevoice\roadcolett_aacolettespeech_0006433b_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I’m going to dump this bomb in the lake, and... yeah, drinking sounds good right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会把炸弹扔进湖里，然后...是啊，喝酒听起来不错，不是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colette [070488D6] (mod) Quest : ([07056115]RoadColetteQuest) Blood for Blood EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolettevoice\roadcolett_aacolettespeech_0006433b_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You realize this bomb is only going to kill mailroom employees, yes? What's the point?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道这个炸弹只会炸死收发室的员工吧？这有什么意义？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, look at you, all not blown up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，看看你，都没被炸飞。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colette [070488D6] (mod) Quest : ([07056115]RoadColetteQuest) Blood for Blood EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolettevoice\roadcolett_aacolettebombdo_0006433d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unlike some NCR dogs in... however long it takes the mail to get there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不像一些NCR的狗...不然无论邮件到达那里需要多长时间，炸死这群傻逼都值得。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colette [070488D6] (mod) Quest : ([07056115]RoadColetteQuest) Blood for Blood EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolettevoice\roadcolett_aacolettebombdo_0006433d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, good work all around. I guess that makes me an employer, now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，干得不错。我想这使我现在成为了一名雇主。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colette [070488D6] (mod) Quest : ([07056115]RoadColetteQuest) Blood for Blood EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolettevoice\roadcolett_aacolettebombdo_0006433d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, here’s your money, employee.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，这是你的钱，雇员。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colette [070488D6] (mod) Quest : ([07056115]RoadColetteQuest) Blood for Blood EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolettevoice\roadcolett_aacolettebombdo_0006433d_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You ever want to plan up more violent acts of revenge, you look me up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想策划更暴力的报复行动，就来找我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colette [070488D6] (mod) Quest : ([07056115]RoadColetteQuest) Blood for Blood EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolettevoice\roadcolett_aacolettebombdo_0006433d_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But not right now. I’m getting a victory beverage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但不是现在，现在是贤者时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colette [070488D6] (mod) Quest : ([07056115]RoadColetteQuest) Blood for Blood EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolettevoice\roadcolett_aacolettebombdo_0006433d_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: One bomb, delivered and in transit as we speak.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一枚炸弹，我们说话这会儿正在运送中。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Heh, fair enough. I did lay it on a bit strong, didn't I?
ESP.TRADUIT: 呵呵，说得过去。我确实有点过分了，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jon Vicky [0701060B] (mod) Quest : ([070617DE]RoadBoozeQuest) Liquid Gold EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadjonvoice\roadboozeq_aajondeclineque_000656a4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh, no, I'll pass, I think.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，不，我想我还是算了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Excellent. Now then... Every once in a while we get a passerby who'll stumble in here, gushing about his chance encounter with the gods of booze.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太好了，那现在...每隔一段时间，就会有一个路人绊倒在这里，然后滔滔不绝地谈论他与酒神的偶遇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jon Vicky [0701060B] (mod) Quest : ([070617DE]RoadBoozeQuest) Liquid Gold EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadjonvoice\roadboozeq_aajonacceptques_000656a6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Originally, I was apt to chalk this up to, if you can believe it, sheer drunkenness. But I've heard the story more than once, from unrelated parties.
ESP.TRADUIT: 起初，我倾向于把这归结为纯粹的醉酒，如果你相信的话。但这个故事我已经听过不止一次了，还是从几个不相关的人那里听说的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jon Vicky [0701060B] (mod) Quest : ([070617DE]RoadBoozeQuest) Liquid Gold EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadjonvoice\roadboozeq_aajonacceptques_000656a6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In each case, they tell stories of sleeping in the valley, and waking up to find a bottle of liquor, full and untouched, gifted to them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 每一次，他们都会讲述自己睡在山谷中的故事，醒来时发现有人送给他们一瓶满满的没有碰过的酒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jon Vicky [0701060B] (mod) Quest : ([070617DE]RoadBoozeQuest) Liquid Gold EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadjonvoice\roadboozeq_aajonacceptques_000656a6_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And every time, without fail, they report to me that it's the finest drink they've ever experienced.
ESP.TRADUIT: 每次，他们无一例外都会对我说这是他们喝过的最好的酒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jon Vicky [0701060B] (mod) Quest : ([070617DE]RoadBoozeQuest) Liquid Gold EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadjonvoice\roadboozeq_aajonacceptques_000656a6_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Seeing as how I run a bar, I'm always looking for new products. If you happen to discover the source of this mysterious liquor, well... I want it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 鉴于我经营酒吧的方式，我总是在寻找新产品。如果你碰巧发现了这种神秘酒的产地，那么...我想要。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jon Vicky [0701060B] (mod) Quest : ([070617DE]RoadBoozeQuest) Liquid Gold EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadjonvoice\roadboozeq_aajonacceptques_000656a6_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Find out where it's coming from, and see that it ends up falling under my control. I'd search around the old highway patrol lounge, as a start.
ESP.TRADUIT: 找出它的来源，并确保它最终落入我的控制之下。我会先让你在老高速公路巡警休息室里找一找。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jon Vicky [0701060B] (mod) Quest : ([070617DE]RoadBoozeQuest) Liquid Gold EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadjonvoice\roadboozeq_aajonacceptques_000656a6_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Evidently that area is a nexus for unexplainable booze sightings. Good luck, friend.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很明显，那个区域与那些无法解释的酗酒事件有关。祝你好运，朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jon Vicky [0701060B] (mod) Quest : ([070617DE]RoadBoozeQuest) Liquid Gold EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadjonvoice\roadboozeq_aajonacceptques_000656a6_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, why not?
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，为什么不？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Huh? Oh, I keep everyone’s guns working. ‘Cept for Del Toro and his stupid laser rifle.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯？我让每个人的枪都能打死人，包括德尔·托罗和他那把愚蠢的镭射步枪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brandon Welles [07000DF8] (mod) Quest : ([07014F32]RoadMainQuest) Far From Any Road EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\maleadult01default\roadmainquest_aabrandonjob_00068c57_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, uh, and I also man the walls and shit. Like, uh, that’s my main job. I’m a great shot. The mechanic shit is, like, my side-gig.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢...呃，我还负责守卫城墙之类的，这是我的主要工作，也是一个很好的机会。机械修理是我的副业。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brandon Welles [07000DF8] (mod) Quest : ([07014F32]RoadMainQuest) Far From Any Road EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\maleadult01default\roadmainquest_aabrandonjob_00068c57_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you do around here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在这里做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh. Y’know. On a break. Besides, we haven’t seen any travelers recently. So, yeah, my services aren’t needed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，如你所见，现在在休息。而且我们最近也没看到任何旅行者。所以，是的，并不需要我放哨。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brandon Welles [07000DF8] (mod) Quest : ([07014F32]RoadMainQuest) Far From Any Road EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\maleadult01default\roadmainqu_aabrandonwall_00068c59_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So why aren't you on the wall right now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那你现在怎么没在城墙上？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh, yeah, well... I was doing some repair stuff, so... I guess I didn't hear them. Yeah.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，对，嗯...我在修理东西，所以...我想我没在那。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brandon Welles [07000DF8] (mod) Quest : ([07014F32]RoadMainQuest) Far From Any Road EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\maleadult01default\roadmainqu_aabrandonraider_00068c5b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You kidding? Raiders were attacking literally the second I got here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在开玩笑吗？我一到这里，掠夺者就开始攻击了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh shit, was he that guy who rolled through here with those mercenary guys? Yeah, I saw them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢该死，他就是那个和那些雇佣兵一起过来的家伙吗？是的，我看见他们了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brandon Welles [07000DF8] (mod) Quest : ([07014F32]RoadMainQuest) Far From Any Road EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\maleadult01default\roadmainqu_aabrandonburke_00068c5d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, you know I almost joined up with those guys? But they're all military, so I was like, whatever. I don't need anyone giving me orders, you know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，你知道我差点就加入他们了吗？但他们都是军人，所以我说，管他呢，我不愿受人使唤，懂吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brandon Welles [07000DF8] (mod) Quest : ([07014F32]RoadMainQuest) Far From Any Road EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\maleadult01default\roadmainqu_aabrandonburke_00068c5d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What was I saying? Oh, yeah. I think those guys were headed up to the old mansion in the mountains, up north a ways.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我刚才说什么来着？哦，对，我想那些人是要去山上的老房子，往北走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brandon Welles [07000DF8] (mod) Quest : ([07014F32]RoadMainQuest) Far From Any Road EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\maleadult01default\roadmainqu_aabrandonburke_00068c5d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I’m looking for a guy named Adam Burke. Fugitive from the NCR. Know him?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在找一个叫亚当·伯克的人，NCR的逃犯，你认识他吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, okay, sure. Uh, you can pay me, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，好的，没问题。你可以付钱给我，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brandon Welles [07000DF8] (mod) Quest : ([07014F32]RoadMainQuest) Far From Any Road EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\maleadult01default\roadmainqu_aabrandonrepair_00068c5f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, fix my gear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，把我的装备修好。

ESP.ORIGINAL: W-wait, please! How much is the NCR paying for me? I can double it! Triple it! Whatever you want, name it and it's yours. Just let me go!
ESP.TRADUIT: 等...等等，拜托！NCR给我的悬赏是多少钱？我可以加倍！三倍！不管你想要什么，你给它起个名字就是你的了，让我走吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Adam Burke [070019F9] (mod) Quest : ([07014F32]RoadMainQuest) Far From Any Road EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolinvoice\roadmainqu_aaburkethreaten_00068c65_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I killed all your guards, Burke. Ready to join them?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀了你所有的守卫，伯克，你准备好加入他们了吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh god, no-no-no!
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，上帝，不...不...不！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Adam Burke [070019F9] (mod) Quest : ([07014F32]RoadMainQuest) Far From Any Road EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolinvoice\roadmainquest_aaburkekill_00068c67_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Attack> Nothing and no one can save you, you sick fuck.
ESP.TRADUIT: <攻击>没有任何人能救你，你这个变态。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh... No. No way. I can't do that. I-I'd spend my whole life in prison, alongside murderers and pushers and worse...
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃...不...不可能。我不能那样做，我会在监狱里，和杀人犯，毒贩，甚至更糟的人在一起...度过我的一生。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Adam Burke [070019F9] (mod) Quest : ([07014F32]RoadMainQuest) Far From Any Road EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolinvoice\roadmainqu_aaburketakealiv_00068c69_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Or... or the authorities would arrange an "accident" before I even saw trial. N-no, I can't do that. I won't.
ESP.TRADUIT: 或者...也许当局会在我接受审判之前就安排一次“事故”。不，我不能进监狱...我不会的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Adam Burke [070019F9] (mod) Quest : ([07014F32]RoadMainQuest) Far From Any Road EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolinvoice\roadmainqu_aaburketakealiv_00068c69_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Turn yourself in, Burke. It's the only way out of this alive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 自首吧，伯克。这是活着离开这里的唯一途径。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh god... M-make it quick, then. Fuck!
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢上帝...那...那就快点吧。操！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Adam Burke [070019F9] (mod) Quest : ([07014F32]RoadMainQuest) Far From Any Road EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolinvoice\roadmainqu_aaburkekilltwo_00068c6b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Attack> You're making my decision very easy, Adam. Any last words?
ESP.TRADUIT: <攻击> 你让我的决定变得非常简单，亚当。有什么遗言吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Well, I can pay you! More than the NCR is offering, OK? A lot more! I walk, you get paid, everyone wins, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]好吧，我可以付钱给你！比NCR给的更多，好吗？多得多！我走了，你拿了钱，双赢，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Adam Burke [070019F9] (mod) Quest : ([07014F32]RoadMainQuest) Far From Any Road EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolinvoice\roadmainqu_aaburkespeechon_00068c6d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You need to turn yourself in so I can get the full reward, OK?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你得去自首这样我才能拿到全部的赏金，好吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] I... You're... you're right. I know I'm sick. The... things that I've done can't be forgiven.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]我...你是...你是对的，我知道我有病...我做过的事无法原谅。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Adam Burke [070019F9] (mod) Quest : ([07014F32]RoadMainQuest) Far From Any Road EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolinvoice\roadmainqu_aaburkespeechon_00068c6e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think, worse than anything else, is that if I'm brought in alive, that... my father would get me out. Nothing would happen to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我认为，最糟糕的是，如果我被活着带回去，那...我父亲会把我弄出来的，我不会怎么样的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Adam Burke [070019F9] (mod) Quest : ([07014F32]RoadMainQuest) Far From Any Road EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolinvoice\roadmainqu_aaburkespeechon_00068c6e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And that... that would be worse than anything else that could possibly happen to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就是这样...这比杀了我都要糟糕。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Adam Burke [070019F9] (mod) Quest : ([07014F32]RoadMainQuest) Far From Any Road EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolinvoice\roadmainqu_aaburkespeechon_00068c6e_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And that's exactly what you deserve, you fucking coward. Or do you disagree?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是你应得的，你这该死的懦夫。还是说你不同意？

ESP.ORIGINAL: R... really? Jesus, thank you! Thank you, I promise, I'm going to head north, way further north. No one will ever hear from me again!
ESP.TRADUIT: 真...真的吗？上帝啊，谢谢你！谢谢你，我保证，我要往北走，再往北走。没有人会再听到我的消息了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Adam Burke [070019F9] (mod) Quest : ([07014F32]RoadMainQuest) Far From Any Road EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolinvoice\roadmainqu_aaburkecashout_00068c70_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here, this is all the cash I have. Thank you, I swear you won't regret this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给，这是我所有的现金！谢谢你，我发誓你不会后悔的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Adam Burke [070019F9] (mod) Quest : ([07014F32]RoadMainQuest) Far From Any Road EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolinvoice\roadmainqu_aaburkecashout_00068c70_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know what? I don't even care. Get the hell out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道吗？我根本不在乎，给我滚出去。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you kidding? I'm his only son! The only thing he has to carry on his fucking legacy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在开玩笑吗？我是他唯一的儿子！唯一能继承他遗产的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Adam Burke [070019F9] (mod) Quest : ([07014F32]RoadMainQuest) Far From Any Road EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolinvoice\roadmainqu_aaburkefather_00068c72_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He never tried to help me! He knew there was something wrong with me, and he just made it go away, every time! He would do it again, this time!
ESP.TRADUIT: 他从来没想过帮我！他知道我有什么毛病，每次都是他把问题给解决了！他还会这么做的，每次！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Adam Burke [070019F9] (mod) Quest : ([07014F32]RoadMainQuest) Far From Any Road EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolinvoice\roadmainqu_aaburkefather_00068c72_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's why I'm trying to get the hell out of here. I just want to go somewhere where... where I can't hurt anyone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以我才想赶紧离开这鬼地方，我只是想找个地方...一个我不会伤害任何人的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Adam Burke [070019F9] (mod) Quest : ([07014F32]RoadMainQuest) Far From Any Road EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolinvoice\roadmainqu_aaburkefather_00068c72_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why the hell would your father let you get away with everything?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你父亲为什么要让你逍遥法外？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Yes I do. That's exactly what he's going to try to do. I know it. That's why I'm begging you, just let me go.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]是的，我能确定，这正是他想要做的，我知道的。所以我才求你，放我走吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Adam Burke [070019F9] (mod) Quest : ([07014F32]RoadMainQuest) Far From Any Road EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolinvoice\roadmainqu_aaburkespeechtw_00068c74_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can't know for sure that's what he's going to do...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你无法确定他会做什么...

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] You're right. You're right. I can't keep running from this. I can't let my father control my life anymore.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]你说得对...你是对的，我不能一直逃避。我不能再让我父亲控制我的人生了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Adam Burke [070019F9] (mod) Quest : ([07014F32]RoadMainQuest) Far From Any Road EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolinvoice\roadmainqu_aaburkespeechtw_00068c75_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright. I'm... I'm putting an end to this. I'm going to... turn myself in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好，我...我要结束这一切。我要去...自首。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Adam Burke [070019F9] (mod) Quest : ([07014F32]RoadMainQuest) Far From Any Road EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolinvoice\roadmainqu_aaburkespeechtw_00068c75_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kind of a relief to have an end in sight. I'll... thank you. I'm going to get out of here. Goodbye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看到结局也是一种解脱。我会...谢谢你！我要离开这里。再见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Adam Burke [070019F9] (mod) Quest : ([07014F32]RoadMainQuest) Far From Any Road EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolinvoice\roadmainqu_aaburkespeechtw_00068c75_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's your life, not his. If you're capable of doing the right thing, now is the time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是你的人生，不是他的。如果你有能力做正确的事，就从现在开始吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Son of a bitch. I appreciate that you made the attempt, but I hope you understand that I can't pay you for this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗娘养的。我很感激你的努力，但我希望你明白我为什么不给你钱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Brandt [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07014F32]RoadMainQuest) Far From Any Road EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadvoicebrandt\roadmainqu_aabrandtquestfa_00069287_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll send word back to California. If we're lucky, they'll reassign me somewhere that isn't a waste of time, and Adam will get eaten by a deathclaw.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会把消息发回加州。如果我够幸运的话，他们会把我重新分配到一个不浪费时间的地方，然后亚当在路上被死亡爪吃掉。
