ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Brandt [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07014F32]RoadMainQuest) Far From Any Road EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadvoicebrandt\roadmainqu_aabrandtquestfa_00069287_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who am I kidding? Nothing good ever happens.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在骗谁呢？从来没有这种好事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Brandt [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07014F32]RoadMainQuest) Far From Any Road EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadvoicebrandt\roadmainqu_aabrandtquestfa_00069287_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Adam escaped.
ESP.TRADUIT: 亚当逃走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really? Well, that's, uh, that's a tragedy. Really, I'm all broken up about this. I was hoping that he'd be retrieved alive and well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的？嗯，那，呃，那真是个悲剧，真的。这件事让我心碎了，我希望他能活着被抓回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Brandt [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07014F32]RoadMainQuest) Far From Any Road EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadvoicebrandt\roadmainqu_aabrandtsuccess_00069289_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was really hoping that the rich, entitled child-rapist would get to go on home to reunite with his corrupt bureacrat father.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真的很希望这个有钱，有权的儿童强奸犯能回家和他腐败的官僚父亲团聚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Brandt [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07014F32]RoadMainQuest) Far From Any Road EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadvoicebrandt\roadmainqu_aabrandtsuccess_00069289_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, here's your reward. As I said, I can only pay you 500, what with the death of the target and all. I'm sure you'll manage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，这是给你的报酬。就像我说的，目标死了，我只能付你500块。我相信你会处理好的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Brandt [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07014F32]RoadMainQuest) Far From Any Road EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadvoicebrandt\roadmainqu_aabrandtsuccess_00069289_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I expect I won't be leaving this illustrious post any time soon, so stop by again sometime. I might have more work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我不会很快离开这个杰出的岗位，所以有时间再来看看，我可能会有更多的工作给你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Brandt [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07014F32]RoadMainQuest) Far From Any Road EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadvoicebrandt\roadmainqu_aabrandtsuccess_00069289_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Adam Burke is dead and gone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 亚当·伯克死了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, he swung on through here a while ago. If I had known to expect that, I'd've asked the rangers to act as sharpshooters.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，他之前来过这里。如果我早知道会这样，我就会让游骑兵充当狙击手了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Brandt [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07014F32]RoadMainQuest) Far From Any Road EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadvoicebrandt\roadmainqu_aabrandtadamali_0006928b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know. To make sure he gets here safely.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道的，确保他安全到达。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Brandt [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07014F32]RoadMainQuest) Far From Any Road EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadvoicebrandt\roadmainqu_aabrandtadamali_0006928b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's on an express trip back to California as we speak. Funny, how quickly they can make that happen for a senator's son.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们说话这会儿他正在回加州的快车上。真有意思，他们这么快就能让参议员的儿子如愿以偿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Brandt [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07014F32]RoadMainQuest) Far From Any Road EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadvoicebrandt\roadmainqu_aabrandtadamali_0006928b_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's your reward, in full, as agreed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是约定给你的全部报酬。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Brandt [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07014F32]RoadMainQuest) Far From Any Road EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadvoicebrandt\roadmainqu_aabrandtadamali_0006928b_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Seeing as how I'm unlikely to be transferred to a less horrible post, come check in with me later. I might have more work for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 鉴于我不太可能被调到一个不那么糟糕的职位，晚点来找我吧，我可能有更多工作给你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Brandt [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07014F32]RoadMainQuest) Far From Any Road EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadvoicebrandt\roadmainqu_aabrandtadamali_0006928b_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: About Burke...
ESP.TRADUIT: 关于伯克...

ESP.ORIGINAL: What, this? Yeah, I bought it from some traveller a while back. I was like "Oh shit, we're Road Snakes, and this jacket has a snake on it!" Awesome.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么，这个？对，我前阵子从一个旅行者那里买的。我当时就想"该死，我们是公路蟒蛇帮，这件夹克上有条蛇！"太棒了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brandon Welles [07000DF8] (mod) Quest : ([07014F32]RoadMainQuest) Far From Any Road EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\maleadult01default\roadmainqu_aabrandoncoat_00069898_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's with the weird jacket?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那件奇怪的夹克是怎么回事？

ESP.ORIGINAL: That is an excellent question, my friend. Our story is one that stretches back beyond the centuries, though it does lack the excitement that implies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是个好问题，我的朋友。我们的故事可以追溯到几个世纪以前，但它确实缺乏让人兴奋的元素。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bartholomew [070617C3] (mod) Quest : ([070617DE]RoadBoozeQuest) Liquid Gold EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadrobuts\roadboozeq_aarobotbackgrou_0006ab1b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Before humanity turned loose their bestial nature, throwing our world into radioactive disarray, we belonged to a man named ERROR. TOKEN NOT FOUND.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在人类释放兽性，把我们的世界卷入放射性混乱之前，我们属于一个叫“错误，令牌未找到”的人
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bartholomew [070617C3] (mod) Quest : ([070617DE]RoadBoozeQuest) Liquid Gold EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadrobuts\roadboozeq_aarobotbackgrou_0006ab1b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was always ERROR. TOKEN NOT FOUND's dream for the world to be beautiful and peaceful, with laughter and mirth for all, young and old alike.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让世界变得美丽而和平，让所有人，无论老少，都充满欢笑和欢乐，这一直是“错误，令牌未找到”的梦想。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bartholomew [070617C3] (mod) Quest : ([070617DE]RoadBoozeQuest) Liquid Gold EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadrobuts\roadboozeq_aarobotbackgrou_0006ab1b_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: To further this dream, he invested all his wealth and time into perfecting his craft. His passion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为了实现这个梦想，他投入了所有的财富和时间来完善自己的技艺，他充满热情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bartholomew [070617C3] (mod) Quest : ([070617DE]RoadBoozeQuest) Liquid Gold EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadrobuts\roadboozeq_aarobotbackgrou_0006ab1b_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hard liquor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 烈性酒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bartholomew [070617C3] (mod) Quest : ([070617DE]RoadBoozeQuest) Liquid Gold EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadrobuts\roadboozeq_aarobotbackgrou_0006ab1b_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What the hell are you doing down here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在这下面做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It is as you say. I can deny it no longer, lest the guilt of it all corrodes my wiring and renders me inert.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就像你说的。我不能再否认它，以免罪恶感腐蚀我的线路，使我变得迟钝。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bartholomew [070617C3] (mod) Quest : ([070617DE]RoadBoozeQuest) Liquid Gold EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadrobuts\roadboozeq_aarobotbooze_0006ab1d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ERROR. TOKEN NOT FOUND put so much of himself into his art, that by the time he was satisfied, death was fast approaching.
ESP.TRADUIT: “错误，令牌未找到”在他的艺术中投入了太多的精力，当他感到满意的时候，死亡已经逼近了他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bartholomew [070617C3] (mod) Quest : ([070617DE]RoadBoozeQuest) Liquid Gold EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadrobuts\roadboozeq_aarobotbooze_0006ab1d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He had Mrs. Jessica and myself created, so that we could ensure his gift to the world would outlive his mortal body.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他让人创造了我和杰西卡夫人，这样我们就能确保他献给世界的礼物会比他的肉体更长久。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bartholomew [070617C3] (mod) Quest : ([070617DE]RoadBoozeQuest) Liquid Gold EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadrobuts\roadboozeq_aarobotbooze_0006ab1d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Indeed, as I sit beneath the stars and gaze into the endless night sky, I often find myself pondering if mortality may actually be a gift.
ESP.TRADUIT: 事实上，当我坐在星空下凝视无尽的夜空时，我经常发现自己在思考死亡是否真的是一份礼物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bartholomew [070617C3] (mod) Quest : ([070617DE]RoadBoozeQuest) Liquid Gold EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadrobuts\roadboozeq_aarobotbooze_0006ab1d_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is it not mortality, and the fear of death, that motivates humanity to create? And is it not art, more than anything else, that defines the soul?
ESP.TRADUIT: 难道不是死亡和对死亡的恐惧激励着人类去创作吗？难道艺术不是最能定义灵魂的东西吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bartholomew [070617C3] (mod) Quest : ([070617DE]RoadBoozeQuest) Liquid Gold EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadrobuts\roadboozeq_aarobotbooze_0006ab1d_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have no answers, gentle wanderer. All I have is hard-coded instructions to create and distribute liquor to all the smiling girls and boys.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没有答案，温柔的漫游者。我所拥有的只是根据硬编码的指示去制造并分发酒给所有微笑的男孩和女孩。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bartholomew [070617C3] (mod) Quest : ([070617DE]RoadBoozeQuest) Liquid Gold EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadrobuts\roadboozeq_aarobotbooze_0006ab1d_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hard liquor? So you're where it's been coming from!
ESP.TRADUIT: 烈性酒？所以你就是它的来源！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is... is it truth, that you speak? This is a true miracle, the scale of which makes me want to sing to the heavens in sheer joy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这...你说的是真的吗？这是一个真正的奇迹，它的规模让我想在纯粹的喜悦中歌唱到天堂。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bartholomew [070617C3] (mod) Quest : ([070617DE]RoadBoozeQuest) Liquid Gold EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadrobuts\roadboozequest_aarobothire_0006ab1f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: To join our services with that of an elegant bar would truly give purpose to the soulless, automated hell that purports to be my life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 将我们的服务献给一个优雅的酒吧，给这个没有灵魂的自动化地狱赋予意义！这是我想要的生活！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bartholomew [070617C3] (mod) Quest : ([070617DE]RoadBoozeQuest) Liquid Gold EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadrobuts\roadboozequest_aarobothire_0006ab1f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell your barman that we shall begin brewing exclusively for them. It shall be a high honor. Now, was there anything else, my child?
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉你的酒保，我们将开始专门为他们酿造酒。这将是一种崇高的荣誉。还有别的事吗，我的孩子？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bartholomew [070617C3] (mod) Quest : ([070617DE]RoadBoozeQuest) Liquid Gold EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadrobuts\roadboozequest_aarobothire_0006ab1f_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's a bar in Madsen that would like to serve your product.
ESP.TRADUIT: 马德森有家酒吧愿意提供你的产品。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I confess to the charges levelled at me. RobCo classified protocol #881-C states that this unit must defend itself with lethal force if attacked.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我承认对我的指控。 RobCo 机密协议#881-C 规定，如果受到攻击，该单位必须使用致命武力自卫。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bartholomew [070617C3] (mod) Quest : ([070617DE]RoadBoozeQuest) Liquid Gold EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadrobuts\roadboozequest_aarobothobo_0006ab21_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Given the violent nature of the people we observe in this valley, I calculated that all encounters had a 76% chance of ending fatally.
ESP.TRADUIT: 考虑到我们在这个山谷里观察到的人类暴力本性，我计算出所有遭遇都有76%的几率会致死。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bartholomew [070617C3] (mod) Quest : ([070617DE]RoadBoozeQuest) Liquid Gold EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadrobuts\roadboozequest_aarobothobo_0006ab21_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If the odds of death were in my favor, I might relish the chance to snuff out this hellish facade of life that has been thrust upon me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果死亡的几率偏向我，我可能会很高兴有机会扼杀这种强加给我的地狱般的生活假象。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bartholomew [070617C3] (mod) Quest : ([070617DE]RoadBoozeQuest) Liquid Gold EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadrobuts\roadboozequest_aarobothobo_0006ab21_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But my victory is a far more likely outcome. An automatron with an artificial soul, hastening humans to the very death it yearns for every day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但更有可能的结果还是我的胜利。一个拥有人造灵魂的自动机器，加速人类走向它每天渴望的死亡。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bartholomew [070617C3] (mod) Quest : ([070617DE]RoadBoozeQuest) Liquid Gold EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadrobuts\roadboozequest_aarobothobo_0006ab21_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No. No. It is too perverse. I can stomach the thought of it no longer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不...不，这太反常了。我再也无法忍受这种想法了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bartholomew [070617C3] (mod) Quest : ([070617DE]RoadBoozeQuest) Liquid Gold EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadrobuts\roadboozequest_aarobothobo_0006ab21_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So why did you pass out free drinks to sleeping hobos?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那你为什么要给睡着的流浪汉分发免费饮料？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're a rather helpful sort, friend. Much appreciated. Here's a bit of monetary compensation for your trouble.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真是个乐于助人的朋友，感谢你。这是给你的一点金钱补偿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jon Vicky [0701060B] (mod) Quest : ([070617DE]RoadBoozeQuest) Liquid Gold EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadjonvoice\roadboozeq_aajonboozedone_0006ab25_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, and before you go, the mayor of our town wanted to chat with you. You should be able to find her upstairs somewhere.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在你走之前，镇长想和你谈谈，你应该能在楼上找到她。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jon Vicky [0701060B] (mod) Quest : ([070617DE]RoadBoozeQuest) Liquid Gold EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadjonvoice\roadboozeq_aajonboozedone_0006ab25_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I found where the booze was coming from. You should start getting deliveries soon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我找到酒的来源了，你应该很快就会开始收货了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That I do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是这样想的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bob Early [07002604] (mod) Quest : ([0706BD44]RoadSecondQuest) As I Walk Through the Valley EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roaddeltorovoice\roadsecond_aabobstartquest_0006bd4a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Heard about your little foray up north, tracking that Burke kid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听说你去北方追踪那个叫伯克的孩子了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bob Early [07002604] (mod) Quest : ([0706BD44]RoadSecondQuest) As I Walk Through the Valley EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roaddeltorovoice\roadsecond_aabobstartquest_0006bd4a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That’s rough territory. I’m thinking, you’ve been paid to go fugitive-hunting there once before...
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是一片崎岖的土地，我在想，你曾经被雇去那里追捕逃犯...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bob Early [07002604] (mod) Quest : ([0706BD44]RoadSecondQuest) As I Walk Through the Valley EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roaddeltorovoice\roadsecond_aabobstartquest_0006bd4a_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How about an encore performance? I need someone up there dealt with.
ESP.TRADUIT: 返场表演怎么样？我需要有人上去处理一下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bob Early [07002604] (mod) Quest : ([0706BD44]RoadSecondQuest) As I Walk Through the Valley EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roaddeltorovoice\roadsecond_aabobstartquest_0006bd4a_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lt. Brandt said you had a job for me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 布兰特中尉说你有工作给我？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not what I was hoping for, but it’s hard to blame you all the same. Alright, you take care of yourself, then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然不是我想要的，但也很难责怪你。好吧，那你好好照顾自己吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bob Early [07002604] (mod) Quest : ([0706BD44]RoadSecondQuest) As I Walk Through the Valley EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roaddeltorovoice\roadsecond_aabobdecline_0006bd4c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No thanks, I'm done with that hellhole.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不了，谢谢，我已经受够了那个鬼地方。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, you know how there was that push to bring Burke, sick bastard that he is, in alive?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，你知道为什么一直要把伯克这个有病的杂种活着带回来吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bob Early [07002604] (mod) Quest : ([0706BD44]RoadSecondQuest) As I Walk Through the Valley EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roaddeltorovoice\roadsecond_aabobaccept_0006bd4e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, that’s not really an issue here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，这不是一个真正的问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bob Early [07002604] (mod) Quest : ([0706BD44]RoadSecondQuest) As I Walk Through the Valley EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roaddeltorovoice\roadsecond_aabobaccept_0006bd4e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fella’ up there name of Caleb Alquist. At the moment, his head is attached to his shoulders, and I got ten thousand caps to whoever can rectify that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 伙计？那家伙的名字叫做凯莱布·阿尔奎斯特。现在他的头还长在他的肩膀上，谁能纠正这一点，我就给他一万瓶盖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bob Early [07002604] (mod) Quest : ([0706BD44]RoadSecondQuest) As I Walk Through the Valley EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roaddeltorovoice\roadsecond_aabobaccept_0006bd4e_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's the job?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么工作？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Long damn story. Short version is he’s a mass-murdering lunatic, claiming that the NCR authorized his killing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他妈的说来话长，简而言之，他是个杀人不眨眼的疯子，声称NCR授权他杀人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bob Early [07002604] (mod) Quest : ([0706BD44]RoadSecondQuest) As I Walk Through the Valley EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roaddeltorovoice\roadsecond_aabobbeginquest_0006bd50_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Which is verifiably bullshit, seeing as how those orders would’ve come from me, and I sure-as-hell never gave him the go-ahead for that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这纯属扯淡，因为这些订单都是我下的，而我绝对不会同意他这么做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bob Early [07002604] (mod) Quest : ([0706BD44]RoadSecondQuest) As I Walk Through the Valley EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roaddeltorovoice\roadsecond_aabobbeginquest_0006bd50_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Big payoff. What'd this guy do to warrant it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 巨大回报。这家伙做了什么来保证这一点？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bob Early [07002604] (mod) Quest : ([0706BD44]RoadSecondQuest) As I Walk Through the Valley EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roaddeltorovoice\roadsecondquest_aabobcaleb_0006bd52_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You been around McCarran, maybe you noticed we got some bounties open for a few Fiends?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你经常在麦卡伦附近，也许你注意到我们为一些恶魔帮准备了赏金？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bob Early [07002604] (mod) Quest : ([0706BD44]RoadSecondQuest) As I Walk Through the Valley EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roaddeltorovoice\roadsecondquest_aabobcaleb_0006bd52_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, hiring bounty hunters for the especially troublesome raiders isn’t a new policy. We did it a lot when we first rolled into the Mojave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 雇佣赏金猎人来对付特别麻烦的掠夺者并不是什么新政策。我们第一次进入莫哈韦沙漠时经常这样做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bob Early [07002604] (mod) Quest : ([0706BD44]RoadSecondQuest) As I Walk Through the Valley EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roaddeltorovoice\roadsecondquest_aabobcaleb_0006bd52_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We didn’t have the resources to send actual forces after the little raiding parties, so why not hire local talent to do it for us?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们没有足够的资源去派遣真正的部队对付那些小股掠夺者，所以为什么不雇佣当地的人才来为我们做这件事呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bob Early [07002604] (mod) Quest : ([0706BD44]RoadSecondQuest) As I Walk Through the Valley EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roaddeltorovoice\roadsecondquest_aabobcaleb_0006bd52_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Worked pretty well, most of the time. But there was this one raider boss, man named Sheridan.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大部分情况下，进展都算不错，但有一个叫谢里丹的掠夺者首领。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bob Early [07002604] (mod) Quest : ([0706BD44]RoadSecondQuest) As I Walk Through the Valley EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roaddeltorovoice\roadsecondquest_aabobcaleb_0006bd52_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Man was hard to kill. He started to empower other raiders in the area. Sheridan could stand up to us and live, so why shouldn’t they try it, too?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这家伙很难杀，他开始向这一地区的其他掠夺者提供帮助增强实力。谢里丹足以反抗我们，活下来，那其它掠夺者为什么不也试试呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bob Early [07002604] (mod) Quest : ([0706BD44]RoadSecondQuest) As I Walk Through the Valley EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roaddeltorovoice\roadsecondquest_aabobcaleb_0006bd52_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, I put a contract on the son of a bitch. Kill him, and wipe his influence.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以我给那个狗娘养的开了悬赏，谁都可以杀了谢里丹，抹去他的影响力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bob Early [07002604] (mod) Quest : ([0706BD44]RoadSecondQuest) As I Walk Through the Valley EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roaddeltorovoice\roadsecondquest_aabobcaleb_0006bd52_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've got nowhere to be. Let's hear details.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没什么地方好去的，我们来听听细节。

ESP.ORIGINAL: There was a little town. Southeast a ways. Normal folk lived there. They got it in their head that Sheridan could protect them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 往东南走，有一个小镇。一些普通人住在那里，他们认为谢里丹能保护他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bob Early [07002604] (mod) Quest : ([0706BD44]RoadSecondQuest) As I Walk Through the Valley EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roaddeltorovoice\roadsecond_aabobcaleb2_0006bd54_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, they gave him and his crew shelter. They wouldn’t sell him out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，他们给谢里丹和他的成员提供了庇护，并保证不会出卖他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bob Early [07002604] (mod) Quest : ([0706BD44]RoadSecondQuest) As I Walk Through the Valley EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roaddeltorovoice\roadsecond_aabobcaleb2_0006bd54_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alquist took the bounty, and rolled into town with his posse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 阿尔奎斯特领了悬赏任务，带着他的手下进了城镇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bob Early [07002604] (mod) Quest : ([0706BD44]RoadSecondQuest) As I Walk Through the Valley EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roaddeltorovoice\roadsecond_aabobcaleb2_0006bd54_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sheridan wasn’t there, but... townsfolk were. These weren’t raiders. They were just normal folk trying to make it out there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢里丹不在场，但是...那些镇民，他们不是掠夺者，他们只是想在那里生存下去的普通人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bob Early [07002604] (mod) Quest : ([0706BD44]RoadSecondQuest) As I Walk Through the Valley EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roaddeltorovoice\roadsecond_aabobcaleb2_0006bd54_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But Alquist killed them all. Even the kids. Burned the whole place to ash, and left the bodies to rot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但阿尔奎斯特把他们都杀了，孩子也没放过。把整个地方烧成灰，尸体扔在那任其腐烂。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bob Early [07002604] (mod) Quest : ([0706BD44]RoadSecondQuest) As I Walk Through the Valley EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roaddeltorovoice\roadsecond_aabobcaleb2_0006bd54_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then he started saying that we hired him to do it. "Wipe out Sheridan’s influence."
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后他开始说是我们雇他做的。以“消除谢里丹的影响力”为名。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bob Early [07002604] (mod) Quest : ([0706BD44]RoadSecondQuest) As I Walk Through the Valley EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roaddeltorovoice\roadsecond_aabobcaleb2_0006bd54_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That does make this personal for me, but to be honest, the man deserves to hang, any which way you look at it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这对我来说确实是私人恩怨，但说实话，这个人活该被绞死，不管你从哪个方面看。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bob Early [07002604] (mod) Quest : ([0706BD44]RoadSecondQuest) As I Walk Through the Valley EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roaddeltorovoice\roadsecond_aabobcaleb2_0006bd54_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And this has to do with Alquist, how...?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这和阿尔奎斯特有什么关系...？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good. Alright, be ready for anything, and report back to me when you’re done.
ESP.TRADUIT: OK，好了，做好一切准备，完成后向我报告。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bob Early [07002604] (mod) Quest : ([0706BD44]RoadSecondQuest) As I Walk Through the Valley EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roaddeltorovoice\roadsecond_aabobhunting_0006bd56_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll start hunting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我将开始狩猎。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah... Yeah, man’s a veteran hunter. By definition, he’s gonna be wise to the usual tricks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对...是的，他是个经验丰富的赏金猎人，也就是说他会识破一些惯用的伎俩。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bob Early [07002604] (mod) Quest : ([0706BD44]RoadSecondQuest) As I Walk Through the Valley EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roaddeltorovoice\roadsecondquest_aabobtruth_0006bd58_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, if there was no way to take him without innocent folk getting hurt, than you made the right call.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，如果无法在不伤害无辜民众的情况下带走他，那么你的决定是正确的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bob Early [07002604] (mod) Quest : ([0706BD44]RoadSecondQuest) As I Walk Through the Valley EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roaddeltorovoice\roadsecondquest_aabobtruth_0006bd58_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can’t pay you the bounty, but... good work, nonetheless.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不能付你赏金，但...尽管如此，你干得不错。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bob Early [07002604] (mod) Quest : ([0706BD44]RoadSecondQuest) As I Walk Through the Valley EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roaddeltorovoice\roadsecondquest_aabobtruth_0006bd58_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alquist got away. There was no way to get him without collateral damage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 阿尔奎斯特逃掉了，没办法在不造成附带伤害的情况下抓到他。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Some guys...? Look, if he’s dead, verify it, goddamnit. If he isn’t, go do something about that. Jesus.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]有些人...？听着，如果他死了，就去核实一下，该死的。如果没死，那就去做点什么，天啊...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bob Early [07002604] (mod) Quest : ([0706BD44]RoadSecondQuest) As I Walk Through the Valley EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roaddeltorovoice\roadsecond_aabobspeech_0006bd5a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, so, some guys up there said Caleb was already dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对的，所以，那边有些人说凯莱布已经死了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Uh, yeah... I’d say not bringing me a jar of green-glowing viscera was the right call.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 呃，是的....我是说没给我带来一罐发绿光的人肉是正确的选择。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bob Early [07002604] (mod) Quest : ([0706BD44]RoadSecondQuest) As I Walk Through the Valley EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roaddeltorovoice\roadsecond_aabobspeech_0006bd5b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, anyway, I’m very happy to hear that son of a bitch is dead and gone. Good-goddamn-riddance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎样，我很高兴听到那个狗娘养的死了。太他妈他妈棒了~
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bob Early [07002604] (mod) Quest : ([0706BD44]RoadSecondQuest) As I Walk Through the Valley EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roaddeltorovoice\roadsecond_aabobspeech_0006bd5b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here’s your payout. You’ve earned every bit of it, and then some.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是你的报酬，这一切都是你应得的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bob Early [07002604] (mod) Quest : ([0706BD44]RoadSecondQuest) As I Walk Through the Valley EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roaddeltorovoice\roadsecond_aabobspeech_0006bd5b_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He’s dead. Wish I had something to give you, but you know how plasma weapons can be.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他死了，真希望我能给你点证明，但你知道等离子武器的威力。

ESP.ORIGINAL: A lot of interesting stories that led me to wasting away here. I appreciate the climate, but otherwise?
ESP.TRADUIT: 很多有趣的故事让我在这里虚度光阴。我喜欢这里的气候，但除此之外呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bob Early [07002604] (mod) Quest : ([0706BD44]RoadSecondQuest) As I Walk Through the Valley EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roaddeltorovoice\roadsecond_aabobbackground_0006bd5d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Short version is that I stared down the higher powers one too many times and got on their bad side
ESP.TRADUIT: 简而言之，就是我太多次盯着那些高层的力量，惹毛了他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bob Early [07002604] (mod) Quest : ([0706BD44]RoadSecondQuest) As I Walk Through the Valley EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roaddeltorovoice\roadsecond_aabobbackground_0006bd5d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ever hear of a man named Forrester?
ESP.TRADUIT: 听说过一个叫弗雷斯特的人吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bob Early [07002604] (mod) Quest : ([0706BD44]RoadSecondQuest) As I Walk Through the Valley EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roaddeltorovoice\roadsecond_aabobbackground_0006bd5d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's your background, Bob?
ESP.TRADUIT: 鲍勃，你的背景是什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: He used to be a raider. Ran with a real nasty crew. Well, we caught up with him. Supposed to send him back home for a show trial.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他曾经是一名掠夺者，和一帮卑鄙的家伙一起。嗯，我们抓到了他，本应该把他送回家搞一场作秀的审判。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bob Early [07002604] (mod) Quest : ([0706BD44]RoadSecondQuest) As I Walk Through the Valley EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roaddeltorovoice\roadsecond_aabobforrester_0006bd5f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He never made it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他没能到达。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bob Early [07002604] (mod) Quest : ([0706BD44]RoadSecondQuest) As I Walk Through the Valley EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roaddeltorovoice\roadsecond_aabobforrester_0006bd5f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Heads were gonna roll, so me and my partner jumped on that grenade.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那我们脑袋就要搬家了，所以我和我的搭档接了这个黑锅。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bob Early [07002604] (mod) Quest : ([0706BD44]RoadSecondQuest) As I Walk Through the Valley EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roaddeltorovoice\roadsecond_aabobforrester_0006bd5f_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He got some awful recon work dumped on him, and I’m up here on a mountain instead of helping win this war.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他被派去做一些糟糕的侦查工作，而我却在山上，而不是帮助赢得这场战争。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bob Early [07002604] (mod) Quest : ([0706BD44]RoadSecondQuest) As I Walk Through the Valley EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roaddeltorovoice\roadsecond_aabobforrester_0006bd5f_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦好吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bob Early [07002604] (mod) Quest : ([0706BD44]RoadSecondQuest) As I Walk Through the Valley EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roaddeltorovoice\roadsecond_aabobforrester_0006bd5f_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nope.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, maybe you caused one anyway. Maybe you you disrupted some serious shit, and the only way you can atone is through blood and pain.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，可能你还是造成了，也许你破坏了一些严重的事情，而你唯一能赎罪的方式就是承受流血和痛苦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Irene [0700C003] (mod) Quest : ([0706C36B]RoadIreneDialogue) When My Time Comes EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\femaleadult11\roadirened_aairenepussy_0006c375_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, no, I’m fucking with you. For a gun-for-hire, you're a lot softer than I expected.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，不是，我在跟你开玩笑。作为一个雇佣兵，你比我想象中要温柔得多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Irene [0700C003] (mod) Quest : ([0706C36B]RoadIreneDialogue) When My Time Comes EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\femaleadult11\roadirened_aairenepussy_0006c375_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fortunately, it's your ability to kill assholes for cash that interests me, not your personal foibles.
ESP.TRADUIT: 幸运的是，我只对你为了钱而杀混蛋的能力感兴趣，你的个人缺点与之相比不足挂齿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Irene [0700C003] (mod) Quest : ([0706C36B]RoadIreneDialogue) When My Time Comes EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\femaleadult11\roadirened_aairenepussy_0006c375_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not here to cause problems...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不是来找麻烦的...

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great, me neither. I'd be disappointed if you were an ass-kisser, anyways.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太好了，我也不在乎。但如果你是在拍马屁，那我会很失望。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Irene [0700C003] (mod) Quest : ([0706C36B]RoadIreneDialogue) When My Time Comes EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\femaleadult11\roadirened_aairenedick_0006c377_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I figure, if you're some kinda problem-solver for hire, I got some use for you, you know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想，如果你是个能解决问题的人，我对你来说会有点用处的，你懂吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Irene [0700C003] (mod) Quest : ([0706C36B]RoadIreneDialogue) When My Time Comes EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\femaleadult11\roadirened_aairenedick_0006c377_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I couldn't possibly care less.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我完全不在乎。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was going to be annoyingly coy and ask if you've noticed the raider infestation in the valley, but... Yeah, we both know you've seen them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我本来想问你有没有注意到山谷里的掠夺者，但...我们都知道你已经遭遇过他们了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Irene [0700C003] (mod) Quest : ([0706C36B]RoadIreneDialogue) When My Time Comes EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\femaleadult11\roadirened_aairenework_0006c379_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're pissing me off, and since I’m in charge, it’s my job to see them gone. Thing is, stupid shit tends to happen whenever I leave town.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们惹毛我了，既然我是负责人，我的职责就是看着他们滚蛋。问题在于，我一出城，这里就会发生各种蠢事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Irene [0700C003] (mod) Quest : ([0706C36B]RoadIreneDialogue) When My Time Comes EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\femaleadult11\roadirened_aairenework_0006c379_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Through the combined powers of asking politely, along with a pair of pliers, I have this list of the local raider captains.
ESP.TRADUIT: 通过对某个俘虏的礼貌的询问，并在老虎钳的帮助下，我得到了这份当地掠夺者首领的名单。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Irene [0700C003] (mod) Quest : ([0706C36B]RoadIreneDialogue) When My Time Comes EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\femaleadult11\roadirened_aairenework_0006c379_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyone who swings through here and seems competent gets a copy. Short version is that you kill anyone on this list, and I pay you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 任何经过这里的有能力的人都会得到一份拷贝名单。简单来说就是你杀了名单上的人，我就付钱给你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Irene [0700C003] (mod) Quest : ([0706C36B]RoadIreneDialogue) When My Time Comes EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\femaleadult11\roadirened_aairenework_0006c379_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's about it. Here's your copy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就这样了，这份给你了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Irene [0700C003] (mod) Quest : ([0706C36B]RoadIreneDialogue) When My Time Comes EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\femaleadult11\roadirened_aairenework_0006c379_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, what do you want?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，你想要什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, they used to be disorganized and prone to fighting each other over territory and loot. Wish that was still the case, so we could wipe them out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们以前组织非常混乱，经常为了争夺地盘和战利品而内讧。真希望现在情况依然如此，这样我们就能轻而易举地消灭他们了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Irene [0700C003] (mod) Quest : ([0706C36B]RoadIreneDialogue) When My Time Comes EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\femaleadult11\roadirened_aaireneraiders_0006c37b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But, a little bit before I rolled into town and... well, made it into a town, the little bands started getting organized and working together.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是在我进城之前...好吧，是把这鬼地方变成一个小镇之前，他们一伙人就开始组织起来，一起干活。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Irene [0700C003] (mod) Quest : ([0706C36B]RoadIreneDialogue) When My Time Comes EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\femaleadult11\roadirened_aaireneraiders_0006c37b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Turns out they started falling in line under some big son-of-a-bitch named Hader. Road Snakes probably would have been next, if not for me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 后来发现他们开始追随一个叫哈德尔的大狗崽子。如果不是我介入，公路蟒蛇帮可能会是下一个入伙的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Irene [0700C003] (mod) Quest : ([0706C36B]RoadIreneDialogue) When My Time Comes EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\femaleadult11\roadirened_aaireneraiders_0006c37b_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good news is that, even though they're fighting under the same banner, most of 'em still hate each other. If they all worked together... It'd be bad.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好消息是，即使他们为了同一旗帜战斗，他们中的大多数人仍然憎恨对方。如果他们合作...那关系肯定不会很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Irene [0700C003] (mod) Quest : ([0706C36B]RoadIreneDialogue) When My Time Comes EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\femaleadult11\roadirened_aaireneraiders_0006c37b_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can you tell me about the other raiders in the valley?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能告诉我山谷里其他掠夺者的情况吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I suppose the abbreviated history of the town is... That it's entirely my own doing. How about that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想这个小镇简短的历史是...完全是我自己白手起家。你觉得这个回答怎么样？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Irene [0700C003] (mod) Quest : ([0706C36B]RoadIreneDialogue) When My Time Comes EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\femaleadult11\roadirened_aairenemadsen_0006c37d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Before I showed up, this was just another shitty raider hangout. Belonged to some garbage gang called the Road Snakes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我来之前，这里只是废土上又一个常见的掠夺者聚集地，属于一个叫公路蟒蛇的垃圾帮派。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Irene [0700C003] (mod) Quest : ([0706C36B]RoadIreneDialogue) When My Time Comes EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\femaleadult11\roadirened_aairenemadsen_0006c37d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I got tired of their terrible attitudes within about five minutes of showing up, so I shot their chief in the throat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 来了不到五分钟，我就受够了他们的恶劣态度，所以我朝他们首领的喉咙开了一枪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Irene [0700C003] (mod) Quest : ([0706C36B]RoadIreneDialogue) When My Time Comes EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\femaleadult11\roadirened_aairenemadsen_0006c37d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I figured that it was one of those cases where, y'know, whoever kills the king gets the crown. Instead, leadership passed to that dick, Colin.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想这个帮派应该有那种，谁杀了国王谁就能得到王冠的规矩。不过领导权交给了科林那个鸡巴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Irene [0700C003] (mod) Quest : ([0706C36B]RoadIreneDialogue) When My Time Comes EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\femaleadult11\roadirened_aairenemadsen_0006c37d_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Smug asshole he may be, but he at least had the common sense to name me his successor, and then to retire from the chief position immediately.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他或许是个自以为是的混蛋，但他至少有常识，指定我为他的继任者，然后马上退休。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Irene [0700C003] (mod) Quest : ([0706C36B]RoadIreneDialogue) When My Time Comes EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\femaleadult11\roadirened_aairenemadsen_0006c37d_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That was a couple years ago. I've been civilizing this place ever since, whether they want it or not.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是几年前的事了。从那以后，我就一直在让这里变得文明，不管他们愿不愿意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Irene [0700C003] (mod) Quest : ([0706C36B]RoadIreneDialogue) When My Time Comes EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\femaleadult11\roadirened_aairenemadsen_0006c37d_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can you tell me about Madsen?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能跟我说说马德森吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, some did, sure. The bitter ones got themselves killed or exiled pretty quickly, though. Except for Dooley, he just got his ass beat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然记仇，有些人是这样的，不过那些心怀怨恨的人很快就被杀或流放了。除了杜利，他刚被揍了一顿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Irene [0700C003] (mod) Quest : ([0706C36B]RoadIreneDialogue) When My Time Comes EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\femaleadult11\roadirened_aairenesnakes_0006c37f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Plus, unlike those assholes pretending to be Romans, I recognize that annihilating the cultural identity of my underlings just breeds resentment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而且，不像那些假装是罗马人的混蛋，我意识到消灭我下属的文化身份只会滋生怨恨。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Irene [0700C003] (mod) Quest : ([0706C36B]RoadIreneDialogue) When My Time Comes EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\femaleadult11\roadirened_aairenesnakes_0006c37f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, the Road Snakes still technically exist. They're just a town militia now, rather than a stupid gang of psychotic idiots.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，公路蟒蛇帮理论上还是存在的。他们现在只是镇里的民兵，而不是一群愚蠢的疯子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Irene [0700C003] (mod) Quest : ([0706C36B]RoadIreneDialogue) When My Time Comes EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\femaleadult11\roadirened_aairenesnakes_0006c37f_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And the Road Snakes didn't hold a grudge?
ESP.TRADUIT: 公路蟒蛇帮的人不记仇吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I've never met him. That's good news for one of us, since I want him dead, and I imagine he wants something similar for me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，我从未见过他，这对我们中的一个人来说是个好消息，因为我想让他死，我猜他对我也有类似的要求。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Irene [0700C003] (mod) Quest : ([0706C36B]RoadIreneDialogue) When My Time Comes EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\femaleadult11\roadirened_aairenehader_0006c381_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As for who he actually is... Not a clue. Scuttlebutt says he's former Legion. One of their centurions, actually.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至于他到底是谁...一点线索都没有。传闻他是前军团成员，是军团的一个百夫长。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Irene [0700C003] (mod) Quest : ([0706C36B]RoadIreneDialogue) When My Time Comes EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\femaleadult11\roadirened_aairenehader_0006c381_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't put a lot of stock in rumors, though. And the way I hear it, Legion doesn't really have defectors. So, who the fuck really knows?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过我不太相信这个传言，据我所知，军团没有叛逃者。所以，谁他妈真的知道呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Irene [0700C003] (mod) Quest : ([0706C36B]RoadIreneDialogue) When My Time Comes EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\femaleadult11\roadirened_aairenehader_0006c381_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's beyond dispute is that he's tall as hell, he's built like a fucking super mutant, and he's quicker than a man that size has any right to be.
ESP.TRADUIT: 毫无疑问的是，他非常的高，他的体型像个超级变种人，而且他比超级变种人更敏捷。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Irene [0700C003] (mod) Quest : ([0706C36B]RoadIreneDialogue) When My Time Comes EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\femaleadult11\roadirened_aairenehader_0006c381_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Still, good news is that the raiders only follow him because he could tear their arms off if they disobey him. If he dies, his "army" splinters.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，好消息是掠夺者们追随他是因为如果不服从，他可以把他们的胳膊扯下来。所以如果他死了，他的“军队”就会四分五裂。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Irene [0700C003] (mod) Quest : ([0706C36B]RoadIreneDialogue) When My Time Comes EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\femaleadult11\roadirened_aairenehader_0006c381_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Naturally, I'll pay good money to anyone who makes him die.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，谁让他死，我就给谁一大笔钱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Irene [0700C003] (mod) Quest : ([0706C36B]RoadIreneDialogue) When My Time Comes EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\femaleadult11\roadirened_aairenehader_0006c381_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can you tell me about Hader?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能跟我说说哈德尔吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Because whenever I try to leave this place alone, something stupid and easily-avoidable always happens.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为每当我试图离开这个地方，一些愚蠢的，容易避免的事情就会发生。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Irene [0700C003] (mod) Quest : ([0706C36B]RoadIreneDialogue) When My Time Comes EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\femaleadult11\roadirened_aairenelazy_0006c383_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Last time I left them to their own devices, Dooley convinced half of the sharpshooters to leave their posts to help him "shoot a fish-man" outside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 上次我让他们自己处理时，杜利说服了一半的神枪手离开他们的岗位，帮助他在外面“射杀一个鱼人”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Irene [0700C003] (mod) Quest : ([0706C36B]RoadIreneDialogue) When My Time Comes EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\femaleadult11\roadirened_aairenelazy_0006c383_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why don't you just kill them yourself?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么不亲手杀了他们？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't even want to know how somebody earns a dumbass nickname like that for themselves. Better to just kill him, really.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我甚至不想知道一个人是怎么得到这样一个蠢蛋绰号的。最好直接杀了他，真的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Irene [0700C003] (mod) Quest : ([0706C36B]RoadIreneDialogue) When My Time Comes EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\femaleadult11\roadirened_aaireneknifedea_0006c385_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Since that crew was so close to the town, I told Colin to round up some of his militia buddies and clear the cave out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为那伙人离镇子很近，我让科林把他的几个民兵朋友召集起来，把山洞清空。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Irene [0700C003] (mod) Quest : ([0706C36B]RoadIreneDialogue) When My Time Comes EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\femaleadult11\roadirened_aaireneknifedea_0006c385_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Apparently that was too much effort on his end, since you ended up doing it for him. I imagine he paid you already, so I'm not going to.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很明显，这对他来说太费劲了，因为最后是你帮他搞定的。我猜他已经给过你钱了，所以我就不给了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Irene [0700C003] (mod) Quest : ([0706C36B]RoadIreneDialogue) When My Time Comes EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\femaleadult11\roadirened_aaireneknifedea_0006c385_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I killed Steak-Knife.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀了牛排刀。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good, I don't like it when the raiders get to thinking they're clever, and he was one of the worst in that regard.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，我不喜欢掠夺者自认聪明，他是这方面最严重的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Irene [0700C003] (mod) Quest : ([0706C36B]RoadIreneDialogue) When My Time Comes EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\femaleadult11\roadirened_aairenesamdead_0006c992_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I killed Samir.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀了萨米尔。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Considering his previous gang experience consisted of dumping nautical tons of hair gel on his head, he did surprisingly well for himself up here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 考虑到他之前的帮派经历，包括往头上喷数海里的发胶，他在这里的表现令人惊讶。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Irene [0700C003] (mod) Quest : ([0706C36B]RoadIreneDialogue) When My Time Comes EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\femaleadult11\roadirened_aairene20dead_0006c994_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh well, he's dead now, so fuck him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦好吧，他现在死了，所以去他妈的吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Irene [0700C003] (mod) Quest : ([0706C36B]RoadIreneDialogue) When My Time Comes EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\femaleadult11\roadirened_aairene20dead_0006c994_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: 20K is no more.
ESP.TRADUIT: 20K已经不存在了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Apparently, everyone was figuring this guy was planning to try and stab Hader in the back and usurp leadership.
ESP.TRADUIT: 显然，大家都在猜测这家伙打算在背后捅哈德尔一刀然后篡夺领导权。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Irene [0700C003] (mod) Quest : ([0706C36B]RoadIreneDialogue) When My Time Comes EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\femaleadult11\roadirened_aairenewormdead_0006c996_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I almost regret interfering. But, y'know, not really.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我几乎后悔干涉了。但是，你懂的，我只是表面上后悔。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Irene [0700C003] (mod) Quest : ([0706C36B]RoadIreneDialogue) When My Time Comes EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\femaleadult11\roadirened_aairenewormdead_0006c996_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Worm is, funnily enough, worm food.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有趣的是，沃姆(Worm)也是蠕虫(worm)的食物。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wish somebody could have done that before he got all his raider buddies armed to the teeth.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真希望有人能在他把所有的掠夺者都武装到牙齿之前就这么做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Irene [0700C003] (mod) Quest : ([0706C36B]RoadIreneDialogue) When My Time Comes EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\femaleadult11\roadirened_aairenegenerald_0006c998_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh well, here's your cash.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢好吧，这是你的赏金。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Irene [0700C003] (mod) Quest : ([0706C36B]RoadIreneDialogue) When My Time Comes EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\femaleadult11\roadirened_aairenegenerald_0006c998_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I killed El Generalнsimo.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀了大元帅。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It might not be entirely accurate to list her as one of the raider targets, since she preyed on them as much as anyone else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 其实把她列为掠夺者并不完全准确，因为她和其他人一样经常捕杀掠夺者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Irene [0700C003] (mod) Quest : ([0706C36B]RoadIreneDialogue) When My Time Comes EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\femaleadult11\roadirened_aairenetashadea_0006c99a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some uh, "captives" a while back told all kinds of horror stories about some crazy zombie bitch snatching their people up during the night.
ESP.TRADUIT: 之前有个"俘虏"讲了很多恐怖的故事，说有个疯狂的僵尸婊子在晚上把他们的人抢走了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Irene [0700C003] (mod) Quest : ([0706C36B]RoadIreneDialogue) When My Time Comes EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\femaleadult11\roadirened_aairenetashadea_0006c99a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Funny as that is, I don't want indiscriminate murderers running around here, if it can be helped.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然这很有趣，但如果可以的话，我不希望不分青红皂白的杀人犯在这里横行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Irene [0700C003] (mod) Quest : ([0706C36B]RoadIreneDialogue) When My Time Comes EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\femaleadult11\roadirened_aairenetashadea_0006c99a_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I killed that ghoul.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀了那个尸鬼。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No shit? Well, good. I can't imagine anyone left who would be strong enough to hold the crews together, so that problem might take care of itself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不是吧？嗯，很好。我无法想象还有谁能有足够的力量把他的手下团结在一起，所以他们或许会不攻自破。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Irene [0700C003] (mod) Quest : ([0706C36B]RoadIreneDialogue) When My Time Comes EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\femaleadult11\roadirened_aairenehaderdea_0006c99c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I bet a good handful of them will get killed while they all fight over the proverbial throne, which I imagine is probably a toilet covered in spikes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我打赌他们中的很多人会在争夺王位的过程中被杀死，我想那可能是一个布满尖刺的厕所。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Irene [0700C003] (mod) Quest : ([0706C36B]RoadIreneDialogue) When My Time Comes EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\femaleadult11\roadirened_aairenehaderdea_0006c99c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, I seem to recall offering cash for killing that giant prick, so here you go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 总之，我记得为那个大混蛋提供了赏金，所以给你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Irene [0700C003] (mod) Quest : ([0706C36B]RoadIreneDialogue) When My Time Comes EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\femaleadult11\roadirened_aairenehaderdea_0006c99c_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I killed Hader.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀了哈德尔。

ESP.ORIGINAL: My sentiments exactly. Anything else before you go?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的感想正是如此，你走之前还有别的事吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb Alquist [0701367F] (mod) Quest : ([0704FA68]RoadCalebDialogue) 0704FA68 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcalebvoice\roadcalebd_aacalebaccept_0006cfb0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine with me. I have no problem wiping out slavers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没问题，我对消灭奴隶主没有意见。

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's something to be said for strict professionalism. Happy hunting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 严格的职业精神是可贵的，狩猎快乐。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb Alquist [0701367F] (mod) Quest : ([0704FA68]RoadCalebDialogue) 0704FA68 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcalebvoice\roadcalebd_aacalebgrudging_0006e1d9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine. I'll kill them, and then you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，我会杀了他们，然后是你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I imagine Early told you the basics? Probably framed it around some stupid fucking good-and-evil ethical philosophy, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想厄尔利已经都告诉你了吧?也许是围绕着他那该死的善恶伦理哲学展开的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb Alquist [0701367F] (mod) Quest : ([0704FA68]RoadCalebDialogue) 0704FA68 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcalebvoice\roadcalebd_aacalebbackgrou_0006e1db_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Before House domesticated Vegas proper, and before the NCR came marching in from the west, the Mojave was untamed and wild. Dangerous as hell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在豪斯真正让维加斯臣服，在NCR从西部进军之前，莫哈韦沙漠是未受管理且狂野的，如地狱一样危险。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb Alquist [0701367F] (mod) Quest : ([0704FA68]RoadCalebDialogue) 0704FA68 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcalebvoice\roadcalebd_aacalebbackgrou_0006e1db_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Fiends are new, I'll grant them that, but the others? The Vipers, Jackals... hell, even the Khans. They're a shadow of what they used to be.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恶魔帮是新来的，这点我承认，但其他人呢？毒蛇帮、豺狼帮...见鬼，大汗帮也不例外。他们只是过去的影子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb Alquist [0701367F] (mod) Quest : ([0704FA68]RoadCalebDialogue) 0704FA68 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcalebvoice\roadcalebd_aacalebbackgrou_0006e1db_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When the NCR first came to the Mojave, the first opposition they faced came from independent little raider bands, not organized gangs or armies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当NCR第一次来到莫哈韦时，他们面对的第一次抗争是来自于独立的小掠夺者团伙，而不是有组织的帮派或军队。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb Alquist [0701367F] (mod) Quest : ([0704FA68]RoadCalebDialogue) 0704FA68 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcalebvoice\roadcalebd_aacalebbackgrou_0006e1db_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And one of these bands was led by a man named Sheridan.
ESP.TRADUIT: 其中一伙人是由一个叫谢里丹的人领导的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb Alquist [0701367F] (mod) Quest : ([0704FA68]RoadCalebDialogue) 0704FA68 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcalebvoice\roadcalebd_aacalebbackgrou_0006e1db_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want to hear your take on things. What happened in Brighton?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想听听你的看法，布莱顿发生了什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Speaking objectively, he's the most depraved bastard to ever run himself a gang. Take any regular act of cruelty, Sheridan would take it further.
ESP.TRADUIT: 客观地说，他是有史以来最凶残的黑帮头目。就任何常规的残忍行为，谢里丹都会更进一步。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb Alquist [0701367F] (mod) Quest : ([0704FA68]RoadCalebDialogue) 0704FA68 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcalebvoice\roadcalebd_aacalebsheridan_0006e1dd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Murder is the least of his crimes. Torture, rape, slaving... It was all fair game for him. And, of course, he just refused to fucking die.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谋杀是他最小的罪行，酷刑、强奸、奴役......这对他来说都是家常便饭。当然，他就是一直没死。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb Alquist [0701367F] (mod) Quest : ([0704FA68]RoadCalebDialogue) 0704FA68 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcalebvoice\roadcalebd_aacalebsheridan_0006e1dd_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR got a bug up their ass about clipping him. In return, Sheridan began to focus all his efforts on making life hard for them.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR的人一直想干掉他，作为报复，谢里丹开始竭尽全力让NCR生活变得艰难。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb Alquist [0701367F] (mod) Quest : ([0704FA68]RoadCalebDialogue) 0704FA68 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcalebvoice\roadcalebd_aacalebsheridan_0006e1dd_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The longer this went on, the more bold the other raiders got. Sheridan could target the NCR with impunity, so why not them?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这事拖得越久，其他掠夺者就越胆大妄为。谢里丹可以肆无忌惮地攻击NCR，那为什么不也学学谢里丹呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb Alquist [0701367F] (mod) Quest : ([0704FA68]RoadCalebDialogue) 0704FA68 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcalebvoice\roadcalebd_aacalebsheridan_0006e1dd_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess he bought into his own bullshit, because he installed himself as the new overlord of some little town to the southeast. Brighton.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我猜他相信了自己的鬼话，因为他把自己变成了东南边某个小城镇的新霸主。布莱顿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb Alquist [0701367F] (mod) Quest : ([0704FA68]RoadCalebDialogue) 0704FA68 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcalebvoice\roadcalebd_aacalebsheridan_0006e1dd_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And that fucking town, they loved him for it. They paid him for protection, and believed he'd honor it. Said the stories about him was all NCR lies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而那个该死的小镇，镇民因此而爱上了他，他们付钱让他保护自己，相信他会尊重承诺。还说关于他的故事都是NCR的谎言。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb Alquist [0701367F] (mod) Quest : ([0704FA68]RoadCalebDialogue) 0704FA68 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcalebvoice\roadcalebd_aacalebsheridan_0006e1dd_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's the point where Early hired me, and I reckon you know what happened next.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以厄尔利才雇了我，我想你知道接下来发生了什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb Alquist [0701367F] (mod) Quest : ([0704FA68]RoadCalebDialogue) 0704FA68 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcalebvoice\roadcalebd_aacalebsheridan_0006e1dd_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can you tell me about Sheridan?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能跟我说说谢里丹吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I wasn't the first hunter to take the contract on Sheridan's head, you know. Not by a long shot. NCR hired dozens of 'em.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，你知道的，我绝对不是第一个拿谢里丹的人头合同的猎人，NCR雇了很多人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb Alquist [0701367F] (mod) Quest : ([0704FA68]RoadCalebDialogue) 0704FA68 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcalebvoice\roadcalebd_aacalebmurder_0006e1e1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Most of the dumbasses went after him directly. Always ended badly for them. Skinned alive and left to rot, thrown on hot coals, that sorta shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大多数蠢货都直接去找他，他们的结局总是很糟糕。被活活剥了皮，扔在火炭上或者任其腐烂，诸如此类的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb Alquist [0701367F] (mod) Quest : ([0704FA68]RoadCalebDialogue) 0704FA68 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcalebvoice\roadcalebd_aacalebmurder_0006e1e1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The direct method didn't work. So, I gathered my gang together. Most of those guys are dead, now... Anyway. We all rolled right up into Brighton.
ESP.TRADUIT: 直接的方法不起作用。所以，我召集了我的团队。虽然大部分人都死了，现在...但无论如何，我们一路找到了布莱顿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb Alquist [0701367F] (mod) Quest : ([0704FA68]RoadCalebDialogue) 0704FA68 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcalebvoice\roadcalebd_aacalebmurder_0006e1e1_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once we arrived, I announced, loud as you please: "Bring me Sheridan, bound and gagged! You have exactly one hour, or there will be consequences."
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们一到，我就大声宣布：“给你们一个小时，把谢里丹给我堵住嘴绑来！否则后果自负。”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb Alquist [0701367F] (mod) Quest : ([0704FA68]RoadCalebDialogue) 0704FA68 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcalebvoice\roadcalebd_aacalebmurder_0006e1e1_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, of course, they don't. Why would they? They were paying him to defend them, and they figured him for invincible.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，他们不会这么做，他们为什么要这样做呢？他们雇了谢里丹保护他们，他们认为他是不可战胜的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb Alquist [0701367F] (mod) Quest : ([0704FA68]RoadCalebDialogue) 0704FA68 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcalebvoice\roadcalebd_aacalebmurder_0006e1e1_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me, would an invincible protector let his people be slaughtered in the streets?
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉我，一个不可战胜的保护者会让他的人民在街上被屠杀吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb Alquist [0701367F] (mod) Quest : ([0704FA68]RoadCalebDialogue) 0704FA68 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcalebvoice\roadcalebd_aacalebmurder_0006e1e1_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, an hour passed, and we killed everyone. Age, health, it didn't matter. They were his loyal devotees, so they were marked for death.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因此，一个小时过去了，我们杀了所有人。年龄、健康状况都不重要，他们是谢里丹忠实的信徒，所以他们被标记为必死之人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb Alquist [0701367F] (mod) Quest : ([0704FA68]RoadCalebDialogue) 0704FA68 (EDID)

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sheridan never showed up, of course. Coward. We threw the corpses in a ditch to rot, we burned the town to ash, then we headed on home.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，谢里丹这个懦夫没有出现。我们把尸体扔进沟里腐烂，把镇子烧成灰，然后我们就回家了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb Alquist [0701367F] (mod) Quest : ([0704FA68]RoadCalebDialogue) 0704FA68 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcalebvoice\roadcalebd_aacalebmurder_0006e1e1_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sounds like the price was on Sheridan's head. Why go after Brighton?
ESP.TRADUIT: 听起来只是要拿谢里丹的人头，为什么要攻击布莱顿？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Easy. 'Cause it worked. Sheridan wasn't a bulletproof defender-of-the-weak. He was coward on the run, with no home to offer him shelter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很简单。因为它奏效了，谢里丹不是弱者的保护神，他是个逃亡中的懦夫，没有家园给他提供庇护。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb Alquist [0701367F] (mod) Quest : ([0704FA68]RoadCalebDialogue) 0704FA68 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcalebvoice\roadcalebd_aacalebjustifie_0006e1e3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The legend of the raider that no one could touch? Gone. He didn't protect his people. He didn't retaliate. He didn't do a goddamn thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个没人敢惹的掠夺者的传说？一去不复返了。他没能保护他的人民，他也没办法报复，他什么都他妈的做不了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb Alquist [0701367F] (mod) Quest : ([0704FA68]RoadCalebDialogue) 0704FA68 (EDID)

ESP.ORIGINAL: His gang splintered. His clients abandoned him. When other raiders hit the NCR, they no longer did it in his name.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他的帮派分裂了，他的客户抛弃了他。当其他掠夺者袭击NCR时，也不再打着他的旗号了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb Alquist [0701367F] (mod) Quest : ([0704FA68]RoadCalebDialogue) 0704FA68 (EDID)

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe he is still out there, sharpening his knives and brutalizing anyone weaker than him. Does it matter? I broke his power base. He's toothless.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许他还在逍遥法外，磨刀虐待比他弱小的人。这有什么关系吗？我打破了他的权力基础，他现在是没牙的老虎。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb Alquist [0701367F] (mod) Quest : ([0704FA68]RoadCalebDialogue) 0704FA68 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcalebvoice\roadcalebd_aacalebjustifie_0006e1e3_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That was what I was told to do. What I was supposed to be paid to do. Fucking Early. That spineless shit says it was unforgivable.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是他们告知我要做的，我做了我该做的事。该死的厄尔利，那个没骨气的家伙说我的行为这是不可原谅的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb Alquist [0701367F] (mod) Quest : ([0704FA68]RoadCalebDialogue) 0704FA68 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcalebvoice\roadcalebd_aacalebjustifie_0006e1e3_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't give a fuck about forgiveness. I do terrible things to terrible people, and I can live with that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我他妈才不在乎什么宽恕不宽恕，我是对可怕的人做了可怕的事，我完全可以接受。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb Alquist [0701367F] (mod) Quest : ([0704FA68]RoadCalebDialogue) 0704FA68 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcalebvoice\roadcalebd_aacalebjustifie_0006e1e3_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How can I justify what I've done? Because my daughter can sleep at night without fear of men like Sheridan.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要怎么为自己的所作所为辩护呢？因为我的女儿晚上可以安心睡觉而不用害怕谢里丹这样的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb Alquist [0701367F] (mod) Quest : ([0704FA68]RoadCalebDialogue) 0704FA68 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcalebvoice\roadcalebd_aacalebjustifie_0006e1e3_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll go to my grave with my head held high because of that. The world needs bad men like me to make the hard decisions for the greater good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 正因如此，我会昂首阔步地进入我的坟墓。这个世界需要像我这样的坏人，为了让世界变得更好而做出艰难的决定。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb Alquist [0701367F] (mod) Quest : ([0704FA68]RoadCalebDialogue) 0704FA68 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcalebvoice\roadcalebd_aacalebjustifie_0006e1e3_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How can you justify that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么能证明这一点呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Exactly. Was it pretty? No. Did I enjoy it? Of course not. But I know the price of indecision.
ESP.TRADUIT: 完全正确，这光彩吗？不。我喜欢吗？当然不。但我知道犹豫就会败北。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb Alquist [0701367F] (mod) Quest : ([0704FA68]RoadCalebDialogue) 0704FA68 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcalebvoice\roadcalebd_aacalebagree_0006e1e5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If we want to rid the world of men like Sheridan, or Caesar, or Bradshaw... We need to be ready and willing to do whatever is necessary.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我们让世界摆脱谢里丹、凯撒或布拉德肖这样的人...我们都需要做好准备，愿意做任何事情来达到目的的准备。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb Alquist [0701367F] (mod) Quest : ([0704FA68]RoadCalebDialogue) 0704FA68 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcalebvoice\roadcalebd_aacalebagree_0006e1e5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe you're right. It sounds like it worked.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许你是对的，这听起来很有效。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can fuck off with that holier-than-thou bullshit. You kill people for money, same as me. You don't get to hold yourself to a different standard.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以带着你那些自以为圣洁的鬼话滚了，你和我一样是为了钱杀人的，不要用不同的标准来约束这个职业。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb Alquist [0701367F] (mod) Quest : ([0704FA68]RoadCalebDialogue) 0704FA68 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcalebvoice\roadcalebd_aacalebdisagree_0006e1e7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you're too chickenshit to make the hard choices, get the fuck out of the way for the people who can.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你太胆小，不敢做出艰难的选择，那就把路让给那些能做到的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb Alquist [0701367F] (mod) Quest : ([0704FA68]RoadCalebDialogue) 0704FA68 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcalebvoice\roadcalebd_aacalebdisagree_0006e1e7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's no excuse for what you did.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的所作所为是没有任何借口的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You could run for the doors, if it suits you. You may even make it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果时机成熟的话，你可以跑出去，你甚至可能逃脱成功。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hader [0704EE05] (mod) Quest : ([0706C36B]RoadIreneDialogue) When My Time Comes EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\aaaroadhadervoice\roadirened_aahaderdecline_00075b51_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come, face your death!
ESP.TRADUIT: 来吧，面对你的死亡！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hader [0704EE05] (mod) Quest : ([0706C36B]RoadIreneDialogue) When My Time Comes EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\aaaroadhadervoice\roadirened_aahaderdecline_00075b51_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait, this seems like a bad place to fight to the death. Can we take this outside?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，这里似乎不是个适合拼命的好地方，我们能到外面解决吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well said. You've impressed me well enough, outsider.
ESP.TRADUIT: 说得好，你给我留下了很好的印象，外来者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hader [0704EE05] (mod) Quest : ([0706C36B]RoadIreneDialogue) When My Time Comes EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\aaaroadhadervoice\roadirened_aahadercombat_00075b53_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No matter which of us dies here, I expect this shall be a glorious fight. Come, face death!
ESP.TRADUIT: 无论我们谁死在这里，我希望这将是一场光荣的战斗。来吧，面对死亡！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hader [0704EE05] (mod) Quest : ([0706C36B]RoadIreneDialogue) When My Time Comes EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\aaaroadhadervoice\roadirened_aahadercombat_00075b53_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Attack] If you think you can kill me, you're welcome to try.
ESP.TRADUIT: [攻击]如果你认为你能杀了我，你可以试试。

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Holotape Recording>
ESP.TRADUIT: <全息磁带录音>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Uncle Fester the Child Molester [070837E7] (mod) Quest : ([070837E8]RoadVoiceRecording) 070837E8 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\maleadult01default\roadvoicer_aaholorecording_000837ea_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [The slave thanks you numerous times, helping his friend up all the while. Free of their collars, the pair quickly flee the area.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [奴隶多次感谢你，并帮助他的朋友起来。他们挣脱了项圈，迅速逃离了该地区。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Slave [070997A2] (mod) Quest : ([070997AD]RoadSlavesQuestThing) 070997AD (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Undo their collars.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [解开他们的项圈。]

ESP.ORIGINAL: [The slave thanks you numerous times, helping her friend up all the while. Free of their collars, the pair quickly flee the area.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [奴隶多次感谢你，并帮助她的朋友起来。他们挣脱了项圈，迅速逃离了该地区。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Slave [070997A5] (mod) Quest : ([070997AD]RoadSlavesQuestThing) 070997AD (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Undo their collars.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [解开他们的项圈。]

ESP.ORIGINAL: [The slave silently embraces you for a moment, before heading for the exit.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [奴隶静静地拥抱了你一会儿，然后向出口走去。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Slave [070611AF] (mod) Quest : ([070997AD]RoadSlavesQuestThing) 070997AD (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Undo her collar.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [解开他的项圈。]

ESP.ORIGINAL: [You cut the length of rope binding the pair of captives. As they stand, they both thank you for your mercy, before they run for the exit.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [你剪断绑着那两个俘虏的绳子。他们站起来感谢你的仁慈，然后就跑出去了。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Slave [070611AF] (mod) Faction : aaaRoadLawsonCaptives Quest : ([070997AD]RoadSlavesQuestThing) 070997AD (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Cut the captives free]
ESP.TRADUIT: [释放俘虏]

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : RoadSlaveFaction Quest : ([070997AD]RoadSlavesQuestThing) 070997AD (EDID) EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Do nothing.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [什么也不做]

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : aaaRoadLawsonCaptives Quest : ([070997AD]RoadSlavesQuestThing) 070997AD (EDID) EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Do nothing.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [什么也不做]

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, you know that mercenary crew running around the valley?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，你知道那个在山谷里跑来跑去的雇佣兵团伙吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Owens [0700C007] (mod) Quest : ([07035478]RoadAussieQuest) Workplace Hazards EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\maleadult04\roadaussie_aaaroadowensbac_000a8fcf_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I ran with them for a few months. The commander was a hardass prick, and his second-in-command is a raging lunatic, so I quit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我和他们一起跑了几个月。指挥官是个强硬的混蛋，他的副手是个狂暴的疯子，所以我退出了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Owens [0700C007] (mod) Quest : ([07035478]RoadAussieQuest) Workplace Hazards EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\maleadult04\roadaussie_aaaroadowensbac_000a8fcf_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm trying to get my own crew started, but Madsen isn't the best place for that, as I'm discovering.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想组建自己的团队，但我发现，马德森不是最好的选择。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Owens [0700C007] (mod) Quest : ([07035478]RoadAussieQuest) Workplace Hazards EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\maleadult04\roadaussie_aaaroadowensbac_000a8fcf_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, what's your deal?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，你是做什么的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Town's pretty small, you know? The people here that know how to handle a gun are all occupied with town guard shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 小镇很小，懂吗？这里知道怎么用枪的人都在忙着镇里的守卫工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Owens [0700C007] (mod) Quest : ([07035478]RoadAussieQuest) Workplace Hazards EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\maleadult04\roadaussie_aaaroadowenswha_000a8fd1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Plus, most of them have been here since before this place was anything more than a gang hangout. Too much hometown pride to walk away now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而且，他们大多数人在这里变成一个小镇之前就来这里了，家乡自豪感已经扎根于他们心底，不会轻易离开。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Owens [0700C007] (mod) Quest : ([07035478]RoadAussieQuest) Workplace Hazards EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\maleadult04\roadaussie_aaaroadowenswha_000a8fd1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As for clients, this place is too remote and too new for anyone to come here looking for guns-for-hire.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对于客户来说，这个地方太遥远，太新了，没有人会来这里雇佣人手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Owens [0700C007] (mod) Quest : ([07035478]RoadAussieQuest) Workplace Hazards EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\maleadult04\roadaussie_aaaroadowenswha_000a8fd1_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If I could just get some solid jobs lined up, the other shit would start falling into place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我能找到合适的工作的话，其他的事情就会慢慢好起来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Owens [0700C007] (mod) Quest : ([07035478]RoadAussieQuest) Workplace Hazards EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\maleadult04\roadaussie_aaaroadowenswha_000a8fd1_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's wrong with Madsen?
ESP.TRADUIT: 马德森怎么了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The top guy was General Brandice. Not actually a general in any real capacity. He just decided that'd be his title with this crew.
ESP.TRADUIT: 雇佣兵的领头是布兰迪斯将军，实际上不是真正意义上的将军，只是他自己封的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Owens [0700C007] (mod) Quest : ([07035478]RoadAussieQuest) Workplace Hazards EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\maleadult04\roadaussie_aaaroadowensmer_000a8fd3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Guy got kicked out of the NCR military. He claims the charges were bullshit, and he just got fucked over by backroom politics.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他被NCR军队开除了。他说那些指控都是狗屁，他只是被幕后政治耍了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Owens [0700C007] (mod) Quest : ([07035478]RoadAussieQuest) Workplace Hazards EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\maleadult04\roadaussie_aaaroadowensmer_000a8fd3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: More likely, he got caught taking bribes and stealing gear. Guy had a lot of resources for a dishonorably discharged lieutenant, all I'm saying.
ESP.TRADUIT: 更有可能的是，他被发现收受贿赂和盗窃装备。我想说的是，对于一个不光彩地退役的中尉来说，他有很多资源。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Owens [0700C007] (mod) Quest : ([07035478]RoadAussieQuest) Workplace Hazards EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\maleadult04\roadaussie_aaaroadowensmer_000a8fd3_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As for his second, Captain Brennan is the biggest cunt I've ever met. If that man was drowning, I'd throw him a fucking barbell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至于第二个，布伦南上尉是我见过的最大的傻逼。如果那人在河里溺水了，我会再给他扔个杠铃。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Owens [0700C007] (mod) Quest : ([07035478]RoadAussieQuest) Workplace Hazards EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\maleadult04\roadaussie_aaaroadowensmer_000a8fd3_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Call him a captain all you want, as far as I see it, he's a half-retarded serial killer that happened to luck into some stylish armor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 随便你称呼他什么，据我所知，他就是个半弱智的连环杀手，碰巧穿了一身时髦的盔甲。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Owens [0700C007] (mod) Quest : ([07035478]RoadAussieQuest) Workplace Hazards EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\maleadult04\roadaussie_aaaroadowensmer_000a8fd3_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I once saw him shoot an unarmed woman, then he looked at his rifle, cooed "Who's a deadly girl? Yes you are!" and licked the fucking barrel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有一次我看到他开枪打死了一个手无寸铁的女人，然后他看着自己的步枪，低声问道:“谁是致命的女孩？对，是你！”接着舔了舔枪管。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Owens [0700C007] (mod) Quest : ([07035478]RoadAussieQuest) Workplace Hazards EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\maleadult04\roadaussie_aaaroadowensmer_000a8fd3_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I told 'em: "No way I'm taking orders from a murderer that fucks himself with an M16, and that's the end of that."
ESP.TRADUIT: 我告诉他们:“我绝对不会听命于一个拿着M16步枪自慰的杀人犯，这就结束了。”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Owens [0700C007] (mod) Quest : ([07035478]RoadAussieQuest) Workplace Hazards EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\maleadult04\roadaussie_aaaroadowensmer_000a8fd3_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can you tell me about the mercenaries?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能跟我说说那些雇佣兵吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, you could.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，你能。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Owens [0700C007] (mod) Quest : ([07035478]RoadAussieQuest) Workplace Hazards EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\maleadult04\roadaussie_aaaroadowenshel_000a8fd5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you could get into the old power plant that my old crew is occupying, and snag their contracts...
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你能进入我的前帮派所占据的旧发电厂，抢走他们的合同...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Owens [0700C007] (mod) Quest : ([07035478]RoadAussieQuest) Workplace Hazards EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\maleadult04\roadaussie_aaaroadowenshel_000a8fd5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, suddenly I'd have a pile of pretty high-profile work on my lap. Just what I need.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，突然间，我的腿上就会有一堆相当备受瞩目的工作。这正是我需要的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Owens [0700C007] (mod) Quest : ([07035478]RoadAussieQuest) Workplace Hazards EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\maleadult04\roadaussie_aaaroadowenshel_000a8fd5_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, Brandice keeps the contracts in a briefcase. It should be on the top floor in an old office. Bring it here, and I'll get you paid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，布兰迪斯把合同放在一个公文包里。应该在顶层的一间旧办公室里。把它拿过来，我就给你钱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Owens [0700C007] (mod) Quest : ([07035478]RoadAussieQuest) Workplace Hazards EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\maleadult04\roadaussie_aaaroadowenshel_000a8fd5_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Keep in mind, that place will be swarming with hostiles. Smart move would be to stealth in, and then get out quick. Good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 记住，那地方肯定挤满了敌人。聪明的做法是偷偷潜入，然后迅速脱身。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Owens [0700C007] (mod) Quest : ([07035478]RoadAussieQuest) Workplace Hazards EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\maleadult04\roadaussie_aaaroadowenshel_000a8fd5_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anything I can do to help?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能帮上什么忙吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You did? Outstanding work!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你做到了？杰出的工作！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Owens [0700C007] (mod) Quest : ([07035478]RoadAussieQuest) Workplace Hazards EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\maleadult04\roadaussie_aaaroadowensjob_000a8fd7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, this is just what I need. I'll get started on these right away. Well, the ones that don't involve bodyguarding perverts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，这正是我需要的。我马上就开始处理，那些不涉及保护变态的案子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Owens [0700C007] (mod) Quest : ([07035478]RoadAussieQuest) Workplace Hazards EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\maleadult04\roadaussie_aaaroadowensjob_000a8fd7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, I get my own crew off the ground with this, you're more than welcome to join up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，有了这个，我自己的团队就能起步了，非常欢迎你加入。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Owens [0700C007] (mod) Quest : ([07035478]RoadAussieQuest) Workplace Hazards EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\maleadult04\roadaussie_aaaroadowensjob_000a8fd7_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's your cash. Good work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是你的奖励，干得漂亮！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Owens [0700C007] (mod) Quest : ([07035478]RoadAussieQuest) Workplace Hazards EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\maleadult04\roadaussie_aaaroadowensjob_000a8fd7_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I got those contracts you wanted.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我拿到了你想要的合同。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That nasty motherfucker? Yeah, overheard some radio chatter from the mercenary squad that escorted him through town.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个讨厌的混蛋？是啊，我无意中听到了一些护送他穿过镇子的雇佣兵小队的无线电聊天记录。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Owens [0700C007] (mod) Quest : ([07035478]RoadAussieQuest) Workplace Hazards EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\maleadult04\roadaussie_aaaroadowensbur_000a8fd9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know where they took him, but I know they got shoot-on-sight orders for anyone who comes hunting him. Guess that means you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道他们把他带到哪里去了，但我知道他们接到了对任何来追杀他的人开火的命令。我猜这说的是你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Owens [0700C007] (mod) Quest : ([07035478]RoadAussieQuest) Workplace Hazards EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\maleadult04\roadaussie_aaaroadowensbur_000a8fd9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, I'm sure there's more money to be made bringing him in alive, but... Fuck this guy. Do the world a favor and put a bullet in his skull.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，我相信把他活着带回去肯定能赚更多的钱，但是...操他妈的这家伙，你帮这世界一个忙，一枪崩了他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Owens [0700C007] (mod) Quest : ([07035478]RoadAussieQuest) Workplace Hazards EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\maleadult04\roadaussie_aaaroadowensbur_000a8fd9_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know anything about a guy named Adam Burke? Early 20s, very wealthy... Sound familiar?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道一个叫亚当·伯克的人吗？20岁出头，非常富有...听起来是不是很熟悉？

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...Right.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb Alquist [0701367F] (mod) Quest : ([0704FA68]RoadCalebDialogue) 0704FA68 (EDID) EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcalebvoice\roadcalebd_aaacalebfriendl_000ace60_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, it's a step up from the usual fire-and-brimstone approach that a lot of you headhunters prefer. Speaking from past experience, I concede.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，根据过去的经验，我承认这比很多猎头喜欢威逼恐吓方式要高一个层次。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb Alquist [0701367F] (mod) Quest : ([0704FA68]RoadCalebDialogue) 0704FA68 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcalebvoice\roadcalebd_aaacalebfriendl_000ace60_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Although, you might protest the term headhunter, wouldn't you? Considering you brought that Burke kid in alive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，考虑到你把伯克那孩子活着带回去了，你可能会反对猎头这个词，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb Alquist [0701367F] (mod) Quest : ([0704FA68]RoadCalebDialogue) 0704FA68 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcalebvoice\roadcalebd_aaacalebfriendl_000ace60_3.ogg
