ESP.ORIGINAL: A bit of professional advice? Targets like him are best served with a blade in the throat. People like that don't atone and get better.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一点专业建议？对他这样的人最好是用刀，慢慢刺死他。那样的人进了监狱也不会因为过错而赎罪，也不会变成好人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb Alquist [0701367F] (mod) Quest : ([0704FA68]RoadCalebDialogue) 0704FA68 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcalebvoice\roadcalebd_aaacalebfriendl_000ace60_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But you're not here about Burke this time. You're here for me. And sadly for you, you're not in a position to make good on your orders.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但你这次来不是为了伯克，而是我。遗憾的是，你不能履行你的命令。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb Alquist [0701367F] (mod) Quest : ([0704FA68]RoadCalebDialogue) 0704FA68 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcalebvoice\roadcalebd_aaacalebfriendl_000ace60_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not really, just figured I'd make friendly conversation. What's up with you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 算不上吧，我只是想和你友好地聊聊。你怎么了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...Right.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb Alquist [0701367F] (mod) Quest : ([0704FA68]RoadCalebDialogue) 0704FA68 (EDID) EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcalebvoice\roadcalebd_aaacalebfriendl_000ace61_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, it's a step up from the usual fire-and-brimstone approach that a lot of you headhunters prefer. Speaking from past experience, I concede.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，根据过去的经验，我承认这比很多猎头喜欢威逼恐吓方式要高一个层次。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb Alquist [0701367F] (mod) Quest : ([0704FA68]RoadCalebDialogue) 0704FA68 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcalebvoice\roadcalebd_aaacalebfriendl_000ace61_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Although, it seems like you got a decent grasp on how to operate. Heard how you executed that Burke asshole. Good work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，看起来你已经掌握了很好的操作方法。听说你处决了那个混蛋伯克，干得漂亮。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb Alquist [0701367F] (mod) Quest : ([0704FA68]RoadCalebDialogue) 0704FA68 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcalebvoice\roadcalebd_aaacalebfriendl_000ace61_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Animals like him don't atone and get better. Really, it's more merciful to everyone just to put him down, like a sick dog.
ESP.TRADUIT: 像他这样的畜生进了监狱也不会赎罪，也不会变成好人。说真的，把他像条病狗一样放倒对所有人来说都是恩惠。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb Alquist [0701367F] (mod) Quest : ([0704FA68]RoadCalebDialogue) 0704FA68 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcalebvoice\roadcalebd_aaacalebfriendl_000ace61_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But you're not here about Burke this time. You're here for me. And sadly for you, you're not in a position to make good on your orders.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但你这次来不是为了伯克，而是我。遗憾的是，你不能履行你的命令。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb Alquist [0701367F] (mod) Quest : ([0704FA68]RoadCalebDialogue) 0704FA68 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcalebvoice\roadcalebd_aaacalebfriendl_000ace61_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not really, just figured I'd make friendly conversation. What's up with you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 算不上吧，我只是想和你友好地聊聊。你怎么了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: That he's still alive to relay that to you tells me all I need to know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他还活着，能把这些告诉你我就知道了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb Alquist [0701367F] (mod) Quest : ([0704FA68]RoadCalebDialogue) 0704FA68 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcalebvoice\roadcalebd_aaacalebmetledo_000ace75_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I imagine he looked around one day at the company his boss kept and realized he didn't recognize any of them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想有一天他环顾了一下他老板经营的公司，发现他一个人都不认识。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb Alquist [0701367F] (mod) Quest : ([0704FA68]RoadCalebDialogue) 0704FA68 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcalebvoice\roadcalebd_aaacalebmetledo_000ace75_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, seeing himself as a good, moral man, LeDoux hung up his outlaw hat, content to tell stories of the good old days. Sound about right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，勒杜认为自己是一个好人，一个有道德的人，他挂起了他的亡命之徒的帽子，满足于讲述过去美好时光的故事。听上去没错吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb Alquist [0701367F] (mod) Quest : ([0704FA68]RoadCalebDialogue) 0704FA68 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcalebvoice\roadcalebd_aaacalebmetledo_000ace75_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Everyone always has a story they tell, to delude themselves into thinking they're a good person. Everyone has to sleep at night.
ESP.TRADUIT: 每个人都有自己的故事，自欺欺人，以为自己是好人，自认为理所当然。毕竟每个人晚上都要睡觉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb Alquist [0701367F] (mod) Quest : ([0704FA68]RoadCalebDialogue) 0704FA68 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcalebvoice\roadcalebd_aaacalebmetledo_000ace75_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I met a member of Sheridan's gang from back then. Guy was named Marcus LeDoux.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我遇到了当年谢里丹团伙里的一个成员。那家伙叫马库斯·勒杜。

ESP.ORIGINAL: They are. Good company, these two. Although, that's about it. They don't really guard shit, and I try to keep them out of gunfights.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它们是，好伙伴。不过仅此而已，它们什么都守不住，我尽量让它们远离枪战。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb Alquist [0701367F] (mod) Quest : ([0704FA68]RoadCalebDialogue) 0704FA68 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcalebvoice\roadcalebd_aaacalebnicedog_000ace77_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nice dogs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好狗。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Because one of my scouts told me you were coming.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为我的一个探子告诉我你要来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb Alquist [0701367F] (mod) Quest : ([0704FA68]RoadCalebDialogue) 0704FA68 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcalebvoice\roadcalebd_aaacalebwhyhere_000ace79_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Figured I'd rather have a civilized conversation in person, rather than us pointing guns at each other in the bush.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得我更愿意当面进行文明的对话，而不是在丛林里用枪指着对方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb Alquist [0701367F] (mod) Quest : ([0704FA68]RoadCalebDialogue) 0704FA68 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcalebvoice\roadcalebd_aaacalebwhyhere_000ace79_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If your gang is out hunting raiders, why are you here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你的手下在忙着追捕掠夺者，那你在这干什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh man, look at this thing!
ESP.TRADUIT: 天啊，看看这个!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May Ito [07012A8D] (mod) Quest : ([070488F8]RoadMayDialogue) I Plead the Second EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadmayvoice\roadmaydia_aaamayturnin191_000ae0d7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The feeding ramp is polished to a mirror sheen... Slide is reinforced, and the interlock with the frame is tightened for added precision.
ESP.TRADUIT: 枪膛导条抛光得像镜面一样...强化滑架，并且与框架的联锁是收紧的，以增加精度。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May Ito [07012A8D] (mod) Quest : ([070488F8]RoadMayDialogue) I Plead the Second EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadmayvoice\roadmaydia_aaamayturnin191_000ae0d7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tritium sites for low-light shooting conditions, extended thumb safety, there's even a threaded barrel to accommodate a suppressor...
ESP.TRADUIT: 用于弱光环境下射击的氚气枪口，加长的拇指保险，甚至还有螺纹枪管来容纳抑制器...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May Ito [07012A8D] (mod) Quest : ([070488F8]RoadMayDialogue) I Plead the Second EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadmayvoice\roadmaydia_aaamayturnin191_000ae0d7_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I don't care what anyone says. This is the best pistol ever made, hands down. And I'm gonna give you a 1000 caps for finding it. Thanks!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不在乎别人怎么说，毫无疑问，这是有史以来最好的手枪。我给你1000瓶盖，谢谢！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May Ito [07012A8D] (mod) Quest : ([070488F8]RoadMayDialogue) I Plead the Second EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadmayvoice\roadmaydia_aaamayturnin191_000ae0d7_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I found that .45 you wanted.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我找到了你想要的.45口径手枪。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I could complain about how these things is disassembled, and how I'll probably have to hose 'em all down, then get them back together and functional.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得抱怨这东西到底是如何拆卸的，我可能得把它们全部拆开，用水管把它们冲洗干净，然后再把它们重新组装起来，发挥作用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May Ito [07012A8D] (mod) Quest : ([070488F8]RoadMayDialogue) I Plead the Second EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadmayvoice\roadmaydia_aaamayturninak4_000ae125_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But come on, I'm just happy to have 'em. Besides, they're kalashnikovs. I could probably fire them just fine, straight out of the dirt.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是得了吧，我很高兴有它们，而且它们是卡拉什尼科夫步枪。我说不定可以直接在土里开火。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May Ito [07012A8D] (mod) Quest : ([070488F8]RoadMayDialogue) I Plead the Second EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadmayvoice\roadmaydia_aaamayturninak4_000ae125_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, I'm just gonna give you a thousand caps, and then I'm gonna get to work on these.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，我要给你一千瓶盖，然后我就要开始研究这些了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May Ito [07012A8D] (mod) Quest : ([070488F8]RoadMayDialogue) I Plead the Second EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadmayvoice\roadmaydia_aaamayturninak4_000ae125_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's that shipment of Chinese rifles you wanted.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是你要的那批中国步枪。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's probably good you gave this to me in here, 'cause if I was outside, I'd need to just empty the entire mag in one go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在城里给我是不错的选择，因为如果我在外面，我需要一次把弹匣里的子弹都打光。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May Ito [07012A8D] (mod) Quest : ([070488F8]RoadMayDialogue) I Plead the Second EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadmayvoice\roadmaydia_aaamayturninlmg_000ae13a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Normally these things are belt-fed. I guess converting them to the big drum mags made it easier for a single person to operate it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 通常这些东西都是带弹药带的，我猜把它们转换成大弹鼓是为了方便单兵操作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May Ito [07012A8D] (mod) Quest : ([070488F8]RoadMayDialogue) I Plead the Second EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadmayvoice\roadmaydia_aaamayturninlmg_000ae13a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, it's awesome! And since it's mine, I'm awesome. And since you got it for me, you're awesome! Awesome people get paid, so here you go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无论如何，它真的很棒！因为是我的，所以我就很棒，既然是你给我买的，那你就更棒！优秀的人应该得到报酬，所以给你钱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May Ito [07012A8D] (mod) Quest : ([070488F8]RoadMayDialogue) I Plead the Second EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadmayvoice\roadmaydia_aaamayturninlmg_000ae13a_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I got your LMG right here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我这有你的轻机枪。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Man, trophy hunters are little bitches. You get a badass 12 gauge like this, and you waste it on random animals? Come on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 伙计，宝藏猎人都是小贱人。你有这么一把12口径的枪，却随便浪费在动物身上？拜托。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May Ito [07012A8D] (mod) Quest : ([070488F8]RoadMayDialogue) I Plead the Second EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadmayvoice\roadmaydia_aaamayturninsho_000ae148_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A weapon this good should be reserved for shooting politicians, or lawyers! Or, my favorite option, it should be in my hands forever.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这么好的武器应该用来射杀政客或律师！或者，我最喜欢的选择，它应该永远在我的手中。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May Ito [07012A8D] (mod) Quest : ([070488F8]RoadMayDialogue) I Plead the Second EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadmayvoice\roadmaydia_aaamayturninsho_000ae148_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And since you made that happen... Here, it's a bunch of cash.
ESP.TRADUIT: 既然你做到了，给，这是你的报酬。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May Ito [07012A8D] (mod) Quest : ([070488F8]RoadMayDialogue) I Plead the Second EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadmayvoice\roadmaydia_aaamayturninsho_000ae148_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I believe this was the shotgun you were looking for?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我相信这就是你要找的猎枪？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Goddamn, look at the size of this thing!
ESP.TRADUIT: 天啊，看看这东西的大小！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May Ito [07012A8D] (mod) Quest : ([070488F8]RoadMayDialogue) I Plead the Second EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadmayvoice\roadmaydia_aaamayturninamr_000ae14a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you believe some people actually use these things on soft targets? That's just silly. But hey, I get the appeal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能相信有些人真的对软目标使用这个吗？这实在是太蠢了。但是，嘿，我明白这种吸引力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May Ito [07012A8D] (mod) Quest : ([070488F8]RoadMayDialogue) I Plead the Second EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadmayvoice\roadmaydia_aaamayturninamr_000ae14a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's your finders-fee, and I'm gonna put this thing on the shelf, before my back breaks from holding it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是你的报酬，我要把这东西放到架子上，免得我拿着它手断了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May Ito [07012A8D] (mod) Quest : ([070488F8]RoadMayDialogue) I Plead the Second EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadmayvoice\roadmaydia_aaamayturninamr_000ae14a_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You wanted a prototype anti-materiel rifle, now you've got a prototype anti-materiel rifle.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想要的原型反器材步枪，现在你拥有了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fantastic. Hope it wasn't too much of a pain to grab, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 太棒了！希望抓起来不会太疼，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May Ito [07012A8D] (mod) Quest : ([070488F8]RoadMayDialogue) I Plead the Second EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadmayvoice\roadmaydia_aaamayturnintra_000ae14c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know, I don't tend to get as many customers asking for lever-guns, but the ones I do get tend to go all-out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道吗，我不想让那么多顾客买杠杆枪，但来找我的顾客很多都想要这种大威力武器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May Ito [07012A8D] (mod) Quest : ([070488F8]RoadMayDialogue) I Plead the Second EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadmayvoice\roadmaydia_aaamayturnintra_000ae14c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Like, they want the lever-action, and they want a revolver, and they want a giant knife or something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 比如，他们想要杠杆枪，他们想要左轮手枪，他们想要一把大刀之类的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May Ito [07012A8D] (mod) Quest : ([070488F8]RoadMayDialogue) I Plead the Second EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadmayvoice\roadmaydia_aaamayturnintra_000ae14c_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Too bad for them, 'cause I ain't selling this rifle. But you kinda are, since I'm gonna pay you for it. Here you go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但对他们来说是个坏消息了，因为我不会卖这把枪。但你没问题，因为我要向你付钱，给你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May Ito [07012A8D] (mod) Quest : ([070488F8]RoadMayDialogue) I Plead the Second EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadmayvoice\roadmaydia_aaamayturnintra_000ae14c_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Found that lever-action .44 that you wanted.
ESP.TRADUIT: 找到了你想要的.44杠杆步枪。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, it's great, isn't it? I love the weather up here. The Mojave is all hot... and dry... And sweaty. I never saw snow once until I came north.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，太棒了，不是吗？我喜欢这里的天气。莫哈韦沙漠又热又干....出很多汗。我来北方之前从未见过雪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May Ito [07012A8D] (mod) Quest : ([070488F8]RoadMayDialogue) I Plead the Second EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadmayvoice\roadmaydia_aaamaymadsentho_000ae758_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And I like the people, too. Well, Colin is kind of a dick, but everyone else is nice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也喜欢这里的人。嗯，科林是有点混蛋，但其他人都很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May Ito [07012A8D] (mod) Quest : ([070488F8]RoadMayDialogue) I Plead the Second EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadmayvoice\roadmaydia_aaamaymadsentho_000ae758_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And, thank god, the town is new enough that there aren't any kids running around.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有，谢天谢地，这个镇子还很新，没有孩子跑来跑去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May Ito [07012A8D] (mod) Quest : ([070488F8]RoadMayDialogue) I Plead the Second EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadmayvoice\roadmaydia_aaamaymadsentho_000ae758_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you think of Madsen?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得马德森怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, absolutely. Kids are the worst.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，当然。孩子是最烦人的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May Ito [07012A8D] (mod) Quest : ([070488F8]RoadMayDialogue) I Plead the Second EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadmayvoice\roadmaydia_aaamayhatekids_000b188b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's like, you have a good thing going, right? But then, oh no, here comes a bunch of dumbass entitled kids to ruin it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就像，你有个好东西，对吧？但是呢，哦不，来了一群有熊孩子，毁了它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May Ito [07012A8D] (mod) Quest : ([070488F8]RoadMayDialogue) I Plead the Second EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadmayvoice\roadmaydia_aaamayhatekids_000b188b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Oh hey, I heard you guys are doing something that's beyond my level of comprehension! You'd better make it all dumber for my benefit!"
ESP.TRADUIT: “噢嘿，我听说你们在做一些超出我理解水平的事情！”，"为了我能听懂，你最好把它说得更笨些！”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May Ito [07012A8D] (mod) Quest : ([070488F8]RoadMayDialogue) I Plead the Second EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadmayvoice\roadmaydia_aaamayhatekids_000b188b_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nah, I hate 'em. And I really hate the notion that I'm supposed to want to have them, myself. Gross. No. Never.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我讨厌他们，而且我真的很讨厌我自己想拥有他们的想法。恶心...不，最好以后都不要发生这种事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May Ito [07012A8D] (mod) Quest : ([070488F8]RoadMayDialogue) I Plead the Second EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadmayvoice\roadmaydia_aaamayhatekids_000b188b_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: God, I can imagine it now: "Give me a gun, May! I demand it! Oh no, May, your gun is too much for my weak hands, I blame you for this."
ESP.TRADUIT: 天啊，我现在可以想象：“给我一支枪，梅！”我需要它！"哦，不，梅，你的枪对我软弱的双手来说太重了，这都怪你。”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May Ito [07012A8D] (mod) Quest : ([070488F8]RoadMayDialogue) I Plead the Second EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadmayvoice\roadmaydia_aaamayhatekids_000b188b_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stop talking about kids. They're gross and I hate them. Let's talk about something I enjoy, like guns, or rough sex! Yeah, guns sound good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不要再谈论孩子了。他们很恶心，我讨厌他们。让我们谈谈我喜欢的东西，比如枪，或者粗暴的性爱！是的，枪听起来也不错。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May Ito [07012A8D] (mod) Quest : ([070488F8]RoadMayDialogue) I Plead the Second EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadmayvoice\roadmaydia_aaamayhatekids_000b188b_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have a problem with children?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对孩子有意见？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, cool, whatever. Follow me, and try not to get weird.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，很酷，随便。跟我来，尽量不要搞怪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Delilah [0700C7F1] (mod) Quest : ([07034E48]RoadJonQuest) Application of Force EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\femaleadult01default\roadjonque_aaaroadhookerac_000b1891_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, let's party.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，让我们狂欢吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah? Alright then, let's go somewhere more private.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯？好吧，那我们去一个更私密的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alana [0700F3DC] (mod) Quest : ([07034E48]RoadJonQuest) Application of Force EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\femaleadult09\roadjonque_aaaroadhookerac_000b1892_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, let's party.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，让我们狂欢吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good choice. I mean... Uh, yeah, sorry to hear that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不错的选择。我的意思是...呃，对，听到这个我很难过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Delilah [0700C7F1] (mod) Quest : ([07034E48]RoadJonQuest) Application of Force EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\femaleadult01default\roadjonque_aaaroadhookerde_000b1894_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不了，谢谢你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, whatever.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，随便了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alana [0700F3DC] (mod) Quest : ([07034E48]RoadJonQuest) Application of Force EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\femaleadult09\roadjonque_aaaroadhookerde_000b1895_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不了，谢谢你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If I could shoot a gun, I'd be stationed on the wall. If I had a giant pile of cash, I'd run my own business...
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我会开枪，我就驻扎在城墙上了。如果我有一大笔钱，我就会经营自己的生意...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Delilah [0700C7F1] (mod) Quest : ([07034E48]RoadJonQuest) Application of Force EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\femaleadult01default\roadjonque_aaaroadhookerma_000b1897_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In lieu of those fun and exciting prospects, fucking for money will have to do. Speaking of which, do you want something beyond small talk?
ESP.TRADUIT: 除了那些有趣和令人兴奋的前景，只能为了钱性交。说到这个，除了闲聊，你还想要点什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Delilah [0700C7F1] (mod) Quest : ([07034E48]RoadJonQuest) Application of Force EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\femaleadult01default\roadjonque_aaaroadhookerma_000b1897_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How do you like working here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得在这里工作怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's alright. Jon is a pretty good boss. Most of the customers are, y'know, not gross or insane.
ESP.TRADUIT: 挺正常的，乔恩是个好老板。 而且你知道的，大多数顾客并不恶心或疯狂。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alana [0700F3DC] (mod) Quest : ([07034E48]RoadJonQuest) Application of Force EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\femaleadult09\roadjonque_aaaroadhookerma_000b1898_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Most popular girl of the week gets a free bottle downstairs, so that's cool. Hey, want to help me out with that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 本周最受欢迎的女孩可以在楼下免费喝一瓶，这很酷。嘿，想帮我这个忙吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alana [0700F3DC] (mod) Quest : ([07034E48]RoadJonQuest) Application of Force EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\femaleadult09\roadjonque_aaaroadhookerma_000b1898_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How do you like working here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得在这里工作怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, whatever.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，随便。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Owens [0700C007] (mod) Quest : ([07035478]RoadAussieQuest) Workplace Hazards EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\maleadult04\roadaussie_aaaroadowensnot_000b2501_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, good luck with that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，祝你好运。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It does look that way, yeah. Good work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，看起来是这样，干得漂亮。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Irene [0700C003] (mod) Quest : ([0706C36B]RoadIreneDialogue) When My Time Comes EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\femaleadult11\roadirened_aaairenehunthad_000b45da_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And a big gang with no captains is going to be pretty dysfunctional for a while. Seems like a good time to hit them hard.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个没有首领的大帮派在一段时间内会失常，看来现在似乎是一个打击他们的好时机。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Irene [0700C003] (mod) Quest : ([0706C36B]RoadIreneDialogue) When My Time Comes EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\femaleadult11\roadirened_aaairenehunthad_000b45da_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As it happens, I can't imagine anything that would damage them more than killing their big ambitious overlord.
ESP.TRADUIT: 碰巧的是，我想不出有什么比杀死他们野心勃勃的大领主更能损害他们的了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Irene [0700C003] (mod) Quest : ([0706C36B]RoadIreneDialogue) When My Time Comes EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\femaleadult11\roadirened_aaairenehunthad_000b45da_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you want to earn the bounty I put on Hader's head, now seems like a good time for it. I imagine his security is a little lax at the moment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想赚我给哈德尔的赏金，现在正是时候，我猜他的安保措施现在应该有点松懈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Irene [0700C003] (mod) Quest : ([0706C36B]RoadIreneDialogue) When My Time Comes EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\femaleadult11\roadirened_aaairenehunthad_000b45da_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pretty sure his compound is on the other side of that collapsed car tunnel, south of town. Let me know how that goes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很确定他的地盘就在塌陷的汽车隧道的另一边，在镇子的南部，告诉我进展如何。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Irene [0700C003] (mod) Quest : ([0706C36B]RoadIreneDialogue) When My Time Comes EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\femaleadult11\roadirened_aaairenehunthad_000b45da_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think I killed all the raiders on your hit-list, except for Hader.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我杀了你名单上所有的掠夺者，除了哈德尔。

ESP.ORIGINAL: M-money? Yeah, h-here you go. Sorry to bother you, sir. I'll just be going now, h-have a nice day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 钱...钱吗？好，给...给你。抱歉打扰你，先生，我现在要走了，祝...祝你愉快。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harris [07037927] (mod) Quest : ([0703C1BA]RoadHarrisDialogue) 0703C1BA (EDID) EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\maleadult01default\roadharris_aaaharristerrif_000b6644_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You got this all wrong. You're going to give me your money, or I'll skin you alive, piece by piece.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你完全搞错了。是你要把钱给我，否则我就一块一块活剥了你的皮。

ESP.ORIGINAL: M-money? Yeah, h-here you go. Sorry to bother you, ma'am. I'll just be going now, h-have a nice day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 钱...钱吗？好，给...给你。抱歉打扰你，女士，我现在要走了，祝...祝你愉快。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harris [07037927] (mod) Quest : ([0703C1BA]RoadHarrisDialogue) 0703C1BA (EDID) EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\maleadult01default\roadharris_aaaharristerrif_000b6645_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You got this all wrong. You're going to give me your money, or I'll skin you alive, piece by piece.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你完全搞错了。是你要把钱给我，否则我就一块一块活剥了你的皮。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ha! You think I valued a single one of them? They weren't worth the steel they carried.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈！你觉得我看重其中任何一个吗？他们根本配不上自己带的武器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hader [0704EE05] (mod) Quest : ([0706C36B]RoadIreneDialogue) When My Time Comes EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\aaaroadhadervoice\roadirened_aaahaderkilledm_000b7ce5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If they were too weak to stop you, then they deserved to die at your hand. Nobody will miss them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果他们弱到无力阻止你，那他们就该死在你手上，没有人会想念他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hader [0704EE05] (mod) Quest : ([0706C36B]RoadIreneDialogue) When My Time Comes EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\aaaroadhadervoice\roadirened_aaahaderkilledm_000b7ce5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I first arrived in this valley on a tide of blood, that of my own century. The lives of followers is worth less than dirt.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我第一次来到这个山谷是在我那个世纪的血潮中。信徒的生命一文不值。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hader [0704EE05] (mod) Quest : ([0706C36B]RoadIreneDialogue) When My Time Comes EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\aaaroadhadervoice\roadirened_aaahaderkilledm_000b7ce5_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, were those your men I killed? I hope I didn't upset you too much by killing them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，我杀的是你的人吗？希望我杀了他们没让你太难过。

ESP.ORIGINAL: They were weak, of course. There is no place for weakness in this world, as Caesar himself preaches.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然是因为他们自己太弱。正如凯撒自己所宣扬的，世界上没有弱者的容身之处。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hader [0704EE05] (mod) Quest : ([0706C36B]RoadIreneDialogue) When My Time Comes

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you believe there is a greater reason than that? The strong survive, and the weak die. That is how it has always been.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你相信还有比这更重要的原因吗？强者生，弱者死，自古以来都是这样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hader [0704EE05] (mod) Quest : ([0706C36B]RoadIreneDialogue) When My Time Comes EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\aaaroadhadervoice\roadirened_aaahaderwhybetr_000b7ce7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The lives of my Legion dogs bought me the martial supremacy that comes with a raider army, in addition to my own freedom.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在军团狗一般的生活给我带来的是掠夺者的军队霸权，以及我自己的自由。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hader [0704EE05] (mod) Quest : ([0706C36B]RoadIreneDialogue) When My Time Comes EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\aaaroadhadervoice\roadirened_aaahaderwhybetr_000b7ce7_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As for the raiders, I announced my intention to rule over them, and told them that if any of them objected, they were free to kill me, if they could.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至于那些掠夺者，我宣布我要统治他们，并告诉他们，如果有人反对的话，可以自由地杀了我，只要他们能做到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hader [0704EE05] (mod) Quest : ([0706C36B]RoadIreneDialogue) When My Time Comes EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\aaaroadhadervoice\roadirened_aaahaderwhybetr_000b7ce7_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some tried... All failed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有些人尝试了...都失败了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hader [0704EE05] (mod) Quest : ([0706C36B]RoadIreneDialogue) When My Time Comes EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\aaaroadhadervoice\roadirened_aaahaderwhybetr_000b7ce7_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why did you turn against the Legion?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么背叛军团？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, you see the truth of it. One of us must die here, today. As it should be.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，你看到了真相。今天，我们中必须有一个死在这里，理应如此。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hader [0704EE05] (mod) Quest : ([0706C36B]RoadIreneDialogue) When My Time Comes EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\aaaroadhadervoice\roadirened_aaahadercombat2_000b8933_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your employers are a weak and craven lot, hiding behind their walls to avoid facing me in battle.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的雇主是一群懦弱而胆小的人，躲在高墙后面躲避与我的战斗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hader [0704EE05] (mod) Quest : ([0706C36B]RoadIreneDialogue) When My Time Comes EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\aaaroadhadervoice\roadirened_aaahadercombat2_000b8933_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Their lives are worth little, and their money even less. But you are worth testing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们的生命一文不值，他们的钱更是一文不值，但你是值得一试的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hader [0704EE05] (mod) Quest : ([0706C36B]RoadIreneDialogue) When My Time Comes EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\aaaroadhadervoice\roadirened_aaahadercombat2_000b8933_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hope you live up to my expectations. Now, come. Face your death!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你不会辜负我的期望。现在，来吧，面对你的死亡！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hader [0704EE05] (mod) Quest : ([0706C36B]RoadIreneDialogue) When My Time Comes EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\aaaroadhadervoice\roadirened_aaahadercombat2_000b8933_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Attack] There's a price on your head, and I mean to collect it. You ready?
ESP.TRADUIT: [攻击]有人悬赏要你的头，我打算收了。你准备好了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever, I don't give a shit what you do with that information. I don't plan to stick around long.
ESP.TRADUIT: 管他呢，我才不管你怎么处理这些信息。我不打算在这待太久。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colette [070488D6] (mod) Quest : ([07056115]RoadColetteQuest) Blood for Blood EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolettevoice\roadcolett_aaacolettedonts_000b9bd1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, good luck with that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，祝你好运。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't need to tell me that! I'm going to cut his- Wait, what did you just say?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不用告诉我这些！我要切了他的...等等，你刚说什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colette [070488D6] (mod) Quest : ([07056115]RoadColetteQuest) Blood for Blood EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolettevoice\roadcolett_aaacolettejared_000b9bd3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You? You killed Jared Ross? The NCR sniper? Carries a giant rifle to overcompensate for his tiny dick?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你？你杀了贾里德·罗斯？那个NCR狙击手？带着一把巨大的步枪来弥补他的鸡巴小的事实的那个？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colette [070488D6] (mod) Quest : ([07056115]RoadColetteQuest) Blood for Blood EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolettevoice\roadcolett_aaacolettejared_000b9bd3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who the hell else would pay you to kill him? Was it Velasco?! ...No, no way he'd hire some outsider. Khans look after our own.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有谁会付钱让你杀他？贝拉斯科？！...不，他不可能雇外人，大汗帮只信得过自己人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colette [070488D6] (mod) Quest : ([07056115]RoadColetteQuest) Blood for Blood EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolettevoice\roadcolett_aaacolettejared_000b9bd3_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Jared Ross, First Recon sharpshooter? Yeah, he's dead. I killed him, and got paid for it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 贾里德·罗斯，第一侦察营的神枪手？嗯，他死了，我杀了他，还拿了钱。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I wouldn't expect the NCR murderer to be satisfied with just shooting my friends and family. Gotta satisfy that bloodlust somehow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，我认为NCR的杀人犯不会满足于射杀我的朋友和家人，总得想办法满足他的嗜血欲望。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colette [070488D6] (mod) Quest : ([07056115]RoadColetteQuest) Blood for Blood EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolettevoice\roadcolett_aaacolettekillm_000b9bd5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well... Fuck. I guess that scraps the personal revenge part of this whole thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧...操，我想这次就把我个人的复仇抛到脑后了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colette [070488D6] (mod) Quest : ([07056115]RoadColetteQuest) Blood for Blood EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolettevoice\roadcolett_aaacolettekillm_000b9bd5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It'd still be kinda funny if you killed his pussy-ass brother, but any purpose beyond that is kinda lost, now. Hmph.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你杀了他那混蛋弟弟，还是挺有趣的，但除此之外我的任何杀人意欲都失去了...现在，哼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colette [070488D6] (mod) Quest : ([07056115]RoadColetteQuest) Blood for Blood EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolettevoice\roadcolett_aaacolettekillm_000b9bd5_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever. Little annoyed you stole my revenge, but since you killed that bastard, I'll toss a little cash your way, all the same.
ESP.TRADUIT: 随便吧，你偷走了我的复仇之心，我有点生气，但既然你杀了那个混蛋，我还是会给你点钱的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colette [070488D6] (mod) Quest : ([07056115]RoadColetteQuest) Blood for Blood EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolettevoice\roadcolett_aaacolettekillm_000b9bd5_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyways, moving on to the other part of the plan. I made a bomb, I need you to get it sent to Shady Sands. I'll pay you for your time, of course.
ESP.TRADUIT: 总之，我们继续来谈谈另一个计划。我做了个炸弹，我要你把它送到沙荫镇，当然我会付你工钱的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colette [070488D6] (mod) Quest : ([07056115]RoadColetteQuest) Blood for Blood EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolettevoice\roadcolett_aaacolettekillm_000b9bd5_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ross was perched on an old billboard, shooting everyone he saw. I was hired to end it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 罗斯坐在一个旧广告牌上，朝他看到的每个人开枪。他们雇我来结束这一切。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really? You don't really look the part, but whatever. Still, I've never seen you before, so I know you ain't been one of us for long.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的？你看起来不太像那个角色，不过无所谓了。但是我以前从没见过你，所以我猜你加入我们的时间不长。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colette [070488D6] (mod) Quest : ([07056115]RoadColetteQuest) Blood for Blood EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolettevoice\roadcolett_aaacolettekillm_000b9bd6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You didn't bleed at Bitter Springs, like the rest of us did. Still, it means something that one of us got revenge on that bastard.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你没有像我们其他人一样在苦泉流血。尽管如此，作为我们的一份子向那个杂种复仇还是很有意义的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colette [070488D6] (mod) Quest : ([07056115]RoadColetteQuest) Blood for Blood EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolettevoice\roadcolett_aaacolettekillm_000b9bd6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here. Wish I could've killed him myself, but you still deserve something for what you did.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给，真希望我能亲手杀了他，但你还是应该为你所做的事情得到一些回报。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colette [070488D6] (mod) Quest : ([07056115]RoadColetteQuest) Blood for Blood EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolettevoice\roadcolett_aaacolettekillm_000b9bd6_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, moving on to the other part of my plan. I happen to have this bomb right here, and I need someone to see it get to Shady Sands. Easy?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我们继续来谈谈我的另一个计划。我碰巧在这里有个炸弹，我需要有人把它送到沙荫镇，很简单吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Colette [070488D6] (mod) Quest : ([07056115]RoadColetteQuest) Blood for Blood EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadcolettevoice\roadcolett_aaacolettekillm_000b9bd6_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Actually, I'm a Khan, too. Ross was shooting travelers from a billboard. I was hired to stop him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 实际上，我也是大汗帮。罗斯从广告牌上向过路的旅行者开枪，我是被雇我来阻止他的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: And you as well. May we meet again in Valhalla, to continue this duel. Ready yourself!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你也是，愿我们再次在瓦尔哈拉重逢，继续这场决斗。做好准备！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hader [0704EE05] (mod) Quest : ([0706C36B]RoadIreneDialogue) When My Time Comes EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\aaaroadhadervoice\roadirened_aaahaderslayer_000bf92e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You lived the life of a warrior. You've earned a glorious death at my hands.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你过着勇士的人生，你死在我手上是光荣的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Right, I was distracted by a cloud, so I didn't catch that bit where you confessed to the murder of an unarmed NCR civilian.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对了，我被一片云分散了注意力，所以我没听清你承认谋杀了一名手无寸铁的NCR平民的那段话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Brandt [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07014F32]RoadMainQuest) Far From Any Road EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadvoicebrandt\roadmainqu_aaabrandthhdick_000c0558_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Probably best if you don't go around telling funny stories like that to NCR personnel. Someone may take it the wrong way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许你最好别到处给NCR人员讲这种有趣的故事，有的人可能会误解。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Brandt [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07014F32]RoadMainQuest) Far From Any Road EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadvoicebrandt\roadmainqu_aaabrandthhdick_000c0558_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As for Johnson, he's the sort of person that us poor people who have to work for a living fantasize about stabbing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至于约翰逊，他是那种我们这些必须为生计奔波的穷人都幻想着能刺杀的那种人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Brandt [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07014F32]RoadMainQuest) Far From Any Road EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadvoicebrandt\roadmainqu_aaabrandthhdick_000c0558_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Burke kid's actually been to trial once, you know. Johnson got him acquitted by fabricating evidence that the little girl was a junkie whore.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道吗，伯克家那孩子其实上过一次法庭，约翰逊伪造证据说那小女孩是个吸毒的妓女，从而使他无罪释放。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Brandt [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07014F32]RoadMainQuest) Far From Any Road EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadvoicebrandt\roadmainqu_aaabrandthhdick_000c0558_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He also implied that her parents were her pimps, and it was all some elaborate blackmail racket. Probably bribed the jury, too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他还暗示她的父母是皮条客，这一切都是精心策划的敲诈勒索。他应该也贿赂了陪审团。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Brandt [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07014F32]RoadMainQuest) Far From Any Road EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadvoicebrandt\roadmainqu_aaabrandthhdick_000c0558_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The victim and her family became the media spectacle of the month, and the inevitable investigation into the allegations proved... Inconclusive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 受害者及其家人成为本月媒体的焦点，而对这些指控进行的不可避免的调查证明...没有定论。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Brandt [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07014F32]RoadMainQuest) Far From Any Road EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadvoicebrandt\roadmainqu_aaabrandthhdick_000c0558_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So as far as I'm concerned, Johnson, his client, and his client's degenerate son all deserve to hang, and I hope I live to see it happen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因此在我看来，约翰逊、他的委托人、还有他委托人堕落的儿子都应该被绞死，我希望我能活着看到这一切发生。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Brandt [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07014F32]RoadMainQuest) Far From Any Road EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadvoicebrandt\roadmainqu_aaabrandthhdick_000c0558_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But, y'know, make sure to bring him in alive and unharmed. Anyways, you taking the job, or not?
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，你懂的，一定要把他活着带回来，而且不要伤害他。总之，你要不要接受这份工作？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Brandt [070013F3] (mod) Quest : ([07014F32]RoadMainQuest) Far From Any Road EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\northroad.esp\roadvoicebrandt\roadmainqu_aaabrandthhdick_000c0558_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Senator Burke? I think I killed his lawyer a while back. Guy named Dick Johnson, I recall.
ESP.TRADUIT: 伯克参议员？我想我不久前刚杀了他的律师。我记得那个家伙叫迪克·约翰逊。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Todd's looming, twitchy presence serves to make you seem much more reasonable by comparison, boosting your Charisma by 1 for as long as he is around.
ESP.TRADUIT: 陶德突然出现，他焦躁不安的形象让你看起来更加帅气，只要他在你身边，你的魅力将会提升1点。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The hooker gives you a flirtatious wink.
ESP.TRADUIT: 妓女向你抛了一个媚眼。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've refused Brandt's offer to head into the North Road, meaning this mod is now over. Thank you for downloading!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你拒绝了勃兰特前往北方之路的提议，意味着这个Mod已经结束了。感谢下载！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Todd has given you the Nailboard Diplomacy perk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 陶德给你带来了钉板外交的技能。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have lost Todd's Nailboard Diplomacy perk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你失去了陶德的钉板枪外交技能。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Through your tireless dedication to exploring every inch of this mod, you have managed to trap yourself in this garage for all eternity! Thanks for downloading, motherfuckers!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你通过不懈的探索这个Mod的每个角落，终于成功的把自己永远困在了这个车库里。感谢下载，混蛋！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Congratulations!
ESP.TRADUIT: 恭喜你！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Caleb Alquist is dead. While that was, strictly speaking, the mission that Ranger Early assigned you, you can't help but recall that the entire reason he wanted Alquist dead was because of Alquist's ruthless approach to headhunting, without any regard for collateral damage.
That in mind, it's unlikely that Ranger Early will appreciate you repeating history. You have the strangest sense that you might've just fucked up.
ESP.TRADUIT:
凯莱布·阿尔奎斯特死了。虽然严格来说这是游骑兵厄尔利给你布置的任务，但你回想起他想要阿尔奎斯特的命完全是因为阿尔奎斯特无情的、完全不顾忌附带损害的猎头方式。
考虑到这一点，游骑兵厄尔利不太可能会喜欢你重复历史。你有种奇怪的感觉：刚刚你可能搞砸了。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
The tunnel to the north seems to stretch on for miles, with nothing but your Pip-Boy and the sporadic fire-barrel to guide you through the darkness. As you walk, you find yourself heading east, then north, then west, and so on. By the time you see the faint glimmer of sunlight, you're heading southward once more. Still, the tunnel only heads two ways, and you're certain this isn't the entrance you came from. As you have gathered from your brief skirmish at the start of the tunnel, the regional outlaws are well-armed and numerous. It may be wise to return to the Mojave if you feel the dangers of the north might overwhelm you...
The North Road is intended for couriers who have already shaken off the worst the wastes can throw at them. (Level 35+ recommended.)
ESP.TRADUIT:
通往北方的隧道似乎绵延数英里，只有你的Pip-boy和零星的篝火引导你穿过黑暗。走着走着，你发现自己在向东，然后是向北，然后是向西，以此类推。当你看到微弱的光时，你再次向南前进。不过，隧道只有两个方向，你确定这不是你来的入口。正如你们从隧道开始的短暂冲突中所了解到的，区域内的亡命徒装备精良，数量众多。如果你觉得北方的危险可能会压倒你，那么回到莫哈韦沙漠也许是明智的。
北方之路是为那些已经摆脱了低俗趣味的邮差设计的。(35 +推荐水平。)

ESP.ORIGINAL: Harris shuffles away after giving you a quick second glance. It's unclear if you'll ever see him again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈里斯飞快地瞥了你一眼，然后拖着步子走开了。不知道你还能不能再见到他。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Adam quickly foists the money into your hands, and then rushes out the door. It is unlikely your paths will ever cross again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 亚当迅速地把钱塞到你手里，然后冲出门去。你们不太可能再次相遇了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Adam takes a moment to collect himself, and then he departs for the Mojave. You will likely never see him again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 亚当冷静了一下，然后动身前往莫哈韦沙漠。你可能再也见不到他了。
